13bells.com.text: This is a benevolent dictatorship. The administrators of this site are donating their time and money to provide this platform, and as a result, reserve the right to delete, dismiss, silence, purge, or remove anyone at any time without explanation or justification.
We respect and support free speech, even when it may be personally disagreeable.
No illegal activity or activity which might be construed as fostering illegal activity.
No personal or ad-homenim attacks against other users, both local and remote to this server.
Do not engage in behavior which will likely result in this instance being banned or blocked entirely.

No overtly disparaging acts or comments which server no other purpose other than to denigrate a person based on their traits or characteristics. Witty memes and jokes are generally acceptable unless their sole purpose is to belittle or demean.
No Pornography. This is a private platform with limited public seating. Fine line here, but let's just say there are plenty of places for porn on the internet, this isn't one of them.
Spam or unsolicited commercial posts will be deleted and the offending accounts will be removed without warning
All Bots, parking account, parody accounts, or other similar activity is prohibited without express approval from an administrator.

Anything not covered by other rules above should be covered under our first principle, "This is a benevolent dictatorship" but ideally none of this will ever even matter since we fully expect people to behave as adults.
Accounts which are created and never used, aka, "parking accounts" will be terminated without warning after 30 days of inactivity.
Accounts which are not used within one year will be terminated without warning.

Enthusiasm - yes, hate - no.

We don't care if your loved one is 8-, 16-, 32-bit, male, female, feline, furry or anything else. We just want enthusiasm, (com)passion, and love to thrive here, while hate speech and lack of respect will keep you out.
No illegal content. Posting pornographic content with a minor, or content that may facilitate the commission of a crime will result in immediate and permanent ban.

Don't be harmful. Repeatedly posting content that can evoke negative emotions in the recipients or promote behavior that is dangerous to health/life can also result in a ban. Examples: violent content, aggressive behavior, content encouraging self-harm, suicide, and other self-destructive behavior.

about-the-author.online.text: No hate speech. Diverse opinions are OK. Unpopular opinions are OK as long as you don't whine about the consequences. Mistreatment of entire groups of people is not OK, to put it mildly.
No doxxing. Period. While I'm at it, no privacy, safety, or security violations in any form. Do not harm others or put others at risk, no matter what you think of them.

No obvious law violations. If you do something blatantly illegal that puts this instance in jeopardy then I will not hesitate to disable your account. If you victimize others (even indirectly), I will gladly aid and encourage law enforcement by appropriate authorities.
No predatory behavior toward writers. Advertising a vanity press or similar "service" could result in getting booted from this author-friendly space.
Promotions are allowed. If you overdo it, don't whine when people stop following you.

abc.mika.xyz.text: Be good. Be nice. Be respectful. Behave.

abdl.link.text: Under 18s are not permitted to sign up to this instance.

Media or content involving real or realistic people under 18 (even if legal) is prohibited. NSFW artwork depicting characters wearing diapers is allowed on this website, but only if it is not intended to sexualize infantilism or children. Artwork deemed inappropriate or offensive will be removed.
Posting, boosting or linking to any content that is illegal in the Finland, Netherlands or Germany is prohibited.
Discrimination of any kind is prohibited â€“ this includes but is not limited to racism, xenophobia, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, etc.
Content that you do not have permission to post is prohibited.
Spam and / or bots are prohibited.
Media showing nudity, bodily fluids or messy diapers must be marked as sensitive.
All profile pictures and headers must be SFW (safe for work).

abraham.su.text: The ongoing goal is civil discourse: all kinds of people having conversations and arguments about a variety of subjects and treating each other decently.
Authentic conversations -- from the head, the heart, and the gut.
A feeling of ownership. Participants become evangelists.
A spirit of group creativity, experimentation, exploration, good will.
A shared commitment to work together toward better communication, and better conversations. If this is achieved, nothing else is needed.
A system where people figure out where the conversation is going, by themselves, and settle conflicts among themselves.
A place where everybody builds social capital individually by improving each other's knowledge capital collaboratively.

accessnow.social.text:
No harassment is tolerated

see https://www.accessnow.org/access-now-code-of-conduct/
for more information 

harassment include sexual harassment, of any kind. Harassment is any verbal, nonverbal, or physical conduct designed to threaten, intimidate, silence, or coerce.

Discrimination

Will not accepted Offensive or unwelcome comments, including epithets, slurs, negative stereotyping, and discriminatory remarks disguised as humor, based on gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, religion, age, disability, or physical appearance

Disrespect

We don't allow distribution, display, or discussion of written or graphic material that ridicules, insults, or shows hostility or disrespect toward an individual or group because of gender identity, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, religion, age, disability, or appearance

Outing 

We don't allow deliberate â€œoutingâ€ of any aspect of a personâ€™s identity without their consent;

Misgendering 

we don't allow deliberate misgendering or use of rejected names

Intimidations
We don't allow Intimidation or silencing, including sustained and deliberate disruption of discussion

Threats
is not tollerated any threats of violence or incitement of violence, including encouraging a person to commit suicide or to engage in self-harm;

Stalking

We don't allow any type of stalking or following, including repeated one-on-one communication despite requests to cease, continued communications with the intent to harass, annoy, or alarm, unwanted photography or recording, and tracking and logging online activity without consent;

Doxing 

We don't tollerate any failure to safeguard confidential or privately shared information, including publication of private communication without consent;

Unwelcome sexual attention
We don't accept any unwelcome sexual attention, including innuendoes, suggestive comments, jokes of a sexual nature, sexual propositions, lewd remarks and obscene gestures, and requests for sexual favors (including repeated and unwelcome requests for dates);

non-consensual-sharing

Distribution, display, or discussion of any sexually suggestive written or graphic material, including emails, photos, text messages, and tweets, that is gratuitous, off-topic, or shows hostility or disrespect toward an individual or group;

Members cannot hold beliefs related to nationalistic ideologies, ethnic superiority, religious persecution, racial discrimination, and/or queerphobia.

Use proper content warnings! While sexual content, fictional gore, and heavier topics (distressing, political, spiritual, etc.) are allowed, it must be used with a warning that describes the content using the âš  (Content Warning) button. Warnings must properly describe the content in the post, typically with multiple words to properly describe the content which the viewer may be sensitive to. Media that requires content warnings also cannot be used in icons or profile banners.

No harassment, violence or disparagement! Do not send aggressive unwanted criticism, disparaging remarks, unwanted advances, stalk other users, vague post, post opinions related to anti-kink activism (e.g. kink shaming) and do not circumvent blocks. Do not threaten others or yourself with physical harm. Members are also forbidden from attempting vigilantism (e.g. writing a callout)! Please simply report other users for violating our rules instead of policing them yourself!

18+ only! No one under the age of 18 may create an account or interact with CW'd content on this server. Users on this server must also communicate in age appropriate ways with minors on other servers. Those found violating this rule will be immediately suspended.

No copyright infringement! Users must have the right to use the media they post. In cases where they don't, it must fall under Fair Use (e.g. fan art and fan fiction created by the user). Users must also give proper attribution to the original creators of the content even in cases where permission was granted.

No abusive ideals related to consent! While clearly marked fiction is fine, we take a hard stance against those with ideals that advocate harmful contact in real life and movements which seek to normalize harmful attractions. This includes beliefs, iconography, and/or labels related to sexual or romantic contact between adults and minors (e.g. MAPs), humans and animals (e.g. zoophilia), or others who cannot or did not consent (this includes labels such as "radqueer" and "pro-para").

Only post consensual and legal content! When posting sexual content, all parties must have consented to its creation and it being posted. That means no revenge porn, no sexual content featuring real or realistic renderings of people under the age of 18, and no sexual content of real animals. This includes external links to services where such content is typically hosted (e.g. Session).

No spam or undisclosed bots! Do not use your account to excessively advertise products and services. Do not excessively follow, favorite, boost, or reply to content from other users with the intent of directing more attention to your account. Also, if your account is using bots to generate unique content or interact with other users, you must apply the "bot" label to your account.

advent.social.text: Accounts are approved once two other active members have vouched for that person.
Racism, bigotry, being an asshole, etc, are not allowed. Bans are at the discretion of the admins.

afcolegiado.app.text: El servidor de Mastodon solo estarÃ¡ disponible para los Administradores de Fincas Colegiados (AFC) registrados.
El uso del servidor estÃ¡ sujeto a cumplir con las leyes y normas aplicables en materia de protecciÃ³n de datos, derecho de autor, y cualquier otra regulaciÃ³n relevante.
Los usuarios deberÃ¡n respetar las opiniones y creencias de los demÃ¡s, evitando cualquier tipo de discriminaciÃ³n o acoso.
El contenido compartido en el servidor debe ser apropiado y respetar los derechos de terceros. Cualquier contenido inapropiado serÃ¡ eliminado y el usuario serÃ¡ sancionado.
El uso de la plataforma para fines comerciales estÃ¡ estrictamente prohibido, a menos que sea previamente autorizado por los administradores del servidor.
Los usuarios deben mantener la confidencialidad de cualquier informaciÃ³n privada o confidencial obtenida a travÃ©s del uso del servidor.
Los usuarios deben cumplir con las normas y regulaciones de la profesiÃ³n.
Los administradores del servidor se reservan el derecho de revocar el acceso a cualquier usuario que no cumpla con estas normas de conducta.

agilealliance.social.text: Our moderation policy is based on the Agile Alliance Code of Conduct.
Agile Alliance wants to ensure a respectful, safe, and inclusive environment for everyone whenever and wherever they are participating in Agile Alliance activities.

We do not tolerate harassing or disrespectful behavior, interactions, messages, or images by any participant in any Agile Alliance activity, in any form. This includes business and social activities regardless of location, including online events and spaces.
We encourage everyone to help in creating a welcoming and safe environment. Please report any concerns, harassing behavior, or suspicious or disruptive activity.
Agile Alliance reserves the right to refuse admittance to or remove any person from an activity at any time at its sole discretion.

Learn more about the Agile Alliance Code of Conduct here: 

https://www.agilealliance.org/code_of_conduct/

You MUST be a current Agile Alliance member in good standing, with either an individual membership or part of a corporate membership. If you're not sure about your membership status, you can visit the Agile Alliance website at https://agilealliance.org.

agora-thinktanks.social.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
Do not share false or misleading information
Please understand - you have no privacy on this server or anywhere on Mastodon. It's not designed to be private. Assume that anything you post here, including DMs, is (at least) visible to an admin.

aircrew.rocks.text: Generally: Be excellent to each other!
We do not tolerate harrassment, stalking, and doxxing.
We do not tolerate racism, sexism, verbal abuse, discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or the advocation of any of these.
We do not tolerate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
Do not contact people who made clear they want no contact. This includes dogpiling/brigading.
Posts with sexual content or gore have to be tagged.
Advertisements have to be tagged, and must not be excessive or automated.

Automated posts should be unlisted to keep the local timeline of our instance a place of community dialogue and human interaction. This extends to bots, feed posters, Twitter "retweets" and Twitter crossposts with broken mentions.
Bots may only interact with a user when they're invited by that user to do so.
If you need to post with a high frequency, please set your posts to be unlisted to keep the local timeline readable.

In discussions, please remain civil, do not insult the people you're talking to, and try to avoid irony, sarcasm, or similar modes of language â€“ they typically don't translate well to written language and tend to escalate discussions or misunderstandings.
Cryptographic is harming the planet and the economy. Advertisement for cryptomining, in any form, will lead to a immediate suspension of the account.
Please report behaviour that bothers you. We will keep your report confidential.

airwaves.social.text: Let's make this a reasonable place to enjoy radio hobbies and businesses.

airpollution.science.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, able-ism, xenophobia, etc.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No harassment, dogpiling, or doxxing of other users. If someone wants to disengage, respect that choice.
Please do not share intentionally misleading or false information.

akademienl.social.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, able-ism, etc.
No incitement of violence, promotion of violent ideologies or violent behaviour of any manner.
No doxxing, dogpiling or harassment in any form of other users.
No media and content which is sexual or violent in nature.
No harmful, manipulated, or misleading information (e.g., regarding elections, public health)
In order to be able to moderate this server, posts need to either be written in Dutch or English.

akiba.party.text: Respect boundaries, especially around parasocial interaction. Do not make creepy or uncomfortable comments. Do not orbit around creators irl unless they are explicitly comfortable with it, ie at meet and greets.
Do not ask for pornographic content or paid arrangements from members unless invited.
Sexually explicit or violent media is allowed, but must be marked with a content warning (the CW button) when posting on akiba.party.
Respect creator's wishes around reposting their content, link to the original work when possible. Blatant plagiarism will not be tolerated.
Label sponsored posts or paid advertising with the #ad tag.
No catfishing. Do not impersonate others, or pass off their likeness as your own unless it's parody. Creative edits to one's own likeness are ok.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, ableism, or other forms of bigotry against vulnerable populations.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No harassment, stalking, dogpiling, doxxing, or assault of any kind.
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information.
No content that violates United States laws.

alaskan.social.text: Be a respectful community member, Alaska is a small town!

Misogyny, transphobia, homophobia and any form of harassment and discrimination based on a person's sex, gender identity or sexual orientation will not be tolerated. Misgendering, deadnaming, or promotion of so-called "conversion therapy" is prohibited.
Do not post spam or excessively commercialized content, do not post crypto ads
Ableism and any form of harassment and discrimination on the basis of physical/mental disabilities will not be tolerated.
Extreme depictions of graphic violence, content containing sexual abuse of minors, or unauthorized sexual content are not permitted.
Racist, anti-Indigenous, anti-Black, antisemitic, etc. content , or any form of harassment and discrimination on the basis of culture/background will not be tolerated.

Avoid tone-policing or replies that criticize *how* ideas are presented. This rule is here in part because our server supports Mastodon's move away from patterns of white supremacy and toward vibrant, multiracial community.

allovertheplace.ca.text: No racism, sexism, ableism or pretty much any other ism. Instances who do this are defederated. Users who do this are nuked from orbit.
Trans/homo/otherphobia will be nuked on sight. If it continues, so will you.
I can't control what you do on other instances, but if you have an account on this instance, you will be respectful at all times. Otherwise, you will no longer have an account on this instance.
Don't troll, don't feed the trolls. Just... don't.
Accounts on this server are manually approved. I will not create you an account because I know you. I may deny your request because I know you.
This is a safe instance. If you are not safe here, talk to me. If you make it unsafe here for someone else, I'll be talking to you.
For all other loopholes, use common sense. *Please* use common sense. I don't need the headache.

anarres.family.text: Discrimination & Bigotry Wonâ€™t Be Tolerated. We're not a free speech absolutist. We're not interested in Nazis, TERFS, or hate speech.

Consent is Important in all contexts. If youâ€™re ever unsure, ask first. Use content warnings (CWs) where required.
Openly talking [i.e. without a CW] about lived experiences is encouraged on this server.
Listen; Donâ€™t Make Excuses. If youâ€™re accused of causing harm, either take some responsibility or ask moderators for help.
Please use the report feature if you believe a member is violating any of our rules. We will then investigate. Please be patient, our decision making process (see below) may delay a response.

No Illegal Content: Content that is deemed illegal in Germany or France, or according to European Union Rules & Regulations is not permitted at all on this server. Please report and block any such content coming from other servers and, if needed, block those servers.

anti-social.online.text: We expect you to be decent to others.  You don't have to like other people, but we do not tolerate hate speech, homo/transphobia, fascist rhetoric or anti-science talking points.
You can block people.  If someone posts something you really don't like, block them.  If it is something that goes against the ToS/Rules, report them, then block them.

This server permits NSFW.  That being said, nothing illegal should be posted, and content should be flagged as sensitive.  We do log, and monitor, so if something is posted that shouldn't be, we will pass information to the authorities.

Please use Content Warning liberally.  This means if there is any question if something should have a Content Warning, give it a Content Warning.  Examples include, but are not limited to, mental health, politics, and religion.
Content Warning policy. NSFW and lewd content must be set as unlisted or followers only in addition to proper tagging in the CW.
Don't repost artworks without crediting the artist. If you have a link to their gallery, perfect, if only their name, better than nothing. Claiming other's art as your own may lead to suspension.
Bots must be approved and must be marked as bots after approval.  Failure to do so will result in the account being terminated.
Bots must serve a purpose for the people on the instance. Examples of good bots include posting pictures from NASA, and posting news from local sources.

antisocial.existentialdread.com.text: Posts containing art not owned by the poster must be credited, ideally with a link back to the source.
All posts with images are strongly encouraged to have alternate descriptive text for each image.
No discrimination or harassment, including but not limited to racism, sexism, ableism, homophobia, or transphobia.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
NSFW content should be flagged as sensitive media, and have a content warning. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars, nor header images.
No NFTs, Crypto, or Web3 promotion; NFTs may not be used in profile pictures.

Posts with potentially triggering subjects should contain content warnings. This includes political discourse, insects, war & violence, and NSFW. Spoilers (e.g., for television shows, movies, books, etc.) are strongly recommended to have content warnings.

apobangpo.space.text:
Be a good human!         

Help to make the atmosphere as welcoming and enjoyable as possible for everyone.

18 Years and Over Only!           

You must be 18 years or older to join the Apobangpo.space server. Minors are not allowed.

Community Charter:                          

Read the community charter, which you can find at: https://apobangpo.website/server-rules/

No Hate:                                          

Racism, sexism, misogyny, homophobia, transphobia, ageism, ableism, religious intolerance and other forms of disrespect or aggression are unacceptable.

No Impersonations:      

Please do not create usernames that are direct impersonations of BTS Members or any other individual. eg. Exact celebrity names or the username of well-known bird app accounts that don't belong to you.

Keep Safe:                  

Do practice online safety strategies when using Apobangpo.Space. Do not share personal or private information in public messages or DMs.

No Large Files:                                  
You are welcome upload images, gifs and videos up to 20MB. Please avoid uploading larger files in your Toots. Instead, save them to free storage tool (Google Drive, DropBox, Youtube, Vimeo for example) and link to them.

appellate.social.text: To preserve a friendly space, and to preserve our links with other federated servers, people here will be expected to follow basic rules. Those include:
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information

apricot.social.text: Do unto others as you think they would want done to them.
Mark sensitive content with a content warning.
Gratuitous obscenity that serves no practical benefit to a discussion is not permitted.
Illegal content such as child pornography, unsurprisingly, is not permitted.
Spam is not permitted, this includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services.

Hate speech and abusive or threatening behavior is not permitted, specifically that which directed at any gender, nationality, religion, race, age, pizza topping preference, or sexual identity. One can hate on systemd all day long here.
Lack of a specific rule against a certain behavior does not indicate acceptance of that behavior. Each of us has a limited amount of time in this world. Don't be a jerk.
Violating one or more of these rules may result in an immediate, permanent ban without notice or warning.
You may not impersonate a person or brand without a clear indication the account is unofficial and/or a parody. Parody accounts are permitted, as are legitimate brand accounts.

No attacks against (or from) the instance.
 
 You may not do anything which may impact confidentiality, integrity or availability of apricot.social, the users of the service or their data.

arrrgh.online.text: This instance is actively and strictly moderated. Any racist, sexist, homophobic, antisemitic, transphobic, lookist content will not be tolerated.
Harassment, targeted or not, will not be tolerated. Moderators will not engage in tone policing, though.

art.masto.host.text: No posts or links to content supporting, featuring, or promoting hate groups, terrorism, mass violence or calls to violence.
No targeted misgendering, deadnaming, or promotion of so-called "conversion therapy".

No Hate Speech. Hate speech is defined as derogatory posts or links targeting any individual or group based on race, mental or physical disability, religion, gender identity, sex, nationality, age, class or sexual orientation.
No encouragement or promotion of self-harm.
No threats, bullying or attacks on an individual or group.
No posts or comments supporting or promoting QAnon related content or similarly disproven conspiracy theories.
No visual content depicting animal abuse.
A Content Warning must always be used when posting all other pornographic, erotic or NSFW content, whether photographic, written, drawn or animated.
No posts or links featuring sexualized depictions of minors, whether photographic, written, drawn, anthropomorphic or animated.
No pornography featuring depictions of rape or non-consensual violence.
No visual content depicting executions, murder, suicide, dismemberment, visible innards, excessive gore, or charred bodies. All other violent imagery requires a Content Warning.
No accounts that impersonate anyone else unless clearly marked as such for the purpose of parody.
Banner and Avatar images must comply with the other rules, so no NSFW images etc

artistalley.space.text: Content that is illegal in the United States is prohibited in all cases, including any exclusions in the rules below.

Sexually explicit/gory content is prohibited. This includes avatars, headers, and posts. Artistic nudity and lightly lewd works are allowed, if marked sensitive and tagged with a content warning, even if posted off site.

Sexual/nude/sadistic content of children is forbidden, including loli/shota/guro works. We won't hunt down character ages in your works, but if it's obviously underage, don't post it. Admins may use subjective judgement. (Yes, this includes tropes like the thousand year old god in a child body.)

Harassment, abuse, bullying, doxxing, incitement of dogpiling, incitement of violence/self-harm, etc. are prohibited. If you must call attention to bad behavior, it is allowed as a last resort and when accompanied with evidence, but should not be a regular occurrence.

Hate speech, including racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, and xenophobia is prohibited. Nazi speech and anti-LGBTQ+ speech is expressly forbidden. If these are your views, you are not welcome here.
Posting intentionally false or misleading content such as fake news or passing off others' works as your own is prohibited.

Algorithm-synthesized works (or "AI art") or projects related to cryptocurrencies or NFTs are prohibited, except for use as social commentary on these technologies, or unless you are accepting a cryptocurrency as payment.

Creations must be your own work, or they must be adequately sourced to the original artist/creator. Links to image sites like Imgur or Danbooru are not adequate as a source. Links to a creator's website or social media is acceptable.

While you are encouraged to use this as a social network first and foremost, self-promotion is expressly allowed, as is monetizing your work. In exchange, you agree that the admins are not liable for any lost income if the server is down or if your works are inaccessible.

This server doesn't have unlimited disk space or bandwidth, and abusing those resources (e.g. bypassing CDNs or direct linking to files) is not allowed. This doesn't apply to normal site functions, like posts or accounts getting a lot of attention.

Don't police other people's work. If you see someone breaking the rules, report them to the admins and don't engage with it publicly. Over-reporting someone can constitute harassment. We'll do our best to judge things fairly.

artsio.com.text: Tag sensitive content such as violence/blood, NSFW content, and other potentially upsetting or triggering topics, AND hide them under a Content Warning (CW).

The following content will be removed and will result in revocation of access to the service: sexual depictions of minors (this includes loli), content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism, conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism.

The following content will be removed and may result in account suspension: racism, sexism, discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, ableism, xenophobia and/or violent nationalism, or the advocation of all of the above.
Conduct intended to stalk or harass users, impede users from using the service, degrade the performance of the service, or incite others to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is disallowed.
No reposting other people's work without credit and analysis/opinion.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
Do not share false or misleading information that may lead to physical harm
No NFT content. Please post those on crypto-related instances on the fediverse.
Human art only. If your animal friends can make art then that's ok; but please no AI art.
No flooding the public timelines (making lots of public posts in quick succession).

artsocial.boston.text: Do unto others as you think they would want done to them.
Mark sensitive content with a content warning.
Gratuitous obscenity that serves no practical benefit to a discussion is not permitted.
Illegal content such as child pornography is prohibited.
Spam is not permitted, this includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services.
Hate speech and abusive or threatening behavior is not permitted, specifically that which directed at any gender, nationality, religion, race, age, sexual orientation, or sexual identity.
Lack of a specific rule against a certain behavior does not indicate acceptance of that behavior.
Violating one or more of these rules may result in an immediate, permanent ban without notice or warning.
You may not impersonate a person or brand without a clear indication the account is unofficial and/or a parody. Parody accounts are permitted, as are legitimate brand accounts.
No attacks against (or from) the instance. You may not do anything which may impact confidentiality, integrity or availability of artsocial.boston,  the users of the service or their data.
No posting of copyrighted content (especially photos, artwork, music) that you don't own or have permission to use.
No doxing (aka doxxing) or disclosing personal information without consent and as a means of harassing or causing others to harass another person.
No harassment in the form of continued engagement after a person has requested cessation of engagement. In other words, no means no and stop means stop.
You  shall not do anything on this system that impacts the availability, integrity, and/or confidentiality of any other server or service.
No flooding the public timelines (making lots of public posts in quick succession).

See full Privacy and Terms and Conditions Here:
https://fediverse.how/TOSdocs/TermsOfUse-Privacy-Summary.html

arvr.social.text: No spam, blockchain sales pitches or advertising.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
No violent media. Explicit media must be marked as sensitive when posting.

arthropod.social.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, etc.,
Credit photos, art, and other intellectual property and adhere to the creator's copyright rules (don't post copyrighted material you aren't supposed to!)
Forensic entomologists and anyone working with decaying material - you need to CW your stuff. If it's extremely graphic, you're better off not posting it. Not sure? Check with the mods.

You can post materials of insects/arthropods reproducing or defending territory for scientific purposes, but other than that, no posting of sexually explicit or violent media (absolutely none of that for humans!)
No intentional sharing of false or misleading information. No Pseudoscience.
No illegal activities or discussion of illegal activities on the instance. Keep it clean and arthropod related.
No spamming the instance with selling arthropod-related items.

asbestosden.org.text:
Don't be an asshole.

You can use harsh language, be opinionated, be wrong, be argumentative... I'm very tolerant and forgiving... to a point.

Threats and bullying obviously cross the line. I ask you not try to push to find out where the line is.

Don't post anything that puts me at legal risk.

Media you down hold the rights to should only be illustrative of what you're writing about or a sample within fair use bounds.

I'm not a lawyer, please don't make me have to hire one.

Accounts are for friends or by invitation.

I only will let people/orgs in that I would follow myself. I'm not letting random people in who I don't read myself.

Being a moderator isn't much work if I'm reading everyone's posts anyway.

ashlande.rs.text: This is an invite only instance. Each participant is vetted on an individual basis, and the administration is responsible for their behavior.
Discrimination & Bigotry Wonâ€™t Be Tolerated under any circumstances. We will actively remove any accounts that begin promoting Nazis, TERFS, or hate speech.
Respect Other Users. This instance is meant to be a friendly, welcoming space to all who are willing to reciprocate in helping to create that environment.
Consent is Important in all contexts. If youâ€™re ever unsure, ask first.

ashworth.io.text: If you're Chris, you can post here. If you're not, you can't. Hey Chris, if this is you reading this, here are some rules I (me) think you (also me) should try to follow: try to be compassionate. try not to spend too much energy being snarky (a little is okay). try to be yourself.

assortedflotsam.com.text: No bigotry, discrimination, or hatespeech. Race, religion, gender, sexual orientation, nationality, ethnicity, culture, etc. This instance is inclusive.
No "sex work." Commissioned art is fine.
Self-promotion and spam accounts will be banned immediately. Some minor activity, like for independent artists or non-profits, is permissible.
Bots are allowed, but they may be muted from the public feed if they post excessively or come across as promotional.
NSFW content must be marked. This includes content containing nudity, excess profanity, or extremely graphic imagery.
Be mindful of copyright and fair use when posting content. Flagrant violations will be removed.
Trigger warnings are permitted, but be aware that they are a bad idea. https://www.psychologytoday.com/blog/talking-about-men/201703/trigger-warnings-and-mental-health-where-is-the-evidence
Be careful with how much you reveal about your identity.

astral.camp.text: Zero tolerance for bigotry //  Absolutely zero tolerance for racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or really any kind of being a jerk towards marginalized groups. Absolutely no exceptions. Be good.
No sexually explicit content // This server hosts folks of all ages and preferences. To keep things simple, do not use this space to post sexually explicit content.
Make use of Content Warnings // When discussing sensitive topics or posting pictures that may be difficult for some people, mark your posts as sensitive and use Content Warnings.

Uphold the Camp Standard of Excellence // Our Code of Conduct is called the Camp Standard of Excellence. It summarizes to: donâ€™t be a jerk, instead participate in good faith. Read the full Standard here: https://wiki.astral.camp/excellence

astrodon.social.text: No hate speech, sexism, ableism, homophobia, transphobia, discrimination, or harassment of any kind.

Be respectful and treat others the way you want to be treated. Disagreement and collegiate discussion is acceptable, and rational debate is to be encouraged. Rudeness, insults, exclusion of others, dogpiling, and other anti-social behaviour is not.
No advertising or spam content. It's okay to promote yourself (especially your work and publications!), but not paid products or services.
Public images and media must be annotated. Where the material is not yours, source attribution must be provided, preferably with a link to the original.
No impersonation of others, or false representation of yourself, your credentials, or institutional affiliations.

No shortened links, e.g. bit.ly, t.ly, goo.gl, ift.tt, lnkd.in, is.gd or t.co (These are malicious because link-shorteners track users without their consent and obscure the destination address, which also prevents users from being able to decide whether they want to visit the link beforehand)

Use content warnings to help keep this a stress-free community. You are expected to mark off-topic content with a descriptive CW to allow other community members to engage with it or not. Stressful or triggering content (see community guidelines) must be marked with a content warning.

astronomy.social.text:
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
Rassismus, Sexismus oder Beschimpfungen haben hier nichts verloren.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
You should be older than 16 Years.
Do not share false or misleading information that may lead to physical harm
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
Bots interacting with users without their explicit requests.

asylum.nz.text: Absolutely no arguments for fascism, authoritarianism, nationalism, colonialism, or the promotion of such ideologies and practices related thereto.
No bigotry against minorities or otherwise systemically oppressed groups. This includes (but is not limited to) racism, sexism, castism, queer/transphobia, and ableism.
No propaganda advocating for any of the above. This includes propaganda from the USSR, CCP, DPRK, and IDF. This is also an anticapitalist instance, and capitalist propaganda is also frowned upon.
No targeted harassment or the encouragement thereof, even if you think they deserve it.
No deliberate misinformation, conspiracism, or spam.
For your safety and ours, please do not post about your crimes.
For the comfort and safety of all users, please use content warnings on posts containing references to or depictions of sex, drug use, violence, abuse of any kind, and medical procedures.
It is strongly recommended that you post all media with descriptions. This includes images, videos, and audio.

astrosocial.space.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, casteism or sexually explicit content.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxing of other users. No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information!

async.social.text: No hate speech, harassment, "alt right", homophobic, transphobic, racist, fascist, white supremacist, extremist, violent, intolerant speech or behavior will be tolerated. This is a safe space.
Bots must be flagged as such, and their profile must state who their owner is.
Use content warnings for NSFW & explicit posts.
Nothing illegal in France, or links to something illegal in France ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡·.

atmasto.com.text: Sexually explicit and violent content or other type of content that may shock others must be marked as sensitive.
Disinformation, pseudoscience and/or other conspiracy theories are not welcome and not allowed.

atx.pub.text: Don't be a dick. If you screw up and get called out on it, apologize and move on, and try to learn from it. This one is vague, but as the Supreme Court said, "I know it when I see it." Similarly, try not to take deep offense easily. Reasonable people can disagree without violating this rule.
No spam or advertising. You may promote yourself and causes you care about, but keep it reasonable.

Please make use of content warnings (CW's) where appropriate. Things that should definitely get CWs (but not limited to): violence, trauma, imagery associated with those. Things you can CW (but shouldn't feel pressured to): politics, media, sports?
Absolutely no: bigotry; racism; misogyny; xenophobia; discrimination on the basis of race, ethnicity, nationality, religion, gender, sexual preferences, body type.  (See Rule 1)
No advocacy of violence or inciting violence, including harassment. This one will get you banned quickly.
No commercial bots, follow bots, or any bots that annoy the admins of this instance. If you want to point a bot at us, please make it useful or something that elevates discourse.

Represent Austin well when interacting with the rest of the fediverse. If we get legitimate complaints about a user here from another admin, we will most likely take action to avoid being defederated.

autisticpri.de.text: "Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible." â€“ His Holiness the Dalai Lama.
Since this is a single-person instance, it seems superfluous to add rules here. Are you a fellow instance admin looking to see if this instance will be a problem, here's what you might want to know:
If you follow rules that ensure a safe experience for all participants of the Fediverse, we should get along well.
If you prefer to keep your site un-moderated, or claim "free speech" to try and hide your harassment - let's go our separate ways.
This server is not currently open for registration. Find a server on https://fedi.garden

avgeek.social.text: No spam. Spam is subjective, here are some guidelines. No excessive posts of the same thing with no meaningful updates to the content. One or two "ICYMI" type posts commingled amongst other content (posts/replies/boosts) are OK. No hijacking of conversations through use of unrelated hashtags.
Hate has no home here and is not tolerated.

Post only your own images or those which you have authorization to use. We are registered with the U.S. Copyright Office. Our DMCA Designated Agent Directory number is DMCA-1044225. 512 notices may be submitted to @hello@avgeek.social or via email: jl@quantumparagon.com

awau.social.text: No spamming, harassment, trolling. Nothing illegal. Don't be a dick.
This server is intended to be personal, while sign-ups are allowed on request no guarantees will be made about availability or admin actions.
All 18+ content must be flagged as sensitive, or the user will be marked as forced sensitive. 18+ trends are suppressed from public view and instances dedicated to resharing porn may be limited.

awaymessage.club.text: Be nice. No racism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or any other form of discrimination. In absence of clarity, assume positive intent.

Punch nazis, trebuchet terfs. Any posts or usage which contain nazi symbolism or ideology, or which contain "gender-critical"/"just asking questions" tripe will get you banned immediately and without recourse. Weird pizza toppings are "unpopular opinions", human rights are not.

Be considerate. Respect others that use this service, and keep in mind that any public post you make might show up in the public timelines of this and other instances that federate with awaymessage.club. Use content warnings, use NSFW tags, don't be a jerk about it.

Don't be (outwardly) horny. NSFW isn't banned, but your profile (avatar, header, display name, bio, etc) must be completely safe, or they will be removed. Be courteous with content warnings and don't make them overly explicit.
No monopoly money. You may not use this service to recruit victims to your bitcoin scam. No NFTs, no cryptocurrency peddling, no blockchains, no investment bullshit.
No misinformation. COVID is real, putin is a warmonger, trump lost. Do not use awaymessage.club to spread unverified or false information. If you are joking, use the "misinformation" content warning.

Don't ruin it. awaymessage.club is a freely-provided service. Don't abuse it, don't use it to abuse federated instances, don't try to break things. Don't post or use this service for anything illegal in the US, Scotland, Germany or the EU.

Age restrictions: Newsmast account holders must be at least 18 years old.
Be you: Users are not allowed to assume someone elseâ€™s identity or that of other groups or organisations to mislead people.
Misinformation & Fake news: Do not share false or misleading information, including medical claims that canâ€™t be backed up or manipulating content with intent to mislead.
Defamation: Do not make false statements about others that unjustly harm their reputation.
No hate speech: We donâ€™t allow hate speech or the encouragement of violence for any reason. This includes promotion of so-called 'conversion therapy'.

Abuse, harassment and trolling: Do not harass people or encourage harassment or abuse of any kind, including threats, degrading statements and making private details public without permission. Do not post or comment solely to offend or annoy. This includes targeted misgendering and deadnaming.

Fraud: Do not attempt to generate traffic or revenue from fake lotteries, sweepstakes, giveaways, phishing links, or spamming. Do not use third-party apps to artificially distort your views, likes and comments.
Bot accounts: Bot accounts and other automated feeds must be marked as such, or be deleted. We impose a follow limit of 5,000 profiles and discourage excessive posting.

New users must be known by an existing citizen. This is to cut down on the need to moderate internal users. Everyone has someone else they are accountable to. Existing users can invite anyone they know.

beef.moe.text: Posting of content that violates the laws of the Netherlands (the owner's country) or Germany (hosting country) is strictly forbidden. Users are not permitted to share any material that is illegal in these jurisdictions.
Users are prohibited from engaging in spamming activities, which includes but is not limited to repeatedly mentioning other users, flooding the local timeline, or mass-mentioning users.
All automated accounts must be appropriately labeled as "BOT" accounts.

Any form of racism, sexism, or other types of discrimination is strictly disallowed. Users are expected to refrain from engaging in any behavior that promotes or perpetuates discrimination based on race, gender, or any other characteristic.
NSFW (Not Safe For Work) content is permitted within the Mastodon instance. However, users are required to provide appropriate content warnings when posting such material.
The promotion or endorsement of political extremism is strictly prohibited. Users are not allowed to share content that advocates extreme political ideologies.

Any content related to pedophilia or Minor Attracted Persons (MAP) is strictly prohibited. Violation of this rule will result in an immediate and permanent ban from the Mastodon instance. This is a zero-tolerance policy.
It is imperative for all users to respect the boundaries of others.
Users are strictly prohibited from engaging in doxxing or any unauthorized sharing of personal information without the explicit permission of the individual involved.
Users are prohibited from impersonating others unless the account is clearly labeled as a parody.
Any form of harassment, bullying, or targeted intimidation towards other users is strictly prohibited.
Users should respect copyright laws and refrain from posting content that infringes on the intellectual property rights of others.
Excessive or inappropriate commercial promotion, spamming, or advertising unrelated to the Mastodon instance's focus may be subject to moderation.
Avoid sharing private conversations or screenshots without the explicit consent of all involved parties.
Users should strive to share accurate information and refrain from spreading false or misleading content.
Maintain a respectful and constructive tone in interactions, avoiding excessive profanity or aggressive language.

These rules are may or may not cover all cases, thus a moderator will always have the last say in what goes or not. Generally, if you have to think about whether something crosses a line, it most likely does.

beratna.net.text: The most important rule: Don't Be A Dick.
beratna.net accounts MUST NOT be used for harassment, threat or intimidation, nor to compromise the safety, privacy or quiet enjoyment of any other person or account on this or any other instance.

The following are explicitly not allowed on beratna.net: Nazi symbolism; promotion of fascist, racial supremacist, violent, or hateful ideology or symbolism; willful mis-/disinformation that may harm others. This includes user names as well as profile information, avatars and header images.
No account (whether Person or Bot) may engage in behaviour disruptive to discussion among others; if you are asked to cease an interaction or contact, publicly or personally, you MUST do so.
Graphic sexual, violent, or otherwise disturbing images MUST be accompanied by a content/media warning.
Spam, excessive crossposting/repetition, and intrusive advertising are not allowed.
The admins will enforce these rules; their judgements are final. This includes deletion of accounts and publicly identifying Bad Actors.

bergamot.social.text: Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other peopleâ€™s personally identifying information (â€œdoxingâ€) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.
Do not post adult content, including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention (including sexualized comments or jokes).

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.
Do not debate moderation actions in public toots.
Do not toot in languages other than English (which makes moderation prohibitively difficult).
Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam.
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
Do not â€œshitpostâ€ - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged, there is no place for â€œshitpostingâ€.
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour; criticize ideas, never people.

Do not tone police. Toots may violate the standards of civility we set, but you should not criticize users for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them. In neither case should you criticize their tone.

beyondgender.social.text:
Be queer friendly. 
This is a safe space for trans, nonbinary, intersex, ace, aro, bi, lesbian, gay, and any other person in the queer community.

Be antiracist.
We oppose all kinds of racism including but not limited to antiblackness, antisemitism, and Islamophobia.

Be pro-sex worker. Sex work should be decriminalised and sex workers afforded full employment rights. Advocating for policy that would harm sex workers, such as the Nordic model, will result in a ban. We don't allow the direct advertising or solicitation of full service sex work due to legal issues.
Be inclusive of disabled people. Don't medicalise people's existence. Please include descriptions with images and subtitles on videos.
No cops or border control workers. Doesn't matter if you are a nice person, your job makes people from marginalised communities feel unsafe.
Do not harass anyone or engage in other repeated unwanted interactions.
Include content warnings for explicit or potentially triggering content.

Do not kink shame. People are allowed to express themselves in a judgement-free environment. This does NOT include illegal or harmful content, which will result in a ban if posted, such as depictions of children, race play (see rule 2), or any other fetishisation of marginalised people.
No toxic masculinity or any form of misogyny.
Don't be a dick. This covers anything not explicitly stated by the other rules, but is still in some way harmful or makes life difficult for people.

billys.mom.text: Harassing someone specifically or encouraging others to do so is forbidden. Wishes or hopes that someone suffers physical harm are included. Threatening to use violence or glorifying violence against a person or a group of individuals is prohibited.

Encouragement or threats of terrorism or violent extremism are not allowed. Posts disseminating content by violent extremist or mass violent attack offenders may be deleted. Associated accounts will be removed.
On Billy's Mom, we have no tolerance for the sexual exploitation of children.

It is prohibited to incite violence against or harass anyone based on race, ethnicity, national origin, caste, sexual preference, gender, gender identity, religion, age, disability, or serious illness.
Advocating for or supporting self-harm or suicide is not allowed.

Extremely graphic content and sharing of violent or adult content are not permitted in profile or banner photographs. Adult material IS allowed, on the basis that it is appropriately marked as sensitive content and that it is legal.

You are not permitted to use our service for any illegal actions or to further illegal activities. This covers the provision of certain categories of regulated goods or services as well as the sale, purchase, or facilitation of transactions involving illicit goods or services.
Discourage spreading false content. Post responsibly with credible sources. We use mediabiasfactcheck.com for source credibility. Email support@billys.mom to dispute any hidden sources.

Bots that post spam in Mastodon feeds are subject to limitations on the billys.mom instance. If the posts are not unlisted, the offending bots may be restricted or blocked to maintain the integrity of the community content.

birdbutt.com.text:
Do NOT harass, intimidate, doxx, encourage self-harm, impersonate other individuals/groups, or tangentially participate in/debate these discussions. 
(Report problem post(s) ASAP (do not forward to remote instance) so that they may be reviewed, DO NOT ever interact with them and worsen issue.)
ABSOLUTELY NO: racism, transphobia, homophobia, queerphobia, xenophobia, speciesism, ableism, classism, sexism, ageism, or fascism.

If it's illegal in the US or EU, do not post or share it. (if it's illegal in your specific region but legal elsewhere within US/EU - post at your own discretion). If you have to ask yourself, CW it or don't post it at all.

Put any & all "NSFW" / "18+" / "adult only" content (media, text) behind a CW (Content Warning) with an appropriate label / description. CWs are used for SFW purposes too so please clarify but it does not need to be grotesque either.
No spam, NFT/crypto BS. No blatant misinformation/conspiracies/False flag operations.

bitforged.social.text: Above all else, be respectful and kind to the people you come across on The Fediverse - this not only applies to people on BitForged Social, but to anyone you encounter on remote instances.

Any posts that contain links, or media, that might be unsuitable for public viewing must be tagged with a Content Warning.
Do not post, or propagate, content that is illegal in the US - along with most other common jurisdictions.
No flame-wars. Everyone is subject to their own opinions (so long as those opinions do not intend to cause harm to others). But the moment a discussion becomes "heated", then you should disengage.
If you see something that breaks these rules, or otherwise looks out of place, please report it!

blat.at.text: Disruptive users will be removed. Probably without warning.

Users posting any content that goes against the spirit of the Mastodon Server Covenant will be removed. In summary: no racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, white supremacy, or otherwise being a jerk.
Be excellent to each other. If you are not excellent to others, see rule 1.

Any and all federated instances which act as any kind of a haven for the kind of jerks who'd be covered under rules 2 and 3 will be summarily blocked. This doesn't mean an instance with one jerk gets canned, but does mean that they run the risk of being so canned if they don't deal with jerks.

blimps.xyz.text: You must be 18 years of age or older. No exceptions will be granted for "age of consent" or similar for your region. If discovered a minor, your account will be suspended.
No bigotry is permitted. We do not tolerate hate speech of any kind, including transphobia, homophobia, Islamophobia, or any other facet of one's being.
Be respectful: Treat others with respect. Assume good faith with everything. Text has limited ability to convey intent; be kind with yours.
NSFW or kink-driven content must be behind a CW giving a short summary of the content (e.g. "NSFW Art, inflation"), while ensuring media is marked as 'sensitive'
Zero tolerance for attacks. Harassing other users, whether on this instance or another, is cause for immediate suspension of your account.
Copyrighted content may only be shared in fair use contexts. Basically, if it would earn a DMCA takedown request filed against us, don't post it directly.

Take care in sharing sensitive information. While the admins here simply don't have the time nor interest to pry in the database, law enforcement could still have access as your messages are not encrypted at rest, same as nearly all other platforms. When in doubt, use a private messaging platform.

bobs.social.text: Exercise common sense, good judgment, and respect for others
Racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia is not permitted and will be actively moderated
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
Do not post any content that is confidential.
Do not post any content in a way that will infringe third-party rights, e.g. by publishing trademarked or copyrighted material owned by others without their permission.
Include a disclaimer when posting personal opinions and views that could violate laws, contracts, or policies
Avoid attributing personal opinions to your employer (e.g. "opinions are my own and do not reflect those of my employer")
Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting. Reconsider posting this content here.

bog.social.text: This might seem obvious to say, but don't break any laws here, and don't encourage others engage in illegal activity.

No harassment, for any reason. Harassment includes but should not be considered to be limited to: deliberate intimidation or targeting individuals in a manner that makes them feel uncomfortable, unwelcome, or afraid.

If you're asked to stop any harassing behavior, you are expected to do so immediately. Anyone can report harassment. If you are being harassed, notice that someone else is being harassed, or have any other concerns, you should report it.

Use Content Warnings. While this isn't an "adult-oriented" instance, for the moment we also aren't disallowing adult content of various types. Be polite, use Content Warnings, and (at minimum) mark it 18+.

Linking to illegal content, Spam, Advertising, Malware and such like are not allowed, and will get your account suspended. This does not mean you cannot organically promote your work or the work of friends.
Don't attempt to impersonate anyone, especially organizations, institutions, or famous people. Doing so will get your suspended.

boing.world.text:
This is not an open-invite server.

You must already know someone on this instance, or have been to the event, or be from the fabled old place.

You must tell us who you already know to register, and we will actually check. So it might take a day or two, unless you are at the event.
No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No harassment, or incitement, or spam.
Just generally be chill, you know. This is a place for making friends and joking about not for making enemies and having arguments.

If you want Free Speech run your own server. This is /community moderated/ speech.

We will kick you off if you are too embarrassing, but also block other servers to defend you from anyone harassing you.
Do not copy any content from this server to any server or system owned or operated by Facebook, Meta, Instagram, Threads or any associated enterprise.

boldcity.social.text: Be respectful and courteous to all users.

Hate speech, discrimination, harassment, bullying and abusive/threating behavior will not be tolerated, specifically that which is directed at any race, color, religion, sex (including sexual orientation or gender identity), nationality, age, or disability.

Do not post illegal content or content that promotes illegal activities. This includes but is not limited to piracy, hacking, and drug use. It is your responsibility to ensure that the content you post is legal.

Posting or sending spam is not permitted. This includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services and utilizing direct message and tagging to send spam.
Respect the privacy of other users. Do not post personal information about others without their consent.

Use content warnings when appropriate. This includes sensitive content and topics such as violence, graphic content, and NSFW material. Accounts that are dedicated to posting sensitive content are not permitted. Repeat violations of this rule will result in suspension.

Accounts that impersonate a person, brand, or entity are not permitted, unless they clearly indicate in their bio AND account display name that the account is unofficial and/or parody. Accounts that cause confusion from other users may be disabled at the discretion of the admins.

Brand and entity accounts are permitted but are required to follow all rules. As it can be challenging to confirm the legitimacy of brand and entity accounts, it is suggested that you contact the admins prior to creating such accounts.
Do not create multiple accounts for the purposes of ban or suspension evasion. Please tag bot or alt accounts with your primary account.

Violation of the rules (or any action that is determined by the moderation team to be not permitted) will result in suspension or ban, potentially without notice or warning. You may appeal a moderator action but decisions by admins are final.
Please see the About page for a more detailed list of policies, rules, and information about this instance.

bongo.social.text: Respect the laws of Tanzania and adhere to guidelines regarding hate speech, defamation, and any other local regulations.

Engaging in threatening, abusive, intolerant, or illegal behavior is strictly prohibited and may result in moderation or further actions. We maintain a zero-tolerance policy towards racism, sexism, homophobia, and transphobia. Moderation decisions are final.
Please use the Content Warning flag for NSFW (Not Safe For Work) content, and mark NSFW media as sensitive.

Account registrations are monitored closely. Spam accounts (including commercial advertising, political campaigning/propaganda, duplicate accounts, or impersonating legal entities) will be moderated or removed.
Harassment or bullying of other users will not be tolerated.
Do not share illegal or copyrighted content.
Spamming or engaging in any form of malicious activity is strictly prohibited.
Maintain civil and respectful discussions. Refrain from using derogatory language or participating in personal attacks.
Respect the privacy of others and avoid sharing personal information without their explicit consent.
When posting potentially sensitive or triggering content, use appropriate tags and content warnings.
If you observe a violation of these rules, promptly report it to the moderation team.
To use our service, you must be at least 18 years old.
By following these guidelines, we aim to create a welcoming and respectful environment for all members of our community at Bongo Social.

Automated and Bot accounts must be labeled as such. If the account will be regularly posting more than 3 times a day, posts should be set as Unlisted by default to prevent clogging up the Local timeline.

byteheaven.net.text:
No racim, sexim, transphobia, or other celebration of prejudice.
It's OK and even normal to have prejudices, but act like a douche and you're out.

No Nazi or fascist stuff.
Oppressive authoritarian government is bad.

Porn. Consensual, legal, non-stolen erotica is OK behind a NSFW or similar tag. No gore. This isn't a porn server, but we're not going to go handing out bans because picture contained a nipple or something kinky turns up in "Federated." Because of this, grown-ups only on this server pls.
No paedo shit. Note that this completely covered under "no unethical or illegal" etc etc but repeated here because zero tolerance.
If you can't make your point with logic, step off. Sure, we all rant sometimes, but shouting at someone is almost never the answer.

Behave ethically. If this doesn't appeal to you, you don't belong here.

Scams and harassment, for example, are unethical. Most of the other rules are just examples of this one, expanded as individual rules so that simpleminded fediblock users from other sites won't block us out of hand.
Don't do illegal stuff, even if your cause is righteous. This makes the moderators and other users accessories unless/until they rat you out. It is impolite to incriminate your friends.

c.im.text: Respect the laws of the Netherlands and the Isle of Man, including those related to hate speech and defamation.

Threatening, abusive, intolerant or illegal behavior may lead to moderation and/or further measures. We have a zero tolerance approach to racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia. Moderation decisions are final.
The Content Warning flag should be used for NSFW content, and NSFW media should be marked as sensitive.

Account registrations are monitored and accounts considered spam (including commercial advertising, political campaigning/propaganda, duplicate accounts or impersonating legal entities) will be moderated or removed.
Do not harass or bully other users.
Do not share illegal or copyrighted content.
Do not spam or engage in any form of malicious activity.
Keep discussions civil and respectful, and refrain from using derogatory language or engaging in personal attacks.
Do not reveal personal information about other people without their consent.
Use appropriate tags and content warnings when posting potentially sensitive or triggering content.
If you see a violation of these rules, report it to the moderation team.
To use our service, you are at least 18 years old.

c18.masto.host.text: Racism, antisemitism, sexism, casteism, homophobia, transphobia, and harassment of any kind will not be tolerated. Hostile and spam instances will be blocked.

Please feel free to mute (you don't see them) or block (they don't see you either) freely. If a hostile or spam user/instance appears, please submit a report to your admin. Report harassment immediately.
Fill out your profile when you join. When you follow someone, they should be able to see something about you.
Use the CW button broadly for shocking, potentially annoying, or repetitive content. Include a caption for all images. (Please do not ask others to CW experiences of discrimination.)
Don't post lists of users that they have not opted into, or repost content you see here on other sites. Avoid using asterisks or euphemisms, which get around people's blocked and muted terms.

In order to join this server, you should provide a brief explanation of why you are joining this particular server, not just why you are leaving another social media site. Why is c18.masto.host right for you?

cavalina.net.text: Stay legal. Respect international laws, from the country the instance is run in (USA), laws from the admins' country (USA), and from your own country.
Be respectful. Donâ€™t go insulting others, whether you say it straight to their face or not.
Be respectful. Content that is spammy, racist, sexist, hateful, or discriminating in any way is forbidden.
Be respectful. "Screenshot dunking", or taking screenshots of posts to repost, is strongly discouraged, and may lead to admin action.
Content Warning policy. CW drugs and lewd posts and pictures, kinks must be listed in the CW.
Content Warning policy. Politics, religion, and other polemical subjects must be CW accordingly.

Accounts policy. Do not impersonate someone, unless for parody purposes (Remaining respectful). Parody accounts must be tagged as such clearly in their profile description. This includes using other peoples' artworks without permission.
Don't post artwork without crediting the artist. If you have a link to their gallery, perfect, if only their name, better than nothing. Claiming other's art as your own may lead to suspension.

catcatnya.com.hint:
This applies especially for discrimination towards marginalized folks and groups. This includes, but is not limited to:

Racism, xenomisia, homomisia, transmisia, and other queermisia, gatekeeping the "queer" status, classism/casteism, ableism, anti-semitism, islamomisia.

Note that preferring a marginalized group over a less- or non-marginalized group is explicitly done to counteract discrimination, and, as such, is not discrimination on its own.
We want this site to stay online, and as such, we have to follow applicable laws. We will not follow any other (therefore non-applicable) laws, however, as we aren't legally required to do so.

This includes, among the obvious ones, certain popular meme formats, such as the Wojak (including its related NPC meme) and Pepe the Frog.

This point will be evaluated on a case-by-case basis, but at the very least, we will attempt to educate in case of unintentional usage.

Fund raisers, mutual aid, artists doing commissions, or individuals advertising their services are fine. That's because they aren't soulless businesses and corporations. Those we will suspend (remote ones too).
This includes obvious topics such as gore, sexual content, assault, mental health issues, but also less obvious ones like food, selfies, media with eye contact to the viewer, "AI", etc.

Posting media without media descriptions, also known as alt text, is strongly discouraged. If you're unable to think of alt text for an image, please ask a third party (or us, via DMs!) to help you with alt text.

Constantly ignoring the need for alt text counts towards the discrimination rule.

Sharing private information for no good reason (for petty reasons or over non-severe wrongdoings) is forbidden. This includes doing that outside of our instance, as this type of behaviour is great at disrupting safe spaces.

We don't particularly like "AI", but banning it entirely is impossible.

Therefore, it must be labelled. Any post with LLM-output text (such as by "GPT" models) or Diffusion-output imagery (such as by "Stable Diffusion" models) not under a CW will face at least deletion. Repeat offenses will have their authors face suspension.

ccrvb.com.text: No overtly racist language, even in jest. You only get one warning, then may be banned.
Polite political discourse is allowed, but if it devolves beyond polite, mods will warn, then may take further action upon multiple offenses.
Don't be a dick.  We won't strictly enforce this, but if you're a dick, people generally won't want to interact with you.  Repeat troublemakers may be banned by Admin.
While NSFW content is not outright banned, we ask you please tag any such content as such, and keep it classy, eh?  If it goes beyond common decency, you will be warned.
Don't repeatedly piss off the mods/admins.  This should be a given, but we're human, and we can only take so much. (This ties to Rule #3)

cdrum.social.text: This is a single user server.

ceilidh.online.text:
Do not engage in hate speech of any kind
Any post that contains hateful language meant to demean or harm another user or group of people will not be tolerated and your account and IP will be banned for doing so.  We are not a government so don't even try to claim First Amendment rights.

Use CW at your discretion to help protect the community at large
It is expected that you can self-edit and place sensitive posts behind a CW. Warnings will be given for non-compliance and further action will be taken if the issue persists.

Please report issues to the Admins and Moderators and let us take care of them
Please do not act as an admin or moderator if you are not.  Instead, report adverse activity so the team can handle it properly as well as make reports to other admins.

Violence against any member of this or other instances will result in your account being banned
If this is not clear enough for you then maybe this isn't the instance for you.  Violent and threatening speach will not be tolerated against anyone on the Fediverse and will result in an immediate ban.

Talk, Share, Intermingle, and Have Fun!
This server is meant to be a place where we can have all sorts of discussions and share our moments.  Please keep that in mind when you post.

Please submit missing language translations to mods and admins
This system is translation-enabled using libretranslate.  If you are unable to translate a post please share that post with a mod or admin so we can add the language pack to the system.

We Are a Safe Place for the LGBTQIA+ Community
You are safe here.  The admin and mod team are hand-picked to be sensitive to our community and we will do everything we can to make sure you will be comfortable here.  Anyone that is not part of the LGBTQIA+ community or an ally need not apply.

No Discrimination Allowed, EVER!
We welcome all races, ethnicities, genders, etc. as long as you follow the rules.  We are stronger through diversity and through diversity we understand our selves better.

This Instance Honors Reports from Fediblock
Instances reported to the Fediblock hashtag are reviewed throughout the day and added to our filters to help ensure the content here is not pluted by hatred and bigotry.

New Account Requests Must Have a Meaningful Reason
When requesting a new account you must include a meaningful reason for joining this server.  Requests that only have a word or two in the reason, or the reason does not make sense will be rejected.

celsius.letemps.social.text: Treat others as you would like to be treated.
Mark sensitive content with a content warning.
Gratuitous obscenity that serves no practical benefit to a discussion is not permitted.
Illegal content such as child pornography is prohibited.
Spam is not permitted, this includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services.
Hate speech and abusive or threatening behavior is not permitted, specifically that which directed at any gender, nationality, religion, race, age, sexual orientation, or sexual identity.
Lack of a specific rule against a certain behavior does not indicate acceptance of that behavior.
Violating one or more of these rules may result in an immediate, permanent ban without notice or warning.
You may not impersonate a person or brand without a clear indication the account is unofficial and/or a parody. Parody accounts are permitted, as are legitimate brand accounts.
No attacks against (or from) the instance. You may not do anything which may impact confidentiality, integrity or availability of artsocial.boston, the users of the service or their data.
No posting of copyrighted content (especially photos, artwork, music) that you don't own or have permission to use.
You shall not do anything on this system that impacts the availability, integrity, and/or confidentiality of any other server or service.
No flooding the public timelines (making lots of public posts in quick succession).
See full Privacy and Terms and Conditions Here: https://fediverse.how/TOSdocs/TermsOfUse-Privacy-Summary.html

chitter.xyz.text: This is a safe and welcoming community. Abusive or antisocial behaviour will not be tolerated.
