circumstances.run.text: We're all free speech absolutists here, and by that we mean there are things in your free speech that we absolutely won't allow. Specifically â€”
No bigotry allowed. Discriminatory language, racism, misogyny, ableism, homophobia and transphobia are right out.
No fascism. No nazism. No genocide denial. No genocide apology. Simple as.
That being said, we're quite reasonable â€”
We encourage you to be kind to your fellow sentients, use content notes liberally (at your discretion), listen first, act second and do your best.
Your well-being is important. Filter, mute and block when needed. Report infractions when possible, but don't make it your duty.

Addendum: we're following Mona Eltahawy's Civility Principle here and therefore do not enforce purity of language. Readers disgusted by the word â€œfuckâ€ can fuck right off, in the most kind meaning of the phrase.

citydweller.social.text: If you sign up here you commit to - No harassment against other users. - No harassment against homosexual, bisexual, pansexual, antisexual, heterosexual and transsexual and transvestite users. - No harassment against any ethnicity.

This service is offered as-is - there is no obligation of the owner and maintainer of this service to run and maintain it. The owner does the best of efforts to answer any questions.
The owner reserves the right to deny any application of membership.

Don't use a @t-online.de mail address. Deutsche Telekom refuses willingly and unruly against all standards incoming mail from my servers.

Bitte keine @t-online.de - Adresse benutzen da die Deutsche Telekom standardwidrig alle Mails meiner Infrastruktur ablehnt.

cityofchicago.live.text: No gore or graphic violence (unless it pertains to a news story)
No automated spam (friendly bots are fine)
Accounts only created to post pornographic content are not permitted

clar.ke.text: Don't do anything that will get the admins in trouble

clacks.link.text: Don't get me in trouble with the law or my network provider
Don't embarrass me in front of the other Mastodon admins
You're in my house; Don't give me a reason to kick you out
If you cause problems, I will deal with you based on my perception of the severity.

This could be anywhere from [telling you to knock it off] up to [deleting your account and everything associated with it, blocking your IPs at the firewall, and reporting you to your ISP and law enforcement].
Please don't make me do the latter. Seriously.
No RSS-feed bots not related to a Clacks user.
No purely advertising accounts (advertising your own things, provided it's not _all_ you do, is fine).
All explicit sexual or violent content should be behind a CW
No racism or advocation of racism
No sexism or advocation of sexism
No discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

cleverdevil.club.text: This instance is just for me. That's the only rule.

clj.social.text: Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other peopleâ€™s personally identifying information (â€œdoxingâ€) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.
Do not post adult content, including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention (including sexualized comments or jokes).

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as is any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on â€” just keep the toot itself interesting).

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the clj.social community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.
Do not â€œshitpostâ€ - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged, there is no place for â€œshitpostingâ€ on clj.social.
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour; criticize ideas, never people.

Do not tone police. Toots may violate the standards of civility we set on clj.social, but you should not criticize users for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them. In neither case should you criticize their tone.
Do not debate moderation actions in public toots. If you disagree with how a moderator enforced this CoC you may direct-message the moderation team or email team@clj.social.

cliff.social.text: Please treat your fellow tooters with respect.

climatejustice.rocks.text: ğŸš« Please move somewhere else. This server shuts down by the end of 2024.

climatejustice.global.text: Before signing up please read the full set of principles, rules and guidelines at https://climatejustice.global/about
We stand for climate justice, which includes justice for all marginalized people as well as other living beings and we stand against discrimination and exploitation.
We consider ourselves on the left side of the political spectrum and stand up against right wing ideologies.
We believe the Fediverse should be a place for respectful discourse and we stand against harassment, trolling and spam.
We stand up for peace and against violence, oppression and authoritarianism.
We stand behind the science and against fake-news & propaganda.
Also, we stick to Austrian and EU law and we don't post pornography.

Principles, rules and guidelines may change at any time and sanctions may be applied according to rules that have not been written yet at that time, but of course never without justification. Appeal is always possible.

climatejustice.social.text: Before signing up please read the full set of principles, rules and guidelines
We stand for climate justice, which includes justice for all marginalized people as well as other living beings and we stand against discrimination and exploitation.
climatejustice.social.hint: We are allies to disabled people, queer and lgbtqia* people, BIPoC, women, poor people, kids and future generations as well as other vulnerable groups including animals, plants and all living beings. We might be critical to religion in general, but stand up against antisemitism, islamomisia and other forms of discrimination due to religious background. We acknowledge our own privileges and work on our own unintentionally discriminatory behaviors. We are all part of an exploitative system and it's impossible to live within that system without harming anyone. We are aware of that and try to work against it, but we are not all fossil free and vegan and that's okay. We don't exclusively post about climate justice, but at least some of our posts should be about climate justice.

climatejustice.social.text: We consider ourselves on the left side of the political spectrum and stand up against right wing ideologies.
climatejustice.social.hint: We have different political views, but are all on the left side or at least are left-open, but right-closed centrists. We stand together against capitalism and fascism and even if we disagree on important issues we don't loose sight of our common goals.

climatejustice.social.text: We believe the Fediverse should be a place for respectful discourse and we stand against harassment, trolling and spam.
climatejustice.social.hint: Everybody's boundaries are to be respected.

climatejustice.social.text: We stand up for peace and against violence, oppression and authoritarianism.
climatejustice.social.hint: We are pacifists, but acknowledge that when attacked, people have the right to defend themselves following international law. We may be critical of states in general, but we never deny any country their statehood. We condemn violence against innocent people and always show solidarity with victims of violence. We don't promote violence in protest, but peaceful sabotage against oppressors is not violence.

climatejustice.social.text: We stand behind the science and against fake-news & propaganda.
climatejustice.social.hint: We are not all scientists ourselves and experts in every field we post about, but we try not to spread any false information. If possible we provide reliable sources. We don't spread unverified rumors.

climatejustice.social.text: Also, we stick to Austrian and EU law and we don't post pornography.
We try to follow the following guidelines
climatejustice.social.hint:
If you can, please provide media descriptions if you post images or videos. There is a "caption" field available for that once you add media to a post you create. If you can't (atm) write a caption for whatever reason, that is okay - nobody should force or shame you. But if possible then please add the hashtag #AltForMe so someone else may write a caption for your media.

Please try to use CamelCase in your hashtags to make them more readable (also for screenreaders). Camel Case means you capitalize each first letter of a word when the hashtag consists of more than one word (or a not very common compound word).

Try not to overdo it with emojis, as they are each read out loud by screenreaders and that can be really annoying to hear, especially since some emojis are represented by a lot of text.

Please try to use the content warning (CW) feature when you write about something that might upset someone. We don't provide any rules as to what type of content should be hidden behind a CW, but try to think for yourself.

Please also hide media that might be upsetting as "sensitive".

If there is any way, please try to avoid linking to websites that violate visitors' privacy. Sometimes you'll find the same content you want to link to on a privacy respecting website or there is a proxy/mirroring service or archive available. If you can't find an alternative please make sure you don't post a shortened url, so people know what they click on.

Principles, rules and guidelines may change at any time and sanctions may be applied according to rules that have not been written yet at that time, but of course never without justification. Appeal is always possible.

cloudycrux.es.text: Don't be an asshole. Show respect to all members of the Mastodon server. Harassment and bullying are not allowed in any form and will result in being removed from this instance.
We do not allow discussion of anything that relates to breaking real-world laws.
Adult content and/or sensitive content must be tagged as CW with appropriate tags
Profile names or pictures containing adult or offensive material will be asked to be changed.

cloudisland.nz.text: No adult content, including nudity, pornography, sexually explicit content, gore, or extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions.
No racism, sexism, casteism, ableism, anti-semitism, islamophobia, or the advocation thereof,
No distribution of content harmful to the public good, such as antivaxx or climate denial.
No discrimination against gender or sexual minorities, or the advocation thereof.
No xenophobic or nationalist content, including nationalistic symbolism and perpetuating nationalistic disinformation
No content that is objectionable, per the Films, Videos, and Publications Classification Act (1993).
No harassment (See full Code of Conduct)
No content that is in breach of Aotearoa New Zealand court-mandated suppression orders.

clq.im.text: This is a single-user instance consisting of only me (clq). Anything I post or boost will conform to the rules below, though this does not mean that I'd expect the same from anyone I follow.
Explicit posts, if any, will be extremely rare, but anything explicit will be marked as sensitive and/or have a CW

Politics or news/topics that can be triggering or distressing will be behind a CW. I'm happy to be called out on anything that may be seen as political that I've not defined as such, or anything else that could be triggering.

No hate-speech, including but not limited to racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia. For the avoidance of doubt, this includes any misgendering, and questioning the validity of or joking about trans/gender issues.

In general, I'll try to be decent. In this corner of the internet I respect people's right to feel comfortable with what they read over my right to say/post it. Any input, or feedback on whether I've breached the definition of "decent" will be appreciated, and received and considered respectfully.

collapsible.systems.text: Racism, fascism, gender discrimination: You will not engage in or promote any form of fascism, racism or gender discrimination, and will be proactive in reporting it if encountered.

comics.town.text: Comics Town is a place where anyone interested in making comics can come to share their work, connect with other creators, and learn.  To grow a safe, inclusive community, the following rules are in place:
Harassment, hate speech, dog-piling, doxxing, and similar behaviors are not welcome.
Comics Town is a welcoming environment for LGBTQIA+ , PoC and Indigenous creators.  Moderation decisions will be made with this as a priority.
Explicit content should use the Content Warning feature.
Promotional posts are allowed, but should be in healthy balance with interaction with the community.
Non-comics content is allowed, but please keep fandom discourse to a respectful dull roar.

No AI Generated Content:
AI-derived work will be deleted and repeat offenders will lose their Comics Town accounts.

coywolf.social.text: Follow the Golden Rule: Treat others the way you want to be treated
No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.

No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.

No spam. This includes commercial advertising, promotional campaigns, and SEO.
No impersonation of other individuals, public figures or organisations, unless clearly marked as a parody.

cr8r.gg.text: Be Kind and Respectful. Don't be racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist, fatphobic, etc.

cr8r.gg.text: Must consider others at all times.
cr8r.gg.hint:

Your posts should be a representative of you (whether thats from your likes, opinions, personality), don't just echo it from elsewhere.
If you must include other peoples content then please make sure to credit them appropriately whenever possible.
This includes mass mentioning, timeline flooding, constant follow/boost requests, commercial/product advertising or promotional campaigns, etc.

cr8r.gg.text: No impersonation of an entity or another individual.
cr8r.gg.hint: Your identity must be your own, whether this is yourself or your online persona. Business/corporate, automated & bot accounts are not permitted to join unless for support purposes only and have explicit authorisation from ourselves.

cr8r.gg.text: Do not attempt to disrupt or spoil others' experiences.
cr8r.gg.hint: This includes misusing the reporting, CW or any other systems of the fediverse.

creature.social.text: Be respectful and kind to others. No harassment, hate speech, discrimination, or bullying of any kind.

Report any violations or issues to the @stuffie@creature.social. They have the final say on enforcing the rules and resolving disputes.

cubhub.social.text: No minors. This is an adult instance and minors are not allowed. You must be 18+ to join and interact.
No cub/child porn. No porn depicting any underage character in a sexual situation or in the presence of one is allowed. Cub/child nudity with exposed genitalia is similarly not allowed.
No zoophilia. Do not post art depicting any animal in a sexual situation. Quadruped characters with full human mental faculties are fine.

Use content warnings (CW's) for your posts when appropriate. If discussing topics such as politics, current events, mental health, plot spoilers, extensive descriptions of sex/kink, or other subjects users may find objectionable or triggering, you must content warn it and tag it appropriately.

Use content warnings (CW's) for your sensitive media. Any media that features nudity/yiff/heavy kink/impact play & spanking/material with the intent to arouse, alcohol/drug use, violence/gore, or other objectionable/triggering content must be tagged with a content warning. Leaking/messy diapers must be CW'd.

Use content warnings (CWs) for all story posts. As CubHub has a 100k character limit, stories can be posted inline within posts. Please use content warnings for all story posts even if it's SFW. This is just so people can know what to expect from your story before reading!

No NSFW banners or avatars. Banners and avatars that display nudity, yiff, erections under clothing, or other sexual material, or themes users may find objectionable are not allowed. If you could have it on a badge or dress that way at a convention, it can be in your avatar/banner.

No harassment. Do not call out, demean, or harass a member of this or any Fediverse community. To that end, if an issue arises with another Fediverse user, please contact the moderation staff directly or use the report feature.

No illegal content. Do not post copyrighted material without permission from the content owner, do not post threats of violence against an individual, and do not post any content that would be deemed illegal for our server to host within the jurisdiction of the United States.

Artwork posted must be yours or have consent from the original artist. If you post the artwork of another artist, you must have their consent for it to be posted and you must include credit to the artist who drew it. If using stickers, the credit can be included in the image description

No hate speech. This includes but isn't limited to hate towards race, religion, spirituality, sexualities, or gender identities. Promotion of hateful ideologies such as Nazism, the Confederacy, MAGA, or Blue Lives Matter is also considered hate speech. Any hate speech will result in an immediate ban.
No disinformation. Do not spread disinformation about elections, current events, COVID-19, 5G, vaccines, etc.

No spam. While advertising yourself is allowed, please do not repeatedly spam advertisements for your services or commissions. Crypto, NFTs, and advertisements for sex work are entirely banned, do not post or boost them.
Bot and parody accounts must be labelled as such. Additionally, bot accounts that affect server performance will be immediately removed.

Media that is entirely AI-generated must be CW'd, and all works featuring AI-generated content must include the tools used to generate it in the message body. This does not include works that use AI as reference material or AI removal tools such as Magic Eraser.

cutie.city.text: No hate speech, discrimination, and/or bigotry. This includes racism, sexism, ableism, homophobia, transphobia, TERFery, SWERFery, xenophobia, and anything else along those lines.
Respect other people and their boundaries. No harassment, unwanted advances, sealioning, trolling, bullying, dogpiling, doxxing, outing, stalking, or anything else along those lines.
NSFW posts are allowed, but ONLY behind a content warning, and NSFW media must be marked as sensitive. Nonconsensual content and sexual depictions of minors are strictly forbidden.
No spamming, excessive/paid advertising, mass-marketing, or using irrelevant hashtags for visibility purposes. Self-promotion is allowed and encouraged - but be yourself, not a "brand".
Don't share misleading information. This includes propaganda, conspiracy theories, promotion of cryptocurrency/NFTs, COVID denialism, deceitful impersonation, and anything else like that.
Don't incite violence, promote toxic ideologies, or link to any sources that do so. This includes religious fundamentalism, left-wing authoritarianism, and essentially anything right-wing.
Don't post any illegal content or otherwise break any applicable laws, including (but not limited to) U.S. copyright law. When in doubt, always ask for consent and/or provide attribution.
Do your part to keep Cutie City a friendly, accessible, and cozy space. Use CWs on posts that others may not want to see/read. Include alt text on images/videos. Be excellent to each other.

This server is for d3photography.com, it's products, and it's partners and NCAA Div III member schools and conferences. 

Any accounts that are made by others outside of those are likely to be deleted without warning.

You do NOT need an account on our instance to see posts. We recommend joining another instance and then following the accounts here. 

Non-school/program accounts will be rejected as outlined in rule #1.

daedal.io.text: All potemtially NSFW media must be behind a CW (Content Warning) when posting
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, or discrimination based on physical appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, or religion
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No holocaust denialism, Nazi symbolism, or promotion of National Socialism
No ableist language or rhetoric that discriminates against disability
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information

d3f4ult.space.text: Try to avoid sexually explicit or violent media but if you must post it then the post must be marked as sensitive when posting.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism. We are all creators and should be honored for the creative folks that we are.
No Incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
No illegal content. If it is illegal in Memphis, TN don't post it here.
You are culturally Memphis if you can UN-ironically say "Memphis as Fuck." about yourself.

dagegenbewegen.social.text: Keine Diskriminierung von geschlechtsspezifischen und sexuellen Minderheiten

dan.mastohon.com.text: The first rule is that if you're using this server, you should be me, Dan Hon.

daotodon.me.text: Speak with Clarity and Avoid Abstractions.
In successful Collaborations, Judgment Gives Way to Curiosity.

Anyone Might Be Asked to Move His/Her Account Away From This Server if His/Her Content Threatens the Visibility of Others in the Community (eg Through Other  servers Threatening to Remove Our Federation).

darkmoon.social.text:
Be Kind

- Do not post content that is intended to abuse, harass, intimidate, or otherwise harm other persons.

No Spamming

- Mass advertisements or solicitations via direct message are not allowed

Do Not Infringe Copyright

- Please do not post copyrighted images or other media. Instead, link to them from another service.

This is a Private Service

- darkmoon.social reserves the right to deny, suspend, or terminate service to anyone, for any reason, and at any time, with or without prior notice.

Thems the rules

- Please respect them.

darktundra.xyz.text: Treat others respectfully: Refrain from any form of insult, bullying or discrimination, including but not limited to racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, anti-Semitic and misogynistic remarks or actions toward others.
Use an appropriate tone: Use a respectful and friendly tone, even if you disagree with someone.
Respect the privacy of others: Do not share personal information without explicit permission and respect the privacy rights of others.
Compliance with applicable law: Do not post illegal content.
Avoid misinformation: Do not share false or misleading information.
No spam posts: Refrain from posting unsolicited advertisements or similar content that does not fit the community.

Mark sensitive content (CW): Please mark any content that may contain common triggers, is sexually explicit or violent as sensitive (CW) to ensure the safety of other members. Note: Accounts that exclusively post such content may be limited or banned.
You must be older than 16 years: According to European law, you must be at least 16 years old to use this instance.
All public posts from this instance are indexed by tootfinder.ch.

darkfriend.social.text: You must be 13 years of age or older to hold an account on Darkfriend Social.
Show respect. Treat others with kindness, respect, dignity, and patience.
Do not harass others. Read the Code of Conduct for a description of what we consider to be harassment.
Do not post or boost NSFW content without Content Warnings / Sensitive Content setting.
Do not post or boost illegal material. This includes copyrighted materials which you are not licensed to share.
Do not post advertisements or promotions. Read the Code of Conduct for a description of what we consider to be advertisements.
Hide spoilers and leaks behind Content Warnings.

dariox.club.text: No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
Sexually explicit images or video must be NSFW tagged and must have a content warning (with short non-explicit description)

Posting obscene or graphic imagery involving children, especially of sexual nature. Posts that contain, or could be reasonably thought to contain real children engaged in sexual activities will be reported to Child Protective Services and/or an appropriate law enforcement agency.
This instance is made for individuals older than 18yo. Your account may be suspended if you're under 18.
Brand accounts are not allowed. This instance is for individuals only
Do not register your account via Tor/VPN/Hosting provider. You may not be accepted
English Only. If you sign up with the reason not in English then your application will be denied
This instance is under the jurisdiction of Western Australia. All posts on this instance must abide by the WA Laws and the Australian Laws

darmstadt.social.text: Achte auf einen respektvollen Umgang und faire Diskussionskultur.

BelÃ¤stige niemanden und unterlasse persÃ¶nliche Angriffe. Das VerÃ¶ffentlichen oder die Androhung von VerÃ¶ffentlichung von personen-identifizierenden Informationen(doxing) wird als BelÃ¤stigung aufgefasst.
Nachgewiesene Falschinformationen (sog. Fake-News) und VerschwÃ¶rungsmythen sind hier unerwÃ¼nscht.
Rassistische, sexistische, homophobe, transphobe, beeintrÃ¤chtigtenfeindliche und anderweitig diskriminierende oder hasserfÃ¼llte Sprache sind nicht geduldet.
Die Bewerbung von Menschenfeindlichen und HasserfÃ¼llten Ideologien wird nicht geduldet.

Diskutiere Moderationsentscheidungen zuerst mit den Moderator*innen und gib ihnen eine Chance der ErlÃ¤uterung. Kommunikation mit der Moderation ist direkte persÃ¶nliche Kommunikation und erfolgt via Direktnachrichten, ein Ã¶ffentliches Verbreiten dieser Moderations Kommunikation ist zu unterlassen.

VerÃ¶ffentliche keinen Spam. Ein Toot mit nichts als einem Link wird als Spam ausgelegt, ebenso wie jedwede kommerzielle Werbung. Kommerzielle Werbung in diesem Zusammenhang bedeutet, wenn die verÃ¶ffentlichten Inhalte keinen persÃ¶nlichen Bezug aufweisen.
Nutze Inhaltswarnungen bei sensitiven, kontroversen, oder vermutlich triggernden Themen.
Pornographische und stark sexualisierte Inhalte sind unerwÃ¼nscht.
Halte dich an die in Deutschland geltenden Gesetze.

darknight-coffee-cannabis.club.text: Respektvoller Umgang: Behandeln Sie alle Mitglieder der Mastodon-Community mit Respekt, unabhÃ¤ngig von ihren Meinungen, Herkunft, Geschlecht, Alter oder anderen persÃ¶nlichen Merkmalen.
Keine BelÃ¤stigung: BelÃ¤stigung, Bedrohungen oder Mobbing jeglicher Art sind nicht gestattet. Vermeiden Sie absichtliche Provokationen und respektlose Kommunikation.
Keine Diskriminierung: Diskriminierende oder hasserfÃ¼llte Ã„uÃŸerungen aufgrund von Rasse, Geschlecht, Religion, sexueller Orientierung oder anderen persÃ¶nlichen Merkmalen sind streng verboten.

Keine NSFW-Inhalte ohne Kennzeichnung: Wenn Sie Inhalte fÃ¼r Erwachsene teilen mÃ¶chten, kennzeichnen Sie diese bitte entsprechend mit einer "NSFW" (Not Safe For Work)-Markierung und halten Sie sich an die geltenden Gesetze und Vorschriften.
Keine Spam- oder Massennachrichten: Vermeiden Sie das Versenden von Spam-Nachrichten, massenhaften Werbeaktionen oder nicht angeforderten Informationen.

Achten Sie auf Urheberrecht und PrivatsphÃ¤re: Respektieren Sie das Urheberrecht und die PrivatsphÃ¤re anderer. Teilen Sie keine Inhalte, fÃ¼r die Sie keine Berechtigung haben, und verÃ¶ffentlichen Sie keine persÃ¶nlichen Informationen anderer ohne deren Zustimmung.
Keine illegalen AktivitÃ¤ten: Verwenden Sie Mastodon nicht fÃ¼r illegale AktivitÃ¤ten oder um gesetzeswidrige Inhalte zu teilen.
FÃ¶rdern Sie konstruktive Diskussionen: Wenn Sie an Diskussionen teilnehmen, versuchen Sie, konstruktive BeitrÃ¤ge zu leisten und Meinungsverschiedenheiten auf respektvolle Weise zu lÃ¶sen.
Befolgen Sie die Plattformregeln: Achten Sie darauf, dass Sie die spezifischen Regeln und Richtlinien Ihrer Mastodon-Instanz kennen und befolgen.

Melden Sie VerstÃ¶ÃŸe: Wenn Sie auf VerstÃ¶ÃŸe gegen diese Etikette stoÃŸen, melden Sie diese bitte dem zustÃ¤ndigen Administrator oder Moderator, damit angemessene MaÃŸnahmen ergriffen werden kÃ¶nnen.

Diese 10 Punkte bilden eine solide Grundlage fÃ¼r eine freundliche und respektvolle Mastodon-Community. Indem Sie diese Regeln befolgen und von anderen erwarten, dass sie dasselbe tun, kÃ¶nnen Sie dazu beitragen, eine angenehme und einladende Umgebung fÃ¼r alle Nutzer zu schaffen.

darticulate.com.text: This server is intended to be a place for Dartisans like  myself to chat together and explore the fediverse as seen from the Dart community, however a few ground rules have to apply to users, not that I'm expecting any users to break these but please see below.
No privacy violations against other people; doxing, revealing or sexual images of someone else, information about someone's health, or crimes done against them.
No xenophobia, hate speech or incitement to such things.
No incitements to break any of the server rules
No spread of violent images, sexual violence, torture, or forced actions.

datak.duckdns.org.text: Questo Ã¨ un server Mastodon "casalingo". Gira su un Thin Client Dell, RAM 4Gb, SSD da 64Gb.

Questo server Ã¨ nato principalmente come server "personale" monoutente. Se qualcuno vuole iscriversi deve metterci la faccia e deve inviarmi un messaggio privato, altrimenti non se ne fa nulla. Le risorse del server sono molto limitate.
Chi entra qui deve innanzitutto lasciare fuori la maleducazione e gli estremismi di ogni genere. Rispetto le idee di tutti anche quando non le condivido, ma non tollero quando si esagera.
Qui non si fa politica. Il rispetto delle Istituzioni e dei loro rappresentanti, ad ogni livello, Ã¨ un dovere civico oltre che di buona educazione.

datavis.social.text: NO RACISM, SEXISM, HOMOPHOBIA, TRANSPHOBIA OR XENOPHOBIA.

Data Visualization Topics: datavis.social is a topical server focused particularly on Data Visualization and related topics. The central idea of the server is to gather a community around these shared interests.
LANGUAGE: English is the common language of the instance. Other languages are welcome, but please be kind and post English translations so that we can all read your posts.
INCLUSION: We want everyone to feel welcome, safe, and respected.  Please be welcoming and kind to everyone, especially when you have a difference of opinion. Then, be *extra* kind. :-)

HARASSMENT: If you experience or notice any harassment or other aggressive behaviors, report itâ€”by clicking on the three dots next to the message or profile and selecting â€œReport @personnameâ€) and help keeping this platform a safe space for everyone.
No NFTs: We know many people involved in computational art sell NFTs. However, on vis.social weâ€™ve made the decision that we donâ€™t want to be involved in NFTs. Please do NOT post them here.

No AI Images: Please do not use datavis.social to share images from text-to-image tools such as MidJourney or Stable Diffusion. We welcome critical discussion of these tools, particularly about the legal and ethical issues surrounding these tools and the implications for artists and society

Joining datavis.social: please tell us about your interest in this instance and it's topics. Tell us a little about you,  and your interests. Be sure to mention "Popcorn" in your application. Yes, it's a test to see if you've read the instance rules.

datboi.network.text: No sexism, racism, or hate speech. Homophobia and transphobia are strictly forbidden.
Please use the content warning tag where appropriate.

Please use the report button whenever you feel it necessary. Reports will be reviewed, and content that breaks the rules will be removed at the discretion of moderators. Everyone should feel safe and comfortable being here.
Account access is not guaranteed. Signing up for an account on datboi.network requires that I personally know you in some capacity. Other applications will be rejected.

dataplatform.social.text: Behave. While you're free to express your opinions, this freedom does not extend to being mean, disrespectful or derogatory to anyone. If you don't like someone, block them and move on with your life.
Everything is public. Don't post things you would be ashamed of if they became public - even in private messages.
No spam. You may promote material that you created yourself, within reason. Do not tag third parties. If you're unsure if your post or DM might be spammy, it probably is.
Only legal content. Everything must be legal under Swedish and EU law. In edge cases, or if you are unsure, don't click "Publish" in the first place.

No impersonation.

Unless *clearly* stated and clearly evident that you are running a parody/satire/comedy account, you may not assume the name of another individual or entity.
No disinformation. You must make a reasonable, good-faith effort to verify claims of a controversial nature.

datflow.tech.text: Keine Lust auf diskriminierenden Mist! Hier zÃ¤hlt nur dein Menschsein. Aussehen, Herkunft, Glaube, Liebe, IdentitÃ¤t, Beruf oder Socken sind egal. Hier wird Toleranz und Respekt gelebt.

Sensible Inhalte markieren!
Unbedingt Spinnentiere, NSFW, Gore, etc. pp. mit entsprechender Inhaltswarnung versehen.

datacorner.social.text: You work within Data Warehousing / Analytics / Business Intelligence areas.

datasci.social.text: Don't be a jerk. We expect to treat each other respectfully.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling, doxxing, or impersonation
No content that is considered illegal in Denmark or France
No intentional sharing of false or misleading information
Nothing NSFW (not safe for work), such as sexually explicit or violent media

SIGN-UP: This is not a generalist server and is destined for professionals in human-centric data science, broadly defined. Please register here only if that is the case. To get accepted for sign-up, specify your fit in the "Why do you want to join?" field.

dawdling.net.text: So far it's just me. If I allow others on the instance we'll add a standard list of rules.

dcerberus.com.text: No right-wing lunatics. Healthy political debate is fine, but this server is anti-fascist.
No anti-vaccine propaganda or fear mongering. The mods know people who have died from COVID-19.
Nothing illegal belongs here: no drug dealing, child pornography, death threats, or anything else that would be illegal in whatever country or jurisdiction you live in.
No hate speech here, period. Ever. It's 2022 and I can't believe I have to say that.

No minors. There are some jurisdictions where material posted by non-adults falls under some very strict legal constraints. I want no part of that, so if you are under 18 then sorry, please look for another server.

deacon.social.text: No sexually explicit, hateful, or illegal content is allowed
No intentional posting of misinformation or information that may lead to physical harm
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, ableism, or casteism
Disagreement is okay; personal attacks never are.

No spam. You can plug your latest project within reason, but if your account appears to only exist to solicit sales, especially if your product has nothing to do with the point of this server, we will delete your profile without warning.

dea42.social.text: This server is for info / status streams from Round Mountain Rescue Ranch and as such accounts are bots and friends of the ranch.

dcj.me.text: This is a personal instance for one user.

deadinsi.de.text: We have a zero-tolerance policy against bigoted behavior. This especially includes, but is not limited to racism, sexism, discrimination against sex workers, xenophobia, antisemitism, islamophobia, transphobia and ableism.
Do not explicitly endorse systems of oppression as a remedy to the same. This especially applies to the myth of meritocracy.
Do not argue for the existence or relevance of reverse-racism or reverse-sexism. Racism and sexism are deep structural issues with culture and not the expression of single persons.

Make use of the Content Warning (CW) feature in Mastodon extensively. While this is a requirement for any adult/disturbing content, particularly involving discussion about prohibited content, we highly encourage using it as a general disclaimer regarding the content of your post.

When you're asked to disengage, do so. If you want to start an argument, it is better to ask if the person you're engaging would be interested in hearing your take first. We're trying to build a space where everyone feels comfortable being themselves, not a debate club.

dcae.fyi.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No harassment of other users on this or other servers.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No disinformation regarding public health issues or political/military campaigns.
No spam. This includes commercial advertising, promotional campaigns, and SEO.
No impersonation of other individuals, public figures or organisations, unless clearly marked as a parody.
No content that is illegal in the US, the UK, or the EU.

Only Daniel & Ammi
This server is for the exclusive use of Daniel Carter & Ammi Embry.

dctr.uk.text: There must be no confidential information posted.

decco.net.text: Mostly family and friends, so keep it polite

decentralis.social.text: No TERFs, SWERFs, Nazis, or "free speech absolutists"
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No harassing, dogpiling, or doxxing other users on this instance or the wider Fediverse
No posting or sharing illegal content (especially content illegal in the United States)
No creating bots without approval (cute, funny, or useful bots might be approved, just ask a moderator)
No posting or sharing content that will make us make a new rule (if your defense is "it doesn't break one of the rules", consider this rule)

Please report anything that violates any of the rules above. The moderators of this server take reports seriously and will work with members of this instance to ensure it is a friendly and welcoming space

deepspace.social.text: Deep Space Social abides by Wheaton's Law and/or Queensberry Rules as appropriate.
Attribute other's images to them as you would want others to attribute your images to you.

deepwoodsocial.net.text: No users under the age of 18.
No bigotry, harassment or abuse towards others.
No real life illegal and abusive content.
When sharing something someone else has made, please credit them.
No AI generated media, this is a place for humans.
Consider marking particularly sensitive media as sensitive and triggering content as TW'ed, but this is mostly a suggestion.
Consider tagging your posts so people can find it and/or filter out things they don't want to see.

defcon.social.text: DEFCON.social is an inclusive instance and will moderate against bigotry, homophobia, supremacy, and edge-lord behavior
We don't condone harassment against any user, for any reason. Harassment can be generally or specifically targeted to make users feel uncomfortable, unwelcome, or afraid

Participants asked to stop any harassing behavior are expected to comply immediately. Anyone can report harassment. If you are being harassed, notice that someone else is being harassed, or have any other concerns, you can report
Don't break laws here, ask others to break laws here, admit to breaking laws
Pornography, Nudity, Links to illegal content, spam and commercial advertising are forbidden. Promoting your own projects in moderation is OK
Be polite: Mark a CW for spoilers
No account impersonation. If you claim you are the BBC World News and you aren't, don't be surprised if your account is suspended. Identity is tricky enough as it is
Mark your account type as "Bot" if you act like a bot or are one. For example automated posting or re-posting of other accounts
You must be at least 13 years old to create an account (US COPA, CCPA, UK AADC, etc.)

dembowski.social.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information

degrowth.social.text: Respectful Dialogue: Engage in discussions with respect and empathy for diverse perspectives.
No Hate Speech: We do not tolerate hate speech, discrimination, or harassment based on race, gender, religion, or any other personal characteristic.
Constructive Critique: Encourage critical thinking and constructive critique to foster positive change.
Non-commercial: This is a non-commercial space; refrain from excessive self-promotion or advertising.
Data Privacy: Protect your and others' privacy; do not share personal information without consent.
Digital Sustainability: Help sustain our infrastructure by using resources mindfully and considering donations.
Inclusive Space: Create an inclusive environment that welcomes people of all backgrounds and experiences.
Community Care: Support one another in your journey, provide resources for learning and action, and help sustain our harmonious environment.

deliverabilit.ie.text: Being nice helps. Let that be your default.

demon.social.text: Hate speech is not tolerated. This includes but is not limited to racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, classism, ableism, etc.
Centrist and right-wing politics are not allowed. The politics of hate (and tolerance of hate) have no place on this instance.
Harassment, dogpiling, and doxxing of other users is not allowed.
No content illegal in the US.
No minors. This is not a dedicated adult content instance, but you must be at least 18 years old and of legal majority where you live to have an account here.
No bot accounts. Crossposters are permitted but must be monitored.

demtech.global.text: Don't pretend to be someone you're not.

demon.haus.text: This server is invite-only. Those who are members are allowed to invite trusted friends and acquaintances. Invite links are also included in the Author Notes of Lyric's writing and on her personal Discord server. In this fashion, Demonhaus is meant to supplement Lyric's existing community.

Here is the most important rule:

DON'T BE AN ASSHOLE

denden.world.text: You must be 18 or older to join.
Don't be a bigot or shithead to others.
Explicit content must be tagged and marked sensitive in public posts.
Please do not post explicit art depicting underage characters.
Do not post anything that is illegal in the United States.
Harassment, callouts, and morality judgements of others based on their kinks or art are NOT welcome here!
Explicit discussion of topics related to pedophilic/zoophilic paraphilia, paraphile advocacy, and paraphilic identity-labels and iconography are not allowed on Denden.

denton.social.text: No white supremacy or white nationalism.
CW and mark sensitive any NSFW content.

detmi.social.text: Don't be a jerk to others.

det.social.text: Keine Beleidigungen, Drohungen und Verunglimpfungen aller Art

dev.ard.social.text: Hinweis: Diese Instanz ist eine Entwicklungs- und Testumgebung und nicht zum produktiven Einsatz vorgesehen.

dev.magincia.cafe.text: Development server, no actual users. Rules are the same as magincia.cafe primary instance.

developers.live.text: Don't get yourself or me in trouble.

devianze.city.text: Vietato postare contenuti illegali in Francia e/o Italia. Esempi non esaustivi: pedo pornografia, molestie sessuali, minacce di violenza.
Vietato promuovere in qualsiasi modo idee razziste o xenofobiche.
Vietato promuovere in qualsiasi modo idee omofobiche o transfobiche. Promuovere "femminismo trans-escludente" Ã¨ considerato transfobico.
Vietato promuovere in qualsiasi modo idee misogine o sessiste in generale. Promuovere idee "incel" o "redpill" Ã¨ considerato misogino

Vietato infastidire altri utenti per il puro gusto di farlo. In altre parole: niente "trolling" eccessivo.

dftba.club.text: Don't forget to be awesome. Think about people complexly; everyone deserves that.
This server is meant for Nerdfighters. Please embody the ways of the Nerdfighters here.
Nothing illegal. This server is hosted in the US. Do not post anything that would be illegal under US law.
dftba.club.hint: Please also be at least 13 years old. There are special internet rules in the US for folks younger than that (as there should be) and we don't meet those requirements. Sorry.

dftba.club.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, ableism, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
Use the Content Warnings when appropriate [link coming soon].
No copyrighted content. Please don't make us have to deal with Sony or Disney.

dewp.space.text: Beteilige dich authentisch und aktiv. Dadurch trÃ¤gst du zur Gesundheit und Langlebigkeit dieser Community bei.
Verhalte dich rÃ¼cksichts- und respektvoll in Wort und Tat.
BemÃ¼he dich um Zusammenarbeit, damit du Konflikte von Anfang an vermeiden kannst.

Achte auf deine Umgebung und die anderen Teilnehmenden. Mache die Admins darauf aufmerksam, wenn du eine gefÃ¤hrliche Situation, jemanden in BedrÃ¤ngnis oder Verletzungen dieses Verhaltenskodexes bemerkst, selbst wenn sie zunÃ¤chst belanglos erscheinen.

dfir.social.text: No violent or sexually explicit content
No racism, sexism, transphobia, xenophobia or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users

devolver.social.text: Be excellent to each other! Be kind and respect others, regardless of who they are and whether their opinions differ from your own.
No NSFW or offensive content. This includes offensive/hateful or otherwise mature language, images, videos, etc. Keep it PG.
No spam. This includes excessive message/emoji posting, excessive reacting, symbol "art", hoisting, advertising and trolling.
Exercise common sense. Do not beg for free games, jobs, merch or anything else. Don't pester others, even in DMs. Don't try to bend/find loopholes in the rules.
This is not a customer service server. Users may help you out of the kindness of their heart if you have questions or are encountering issues, but it is not anybody's job.
Party on, and remember to seek alternatives to single-use plastics.

dialup.cafe.text: be nice and follow back. we're here to converse, not broadcast.
be respectful, and don't create drama. this isn't reddit or twitter.
no CSAM or any other illegal material of that nature. you'll be banned, and reported to authorities without appeal.

dice.camp.text: Do not share intentionally false or misleading information.
Violent or sexually explicit media must be marked as sensitive when posting.

digitaal66.social.text: Je kunt je alleen registreren als je lid bent van Digitaal66, dit doe je in MijnD66.
Geen links of referenties naar racistische, hatelijke of anderszins offensieve content.

dimick.social.text: Donâ€™t be an asshole to anyone, even if they deserve it.

digressive.me.text: No hate whatsoever. None. No racism, homophobia, bigotry, sexism, transphobia, fascism (or tolerance thereof), or any other type of prejudice will be tolerated, no exceptions. This is not paying lip-service, we will be militant about this!
In general, any type of meanness, antagonisation, trolling etc. will be frowned upon. If you can't keep yourself in check, don't sign up.

digitalstuntfactory.com.text: This is a LGBTQ+ friendly instance
We welcome both Star Wars and Star Trek people
Marvel and DC fans are welcome here

dindon.one.text: Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other peopleâ€™s personally identifying information (â€œdoxingâ€) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.

Do not post spam. A toot that is nothing other than a link constitutes spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine, however, to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on â€” just keep the toot itself interesting).
Do not â€œshitpostâ€ - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour; criticize ideas, never people.

Do not tone police. Toots may violate the standards of civility we set on DinDon, but you should not criticize users for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them. In neither case should you criticize their tone.
Do not debate moderation actions in public toots. If you disagree with how a moderator enforced this CoC you may direct-message the moderation team or email admin@dindon.one.
Do not toot in languages other than English, Swedish, Russian (which makes moderation prohibitively difficult).

disabled.social.text: I am at least 16 years of age or older on the date of registration for the disabled.social instance.
I agree to not discriminate or promote/advocate content that oppresses members of marginalized groups (see rules for examples of groups).
I agree to not threaten, stalk, or dox people.
I agree to not harass others using tactics such as brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted.
I agree to not engage in mobbing, name-calling, intentional misgendering, or deadnaming.
I agree to not promote/advocate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism, or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
I agree to not promote/advocate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above-mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.
I agree to not promote/advocate unsubstantiated conspiracy theories related to anti-vaxx and COVID19.
I agree to alt text images, caption videos, and try my best to follow the best practices for screen readers.
I agree to not be spammy (e.g., spamming feeds with giveaways, crypto, etc.)
I agree to not post, promote, or advocate any content that is illegal in the United States.

I agree to not use disabled.social as a way to grow a commercial business, market products, or as a way to profit off of disabled people. EXCEPTION: Disabled people who sell products as part of mutual aid efforts and survival (e.g., Etsy shops, personal businesses, written works like books, etc.)
I agree to use content warnings where appropriate.
I agree to follow the remainder of the rules and adhere to the best practices outlined on the server about page.

discordian.social.text: No Nazis or any hate speech related activity.
Absolutely no gelatin based desert products. Bill Cosby is banned for life.

discuss.systems.text: Be welcoming. Be kind. Look out for each other.
Conduct or speech which might be considered sexist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or offensive in nature is not permitted.
No intimidation or harassment (online or in-person). Please read the Citizen Code of Conduct for how we interpret harassment.
No violence, threats of violence, or violent language.
Sustained disruption of online discussion is unacceptable.
Illegal content is not allowed. This server is located in (and subject to the laws of) the United States.

disobey.net.text: Don't be a jerk. Hate speech, discrimination, harassment, or oppression of members of marginalized groups of any kind is not tolerated.

doesstuff.social.text: Do not share information widely-known to be false and misleading

No posts or comments supporting or promoting QAnon-related content or similar conspiracy theories. Moderators have sole discretion to decide if a post violates this rule. Birds are real. The Earth is round. Get over it.

No visual content depicting animal abuse. No content supporting, encouraging, promoting, or condoning animal abuse. All other posts related to the discussion of animal abuse (e.g., news stories, current events, historical references, etc.) require a Content Warning.

No spam. Owners of dog training businesses can promote their services directly (e.g., 'Buy This,' 'Buy Now,' etc.) with one daily post. Posts about free resources (e.g., podcasts, free videos, articles, etc.) without upsells are unrestricted.
No threats, bullying, or attacks on an individual or group.
No accounts that impersonate anyone else. This includes other people as well as other businesses.

dragons.social.text: We believe freedom of speech is paramount, but like all freedoms, it comes with the requirement for its responsible and legal exercise. These rules set some "don't cross these" lines which should be considered by all posters as what we consider "responsible and legal exercise" on this service.

No harassment. This means going above and beyond to antagonize other users using things like circumventing blocks/mutes. Users are expected to unfollow/block/mute other users who post content they do not wish to see. Respect their decision and requests to stop targeting/mentioning them.

No brigading. Brigading is solicitation or inducement to harassment. Basically, getting your friends or followers to "jump on the bandwagon" to harass someone. Boycotting or expressing dissatisfaction with a corporate, political, or government entity may be exempt from this.
No breaking US law, or laws in your jurisdiction. We have to comply with all bona fide US law enforcement requests delivered via warrant or court order.

No impersonation. Parody is allowed, but parody accounts MUST be clearly identified. Attempting to impersonate another for financial/material gain, and soliciting such is considered fraud, and is illegal. Doing the same to defame, slander, or libel another can likewise be illegal.

No stealing other's names from other social media services, for the purposes of impersonation or squatting. Squatting is registering/reserving an account name which you have not used prior, but someone else has on another service. Common words or names may be considered exempt from this rule.

Don't spam (sending mass unsolicited commercial messages) via targeted posts or private messages. Advertising on your timeline to your followers is fine, and they can retoot it on their timeline, if they want. Social media isn't a replacement for email spam.

Do not "dox" people (post private personal info on public timelines without permission). Publishing already legitimately publicly-known info is a gray area; just because it may be published by a legitimate official source is not necessarily defensible. If people want to know, they can look it up.

Don't abuse or hack the service/servers. Participating in any kind of cracking or denial of service activities against the service, intentional or not, will be addressed immediately, potentially resulting in instant and irrevocable bans.

Posting adult/mature content. After-Dark/adult/XXX/erotic content is only permitted from accounts which are clearly marked as posting such content. Minors may not create, post, receive, follow, or interact with such content and accounts. Any such content cannot violate US law.

Respect copyrights. Avoid posting content that isn't yours, or that you don't have license to post. Copyright law still matters on social media, and reported violations will be taken seriously. Don't use other people's art for your avatars, backgrounds, or other decorations without their permission.

DMCA takedown notices are only for content you own or have license to. We strive to respond in a timely manner to all properly-submitted DMCA requests. Please send them to dmca@dragons.social for expedited processing. Do note that bona-fide "fair use" will be considered in our response.

Please respect the staff's time and try to take as little of it as possible in engaging us in administrative activities. Be direct and to the point in reports, and provide as much relevant info as possible. Be patient with us as we investigate and respond. We strive to work as quickly as we can.

The catch-all rule: don't be a jerk. If your goal in life is just to make people miserable, especially those of us tasked with managing communities like this, then we'll feel more than justified to send you on your way with our hind-pawprints in your posterior. We're all people too.

earpnation.social.text: No illegal content under US, French, or European law

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other peopleâ€™s personally identifying information (â€œdoxingâ€) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the earpnation community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on â€” just keep the toot itself interesting).
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behavior; criticize ideas or behavior and never people.

Do not tone police. Toots may violate the standards of civility we set on earpnation, but you should not criticize users for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them. In neither case should you criticize their tone.

edumasto.org.text: EduMasto is a Mastodon server whose primary purpose is to facilitate conversation about higher education issues, but conversations are not limited to that topic: feel free to share your thoughts on any topic of your choosing.

Because our goal is to promote civil and productive conversations among real people, only personal (i.e., no organizational or corporate) accounts for individuals (i.e., no anonymous accounts or bots) will be approved.

This server is intended as a platform for individuals professionally involved in higher ed policy. Please use â€œWhy do you want to join?â€ to help us identify you. If using Gmail/etc., please include  your university/govt/work email in your response
This will be an inclusive online community: all higher education policy stakeholders, including colleagues in other countries, are welcome to join.

Please be mindful of the fact this is an experiment and we don't know how sustainable or successful it will be. If it works, you can enjoy a more civilized local timeline while retaining full access to the entire Mastodon network. If it doesn't, you can always move your account to another server.
PLEASE use your FULL NAME as the display name in your profile. We want people to get to know each other and odd handles and anonymity don't promote that.

eldritch.cafe.text: Hateful conduct: We do not permit any form of bigotry or hateful ideology, including but not limited to: fascism/nazism, racism, misogyny, homo/trans/queerphobia, antisemitism, ableism, as well as threats against marginalised communities or the â€œdebateâ€ of theirs right to a safe existence.

Harassment: We do not permit harassment, including but not limited to: insults, bullying, dogpiling/brigading, bad faith trolling (â€œsealioningâ€), or boundary violations (for instance non-consensual flirting or unsolicited nudes). Requests to terminate conversations are to be respected.

Safeguarding: We do not permit content that endangers others, such as othersâ€™ personal or identifiable information (â€œdoxxingâ€) or the sharing of private conversations without consent. Promoting or encouraging self-harm or suicide will not be permitted.
Sexual Content: Sexual content, such as erotic nudity or pornography, may be shared behind a content warning. Sexual content may not be shared on public timelines.

CSAM/Abuse: Sexualised depictions of children, real (â€œchild pornâ€, child sexual abuse material) or fictional (â€œloliconâ€, â€œshotaconâ€), as well as sexual content shared without consent (reposting, â€œrevenge pornâ€), are not permitted and will be removed.
Misinformation: We do not permit the promotion of misinformation and conspiracy theories. Impersonating persons or organisations is not permitted, with the exception of parody.

Spam: We do not permit spam, including but not limited to: excessive automated/identical posting, unsolicited off-topic replies, corporate advertisement, excessive/unsolicited promotion, crossposting on the public timelines. Bot accounts are not permitted unless administratorsâ€™ exceptional approval.
Illegal content: This instance is hosted in France and subject to French law. As such, any content illegal in France may be removed without prior warning.

Be nice: Mutual respect and kindness are strongly encouraged. Unprompted aggression may be dealt with as needed on a case-by-case basis. For the same reason, content warnings for common triggers are heavily encouraged, and may be required at the teamâ€™s discretion.

elytra15.com.text: No engaging in hate speech or promoting racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, or other forms of discrimination.
Refrain from trolling, doxxing, stalking, or any form of harassment towards others.
Do not promote or align with alt-right, Nazi, fascist, or similar extremist ideologies.

emacs.ch.text: Be friendly, be respectful, stay on-topic and avoid derailing discussions.

No condescending or derogatory language, especially regarding race, nationality, color, gender, sexual preference, age, religion or political affiliation. This includes calls for violence against anyone or any group of people.
Use the CW (Content Warning) flag whenever you post something that you wouldn't want your neighbor, boss, coworker, partner or children to see.

No porn (including textual depictions of sexual activities), no child sexual exploitation material, not even disguised as anime. Exceptions: occasional soft nudity of yourself or your consenting partner behind a CW.
Bots allowed as long as posts are relevant to this instance (Emacs, Programming Languages etc.)
Properly tag the language of your posts, so other users can auto-translate the content.

If you post links to media (videos, images, audio), please provide a short description of what the content is about. This helps the users and the moderators to better assess the content. We reserve the right to mark links to media as "sensitive" that the moderators cannot qualify.
Comply with the law of your country.
No introduction required, no real names required, but please put a few words in your bio.

This server is intended for non-commercial purposes, with the exception of directly related commercial activities that contribute to the server's topic (i.e. services related to FOSS, hosting, Emacs, books). Prior approval from administrators is required for recurring use.

emeraldsocial.org.text: Don't post harmful content including but not limited to: racism (whether it's antiblackness, antisemitism, islamophobia, or some other form of racism), sexism, ableism, homophobia, transphobia, enby erasure, fatphobia, casteism, pluralphobia, disinformation and copaganda
Posting images of people without their consent is not tolerated here. If your image was posted without your consent, please contact staff at emeraldsocial@riseup.net
Usage of captions and descriptive text when posting images is heavily encouraged for the benefit of those using screen readers
This instance is intended for those located in or having relation to Eugene-Springfield and the surrounding area.
Please use content warnings for NSFW, spoilers and potentially triggering content. If you're not sure, it's a safe bet to just add a content warning anyways.

embracing.space.text: Discrimination & Bigotry Wonâ€™t Be Tolerated. We're not a free speech absolutist. We're not interested in Nazis, TERFS, or hate speech.
Respect Other Users. This instance is meant to be a friendly, welcoming space to all who are willing to reciprocate in helping to create that environment.
Consent is Important in all contexts. If youâ€™re ever unsure, ask first. Use content warnings (CWs) where required.
Listen; Donâ€™t Make Excuses. If youâ€™re accused of causing harm, either take some responsibility or ask moderators for help.
No Pedophilia or Zoophilia. This includes "loli" and "feral", including artistic depictions.

Members under the age of 18 are not permitted to post lewd, explicit, nsfw, or otherwise sexual content. This includes as original posts or in reply to other members, as well as boosting content of this type from their accounts.
No direct threats and incitement to violence. Expressing dissatisfaction is fine, but directly stating interest or intent to commit violent harm are not welcome on this server.
Use the Report Feature. Our moderators are here to listen and respond to reports.
Any content that infringes on the rights of third parties or otherwise violates applicable law in United States of America or Federal Republic of Germany is strictly forbidden.

Rule 9 includes in particular, but is not limited to, pornographic or obscene material, extremist content or content that offends common decency, gambling, material that could seriously endanger the morals of children or young people.
Rule 9 includes in particular, but is not limited to, material that could violate the rights of third parties (copyrights, name rights, trademark rights and data protection rights).
Rule 9 also includes the publication of defamatory content, insults or disparagement of persons or groups of persons.

fandomonium.space.text: Be respectful to each other. Everyone is entitled to their own opinions, but please remember that we are showing appreciation to fan works here. You don't have to be a fan of everyone, but you also don't have to spread negativity. Such behavior is uncalled for, and may result in a ban.

This server aims to be as inclusive as possible. Fandom has many aspects to it, some of which can be controversial. Just because you may not agree with it does not mean that it should be outright banned. Mastodon offers filters for removing unwanted content.

Use hashtags where appropriate. Hashtags will be required if the content falls into one of the following categories:  -- Graphic depictions of violence (#violence)  -- Rape/non-con (#non-con)  -- Underage (#underage)  -- Adult material (#nsfw)

Also, tag any ships with the primary tag used in the fandom (I.E. #inukag for Inuyasha/Kagome from Inuyasha content). This will better help the content reach the desired audience and keep it away from those who do not want to see it.

NSFW content is allowed. However, it MUST be tagged (#nsfw) and be given a content warning. If the content is a photo, video, or some other form of visual content, all characters MUST be of legal age (18 or older).
Be kind and supportive of artists. Try your best to get approval from the artist before sharing their work and at the very least link to where you originally found it.

fandom.ink.text: All users must be 18 or over.

All users must use tools provided by the platform (e.g. blocking, muting, reporting) to curate their own experience. Users must not expect other users to do this work for them (e.g. via "DNIs", etc.).
Behaviors considered illegal, harassing, inappropriate, derogatory or harmful to marginalized persons, or otherwise against the Terms of Service or Code of Conduct, are never tolerated.
Bots must be marked as such, and must not make posts to public timelines more frequently than once per hour.
Accounts auto-crossposted from Twitter or other services may be suspended or limited, without warning, at the administrator's sole discretion.
Adult and erotic content must only be posted in conformance to the "Adult and erotic content" section of the Code of Conduct.
Inactive accounts (i.e. those that have not been accessed for a period of six months or more) may be deleted, without warning, at the administrator's sole discretion.

Be courteous to others. Posting obvious flame-bait to public timelines (e.g. shipwars, nuclear-level takes on the discourse du jour, etc.) may result in content or your account being limited or removed, without warning, at the administrator's sole discretion.
Users caught encouraging or teaching others to circumvent instance rules, the code of conduct, or the terms of service will be penalized as if they themselves had performed the violation in question.
The reposting of unmodified content from the users of other platforms (e.g. cross-posted retweets, reposted art, etc.) is prohibited. Please link to the original content, instead!

fantasyhockey.social.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
No content illegal in Germany or France

fandom.garden.text: Do not make hateful, discriminatory or bigoted statements, use abusive slurs or spread hate speech towards oppressed groups.
Do not engage in harassment of any kind.
Use content warnings, especially when talking about sensitive topics or if you are spoiling recent news in your fandom â€“ see more information in the Recommendation section above.
You can post nudity, as long as it is protected by the adequate content warnings. Pornography is restricted to followers-only posts from 18+ accounts. Pedopornography is forbidden.
Do not publish private conversations without explicit consent of all parties involved, except to the moderation team if you need to report them.
Do not crosspost (from another social network) on the public timelines.
Avoid "reposting", which is actually stealing art. Boost the original toot or, if the art is not from Mastodon, credit and link to the artist, and ideally also ask for their permission.

Do not create any sort of corporate account for advertising purposes. Artists are of course allowed (and encouraged!) to promote their own shops and commissions. Websites or podcasts relating to fandoms are encouraged as well.
Use of bots on this instance is submitted to admin authorization, including follow bots.
Boosting is held to the same standards as direct posting; only boost toots that respect these rules.

fantastic.earth.text: This instance is invite-only, primarily intended for friends of admins (and other members eventually maybe)
Abusive/hateful content and harassment are not permitted
Moderation will generally not be applied outside of these criteria (but recommended tags, links etc. are reviewed on a best effort basis)
Admins will be the final arbitrators (list of admins will be known to all members / be published)
Instance blacklisting is done via best judgement (including pulling lists from instances we trust)
In general be kind and inclusive, and remember everyone (including the admins) are only human
Rules may change and evolve as we learn how to run federated infrastructure

federatedfandom.net.text: Don't be a dick. If you are, mods reserve the right to talk to you, suspend you temporarily, or suspend you permanently, in that order.
Self-promotion is fine but you should be fannish or friends with folks on this server. Do not join to promote commercial content.

Sexual content depicting characters who are not sexually mature is banned. "Underage" is a fungible category, we know this, do not post any content that could be described as shota/lolicon/etc. Prior to performing any account limiting activities, mods will contact you to discuss.

If you don't like what you are seeing, block or mute, report if it violates the rules, move on. Do not harass users about ship preferences in any way. NOTE: discussion of racism, homophobia, etc in fandom does not constitute harassment.
This is a server for the girls & the gays & seeks to provide a trans-inclusive, anti-racist space. We are not a space for right-wing fans.
By joining this server you are asserting that you are legally an adult in your country of residence.

Please use your best judgement when posting NSFW or other sensitive content such as posts about political violence, screenshots of right-wingers, etc. NSFW images must be marked as sensitive and a CW should be used.

Username format: Usernames can be alphanumeric and have underscores but dashes and other special characters are not allowed. This is enforced at the Mastodon software level so it's not a "rule" but we want you to know before you try to sign up. Thanks!

"AI" content is not permitted. Anything generated by an LLM or image service such as Stable Diffusion, ChatGPT, etc is disallowed on this server. (Also, "AI" is fake. The computer is not talking to you or making its own art; it is using stolen content, hence the ban.)

fedi.mvpgame.dev.text: Rule 0: Be Mads! :) Sure, I'm moderating myself, but I'm filling out these rules to outline the general standards I try to hold myself to. I'm actually cool with y'all reporting me to myself if I genuinely drop the ball and want me to reconsider something.
No discrimination and/or bigotry of any kind against any marginalized groups. Racism, xenophobia, queerphobia, sexism, and everything else of the sort is not permitted.
No posting or boosting NSFW content without a content warning. This includes stuff along the lines of nudity and gore.

Avoid "reply guy" type behavior. This is everything from being annoying about suggesting Linux when somebody's venting about Windows to trying to play devil's advocate in the comments on someone's story of experiencing discrimination.
Try to include accurate, useful alt text on posts with media. Perfection isn't really possible, but aim for being as consistent as possible.

Label sensitive topics with CWs as appropriate. Try to share links to posts with an added CW if it'd be appropriate to have one in the context. This is all in relation to stuff like political news, descriptions of hateful/discriminatory rhetoric, etc.

NSFW content should be appropriately marked. This includes: text or images depicting sex or sexual acts, general nudity, drug discussion, sex work discussion

Be considerate of others' sensory issues. If a GIF or emoji you're posting could reasonably have some kind of seizure warning, please specify in the content warning tags.

fosstodon.org.text: Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other peopleâ€™s personally identifying information (â€œdoxingâ€) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.
Do not post adult content, including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention (including sexualized comments or jokes).

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on â€” just keep the toot itself interesting).

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the Fosstodon community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.
Do not â€œshitpostâ€ - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged, there is no place for â€œshitpostingâ€ on Fosstodon.
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour; criticize ideas, never people.

Do not tone police. Toots may violate the standards of civility we set on Fosstodon, but you should not criticize users for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them. In neither case should you criticize their tone.

Use content warnings liberally, especially when covering topics involving real acts of violence and other harmful behavior.
