Racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, and other discrimination is prohibited. Users who engage in such conduct are not welcome on our platform.

Respect other users of our service and other federated instances. If someone doesnâ€™t want anything to do with you, leave them alone. Attempts to bypass blocks, including creating alternate accounts for that purpose, is prohibited.

â€œScreenshot dunkingâ€, or the act of taking screenshots of posts to repost and harass without directly replying, is strongly discouraged. If someone is annoying you, harassing you, or a genuine danger to other users, block and report them.

furry.engineer.text: Rule #4 â€“ Misinformation and Deceptive Content
furry.engineer.hint:
Misinformation, scams, Ponzi schemes, and other deceptive tactics have become rampant on other platforms and we donâ€™t want to see a resurgence of it in the Fediverse.

Examples of prohibited content include, but are not limited to, the following: COVID and health misinformation, pro-insurrection (Jan 6th) comments or endorsement, NFTs, â€œcryptoâ€ (blockchain & tokens, NOT cryptography), MLMs / pyramid schemes, flat earth claims.

Content warnings (CW) are REQUIRED for NSFW content, political discussion and debate, religious promotion and debate, and drug mentions. Please review https://pawb.social/post/101 for more information.

furry.engineer.text: Rule #5.2 â€“ Sensitive Content in Content Warning Message
furry.engineer.hint: Don't put polarizing, graphic, or sensitive content in the content warning (CW) description.

furry.engineer.text: Rule #6 â€“ No Spam or Advertising
furry.engineer.hint: Spam and advertising is not acceptable, but friendly automated bots are welcome. Where possible, try to restrict any recurring automated posts to Unlisted to avoid cluttering the Local and Federated timeline. Content posted by small businesses is NOT considered advertising for the purposes of this rule.

furry.engineer.text: Rule #7 â€“ Disengage and Report Abuse
furry.engineer.hint:
If a user or instance is breaking the rules, we recommend just reporting the content and not engaging. We donâ€™t want users to end up getting caught in the crossfire for attempting to correct a user in good faith, as this makes our jobs significantly harder.

Additionally, the team is here to help â€“ If youâ€™re unsure on a particular post, user profile, instance, etc. and donâ€™t think weâ€™ve seen or dealt with it yet, please send in a report. No user will ever be penalized for genuine use of the report system.

furry.engineer.text: Rule #8.1 â€“ Account / Post Language Missing
furry.engineer.hint: We require that all posts are properly marked with the language used, which can be done at the account level through the account preferences page, or per-post by clicking the language button next to â€œCWâ€ (Content Warning).
You may not impersonate an individual, group, or organization with the intent to deceive, confuse, and exploit other users. Parody accounts should tag themselves clearly in their profile description.

Bot accounts must mark themselves as a bot and must post using â€œUnlistedâ€, â€œFollowers onlyâ€, or â€œMentioned people onlyâ€, so we can keep the local and federated timelines clear and focused on users.

furry.engineer.text: Rule #8.4 â€“ Unauthorized Brand / Government Accounts
furry.engineer.hint: No brand or government-affiliated account may be registered on Pawb.Social services without prior written and publicly recorded approval, except furry fandom-operated brands and events covered by the exception in our full rules. This rule ONLY applies to accounts on Pawb.Social services.
If you have been suspended from any Pawb.Social instance, you may not create another account on any of our services.

furry.engineer.text: Rule #8.6 â€“ Prohibited Avatar / Header Image
furry.engineer.hint: All avatars and header images must not contain any content that is prohibited by any other rule in the Code of Conduct, especially content that requires a Content Warning (CW).
The full Code of Conduct can be found at https://docs.google.com/document/d/1jXkulJKMWEmv-cb_jaYkG2L0sTcZeHKdcqwImNkf6Ko â€“ Some rules and wording listed here have been summarized for brevity.

fur.lgbt.text: All "not safe for work content"/"NSFW"/nudity/explicit content must use the term â€œNSFWâ€ in the CW field and be hidden in public toots. Avoid setting your banner and icon to sexually explicit content since those cannot be CW'd.
Posting illegal content will result in an immediate ban. The definition of "illegal content" is based on US laws.
No posting of suggestive/NSFW content depicting minors or "cub" art on this instance.
No hate material, transphobia, or discrimination of any kind will be tolerated on this instance.
Any instances primarily hosting or refusing to moderate section 6 content will be blocked from federating.
These rules are subject to being amended and updated at any time, without notice.
Please review our Extended Code of Conduct andTerms of Service for more information at https://yiff.life/terms

furry.energy.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting. Content warn (CW) anything you wouldn't see in general media and be kind with spoilers.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, spamming, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
Only share content that is legal in the United Kingdom AND your own country of origin.
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
No ban evasion, NFT, AI Artwork, impersonation, hate or gore-centric accounts. Parody is ok if clearly labelled.
You must be 18+ to join this server. Read the House Rules & Extended Code of Conduct (https://furry.energy/about & https://furry.energy/privacypolicy)

furry.horse.text: ğŸ” No members under the age of 18.
Personal accounts only, no businesses or organisations.  Exceptions for directly furry businesses/organisations, eg artists, fursuit makers, conventions.
No advertising, sponsored content, or spamming.  Exceptions for first-party directly furry advertising, e.g. art, but don't spam.
No raffles that require boosting/following to enter.

furry.pet.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive and have a short content warning when posting.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
Users registering on this instance must be at least 18 years old
You may not use an avatar if it has explicit content that would require a Content Warning
Don't repost artworks without crediting the artist. If you have a link to their gallery, perfect, if only their name, better than nothing. Claiming other's art as your own may lead to suspension.
Trying to be clever and skirting around the spirit of the rules will likely result in admin action

furs.town.text: by creating an account on this instance, you affirm that you are over 18 years old and/or legally adult.
please don't post or interact withâ€”i.e., replying, boosting, or favoringâ€”anything illegal in the laws of the United States; use your common sense.

we don't tolerate any content discriminating any individual on the grounds ofâ€”including, but not limited toâ€”race, ethnicity, national origin, religion, caste, sexual orientation, sex, gender, gender identity, serious diseases or disability, or immigration status.

any content targeting any individualâ€”whether they are on this instance or on other federated instancesâ€”with malicious intent is not allowed; this includes, but not limited to, harassment, gaslighting, spamming, or stalking. please be good to others.
adult (nsfw) contentâ€”excluding those listed under rule #6â€”is allowed, as long as it's masked under 'content warning' with a brief description; e.g., cw: blood.
absolutely forbidden: any content depicting or suggesting sexual exploitation of any MINOR, whether they be in-real-life human child or fictitious "cub."
always credit the rightful creator of the artwork, including a link to their profile is the best. or at least listing the creator name alone helps tremendously!

no impersonation of anyone, including one against any legal entities (a.k.a. businesses) unless you have a representing power of such entity. the only allowed exception shall be 'parody accounts' where the account is required to clearly specify in bio that the one is a parody account.

every single data created on and originating from Furstown belongs to respective local account who created that data, on furs.town. Furstown do NOT allow scraping data from us without consent, for any purpose; the only exception shall be federating for the intended purpose of 'socializing.'

furs.social.text: No harassment or discrimination. This includes hate speech, cyberbullying, or any other behavior that targets or discriminates against someone based on their race, ethnicity, religion, gender, sexual orientation, or any other personal characteristic.

Keep it legal. Do not post illegal or copyrighted material, or engage in any illegal activity on the platform.

(This server is managed in the United States and hosted in Japan)

AI art is not allowed on this instance. This includes any art or media created using artificial intelligence or machine learning algorithms. Posts containing AI art will be removed and may result in the user being banned from the instance.
No impersonation or deceptive behavior. Do not pretend to be someone else, or use the platform to mislead or deceive others.
Mark all NSFW content with a content warning.

futuregadgetlab.cc.text: - Boosting will be treated the same as posting that content. Only boost stuff that is not against the rules.
- When interacting with other instances, you must follow our rules as well as the other instances rules.
- We won't support hateful speech or harassment on this instance, therefore it is forbidden.
- We support freedom of expression for everybody. Don't be disrespectful, regardless of your political views. However, freedom of expression has limits.
- Discrimination is not allowed. It does not matter whether you discriminate a majority or a minority or a single person.
Don't upload anything illegal / you haven't got rights on it, if anything illegal came from here, contact a member of staff or use the report button.

- Before clicking the report button, keep in mind that we can't fully take action when it comes to posts from outside of the instance, however your report can be sent anonymously to the original instance.
You must not upload anything illegal or material that you don't have the licence/copyright for.
With illegal, we mean: Content that is against any laws of Germany or the European Union.
You must not upload any form of pornography.
Always credit the artists of the art you post.
Other NSFW (that is not pornographic) material must be posted hidden using the spoiler button.

fwoof.space.text: Be considerate. Respect others and their viewpoints.
No drama! This is a drama free zone. We're all adults here.
No spamming. Sending a large amount of posts within a short period of time is not necessary and should be avoided if possible.
Be lawful. No posts about anything that is illegal or would have the FBI knocking at our doors, etc.
Use content warnings. On posts with common trigger warnings, E.G. Sexual, potentially violent, etc, try to use content warnings. This is a pretty loose rule, just be mindful.

gachi.masto.host.text: Be Respectful: Treat everyone with dignity, regardless of background. We focus on actions, not generalizations.

gainer.cloud.text: Respect everyone: we actively moderate against racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia... Any kind of discrimination.
Any content that is illegal in UK, Ireland and EU is prohibited.
Do not gather information about our users by means of web scrapers or other software alike.
Dont Spam, occasional promotions are allowed but do not post constantly about them.

No Nudity in profile pictures, topless is fine if you want but no genitals.

galaxy.quest.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No harassment of other users on this or other servers.
No content illegal in the following locations: United Kingdom, European Union
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No disinformation regarding public health issues or political/military campaigns.
No spam. This includes commercial advertising, promotional campaigns, and SEO.
No impersonation of other individuals, public figures or organisations, unless clearly marked as a parody.

gamedev.lgbt.text: Be friendly and respectful to all members - No personal attacks, antagonizing, or harassment of any kind.
This is a positive and supportive place - Please interact in a way that reflects these values.
General statement - Black lives matter, trans rights are human rights, and if either of these make you uncomfortable, this is not the community for you. Hopefully one day it will be.
You must be part of or directly adjacent to the games industry

gamemaking.social.text: There is no tolerance for harassment or discrimination of any kind, directly or indirectly. For example: racism, ableism, homophobia, transphobia and TERF shit, fascism, general channer garbage, and so on.
Burning the planet down by generating and posting AI shit is not welcome.
Pro capitalism and pro colonialism nonsense is not welcome.

Please use content warnings following the usual Fediverse etiquette; for example for politics (especially USA politics), 'adult'/lewd content, eye contact, food, mental health â€¦ if in doubt ask first or check our guide on the gamemaking.tools wiki.
Please caption the images and other media you post to the best of your ability.
If you don't use your account it may get deleted. This isn't a fancy RSS reader, you should be here to engage with people.

gamedev.berlin.text: Treat everyone with dignity and respect, regardless of their background, identity or circumstances. This is a positive and supportive place - Please interact in a way that reflects these values.
Mark NSFW content as sensitive and keep avatars and header images SFW.

Report any inappropriate behavior to the server administrator.
The administrator can and will remove user accounts if abuse or malicious behavior is seen.
The primary languages allowed on the server are German and English.

Only post content that is legal within the EU.

Distribution of copyrighted material is prohibited - no uploads, no links.
Do not spread false or misleading information intentionally.

Uphold quality. No Spamming of any kind .
No automated posts by bots, unless approved by the server admin.

*WHY?* Due to how Mastodon works under the hood, boosting (retweeting) posts from other servers will cause their media attachments to be cached on this server. Storage is limited.

gayweeb.vip.text:
NO NATIONALISM 
ABSOLUTELY NO FUCKING NATIONALISM ON THIS INSTANCE BE A NATIONALIST PIECE OF SHIT ON HERE AND I WILL HUNT YOU FOR SPORT
No racism, homophobia, transphobia, biphobia, classism, sexism, ableism, or any other systematic discrimination is allowed on GWV.
No hate speech, bullying, harassment, or dogpiling.
No spam - this includes shilling NFTs. Self-promotion is otherwise fine and encouraged.
No auto-posting bots from Twitter, RSS, etc. By joining this instance, you are entering a community and you are expected to interact authentically.
NSFW content is allowed, but please use your best judgment in tagging and posting. Any content illegal in your home jurisdiction is explicitly forbidden.
Please use the CW feature for content that may be distressing for other users.
Using â€˜jokeâ€™ CWs from time to time is fine, but please use your best judgement when doing so, and do not overdo it. Remember that CWs exist for a reason.
Following the general community behavior of the Fediverse (IE: use of camel case, captioning of pictures, etc.) is preferred but not required.
Please report any objectionable content - either in GWV or directed at a GWV member in bad faith - so that it can be responded to accordingly.
Many right-wing and far-right instances are universally blocked on GWV. Circumventing these blocks will result in removal from GWV.
Users from blocked instances may not transfer to GWV. Any requests to join will be rejected.
Users under the age of 18 will not be permitted to join GWV. Any requests to join will be rejected. Any user found to be under 18 will be banned immediately.
While GWV is primarily a Fediverse instance for gay men, we welcome people of all identities to join. All members are also expected to treat users in a welcoming and respectful manner.
Any additional rules can be added or amended at the discretion of the admin team.

geek.gay.text: All users of Geek.gay must adhere to the Code of Conduct listed at https://blog.geek.gay/code-of-conduct/

geekstodon.com.text: No Racism, Violence, or Threatening Behavior
Please be patient. This server is new, and the Mastodon ecosystem is growing rapidly since Twitter got Musked. This server costs money to operate, so please consider donating (contact @admin).

geeknews.chat.text: Behave yourself, and do not post anything to the Metaverse that can get this server banned. No Hate Speech, No Adult Material.

geekdom.social.text: Hate speech and acts of discrimination such as racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, xenophobia, or casteism will not be tolerated.
Do not intentionally share false or misleading information.
Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive with a content warning.
Do not share posts containing incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. Posts or replies designed to provoke a confrontation are not acceptable.

Do not post spam. Toots containing just links or an inordinate number of hashtags are considered spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on â€” just keep the toot itself interesting).

geneadon.social.text: No sexually explicit or violent media.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, antisemitism, or casteism.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.

genealysis.social.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No spam. This includes commercial advertising, promotional campaigns, and SEO.
No impersonation of other individuals, public figures or organisations.
No content that is illegal in the United Kingdom
Absolutely NO sexuality explicit content.  This includes, but not limited to, images/videos/chat around sexual acts.  There are other places on the internet for this.
Your primary reason for having an account on this server should be your interest in Family History and Genealogy
Accounts will be deleted one month after registration if the post count remains zero.

genericsocialmediapage.com.text: Hateful conduct: We will not tolerate any form of bigotry or hateful ideology, including but not limited to: fascism/nazism, racism, misogyny, homo/trans/queerphobia, antisemitism, ableism, as well as threats against marginalised communities or the â€œdebateâ€ of theirs right to a safe existence.

Harassment: We will not tolerate harassment, including but not limited to: insults, bullying, dogpiling/brigading, bad faith trolling (â€œsealioningâ€), or boundary violations (for instance non-consensual flirting or unsolicited nudes). Requests to terminate conversations are to be respected.

Safeguarding: We will not tolerate action that endanger others, such as releasing othersâ€™ personal or identifiable information (â€œdoxxingâ€) or the sharing of private conversations without consent. Promoting or encouraging self-harm or suicide will not be permitted.
Sexual Content: Sexual content, such as erotic nudity or pornography, may be shared in threads, but for the love of god put it behind a content warning.

CSAM/Abuse: Sexualised depictions of children, real (â€œchild pornâ€, child sexual abuse material) or fictional (â€œloliconâ€, â€œshotaconâ€), as well as sexual content shared without consent (reposting, â€œrevenge pornâ€), are not permitted and will be removed.
Misinformation: We will not tolerate the promotion of misinformation and conspiracy theories. Impersonating persons or organisations is not permitted, with the exception of parody.

Spam: No you can't post your spam, including but not limited to: excessive automated/identical posting, unsolicited off-topic replies, corporate advertisement, excessive/unsolicited promotion. Relevant self promotion of your store, or services is okay.
Be nice: Mutual respect and kindness are strongly encouraged. Unprompted aggression may be dealt with as needed on a case-by-case basis.

gensokyo.social.text: You start shit, you get kicked. No exceptions. No refunds.

geraffel.social.text: We do not tolerate discriminatory behaviour and content promoting or advocating the oppression of members of marginalised groups.
We do not tolerate threatening behaviour, stalking, and doxxing.
We do not tolerate harassment, including brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted.
We do not tolerate mobbing, including name-calling, intentional misgendering or deadnaming.
We do not tolerate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
We do not tolerate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above-mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.
Actions intended to damage this instance or its performance may lead to immediate account suspension.
Content that is illegal in Germany will be deleted and may lead to immediate account suspension.
Be aware that misbehaviour on this instance may lead to removal from other Geraffel services including Bar and Threema Groups.

getoote.de.text: Kein Hass, keine Nazis, keine Faschisten, kein Schwurbel und keine Werbung. Seid nett zueinander!

giesing.space.hint: Treat all members with respect. Harassment, hate speech, personal attacks, or discrimination of any kind will not be tolerated. This is a space for positive and constructive interactions.

Posts that promote violence, illegal activities, or harmful content are strictly prohibited.
NSFW content is allowed only if appropriately marked. Explicit or graphic content without a content warning will be removed.

Do not share anyoneâ€™s private information without their consent.
Respect the privacy and boundaries of other users, especially in direct messages.

Avoid posting spam, advertising unrelated to the community, or content designed to deceive or harm others.
Phishing, malware, or similar malicious activity is grounds for immediate removal.
Giesing.Space is primarily for Josh Giesing and friends. While others are welcome to join, please respect the personal nature of this server and its community focus.

Be mindful of how your posts interact with the wider fediverse.
Posts that are abusive or designed to disrupt other servers will not be tolerated.

Moderators have the authority to take action to uphold these rules, including warnings, content removal, or account suspensions.
Decisions are made to maintain the health and safety of the community.
This server is a space for friends and like-minded individuals to connect, share, and explore. Letâ€™s make it enjoyable for everyone!

girlcock.club.text: No illegal content is allowed on the server and sharing such content will result in an immediate suspension.
Hate speech is not tolerated. This includes but is not limited to racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, classism, ableism, etc. Please report any hate speech encountered.

Centrist and right-wing politics are not allowed. The politics of hate (and tolerance of hate) have no place on this instance and any discussion of these policies framed in a positive light will result in the user being silenced.
Do not misuse the report system. Only report dangerous content pertaining to the rules above; do not create frivolous reports for disagreements over discourse or leftist politics.
Posts containing NSFW content or content that users may not wish to engage with must be tagged with the content warning feature.

girldick.party.text: No illegal content is allowed on the server and sharing content of this nature will result in an immediate suspension.
Hate speech is not tolerated. This includes but is not limited to racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, classism, ableism, etc. Please report any hate speech encountered.

Centrist and right-wing politics are not allowed. The politics of hate (and tolerance of hate) have no place on this instance and any discussion of these policies framed in a positive light will result in the user being silenced.
Please do not abuse the report system. Report only dangerous content pertaining to the rules above; do not create frivolous reports for disagreements over discourse or leftist politics.
Posts containing NSFW content or content that users may not wish to engage with must be tagged with the content warning feature.

girlboss.ing.text: Do not post or access any content via this instance which is illegal in the UK.
Hate (racism, xenophobia, homophobia, transphobia, classism, along with other forms of hate like holocaust denial) is a ban.
Harassment is not allowed. However, criticism is not considered harassment if the nature of the criticism is both true and non-aggressive.
Sensitive content, even which is not NSFW, should have content warnings.
Posting NSFW photos / drawings are not allowed (boosting it is allowed, though). NSFW text content (including screenshots of NSFW text) is fine but needs a content warning.

girldick.gay.text: Absolutely no bigotry against marginalized/repressed groups; including, but not limited to, homophobia, trans-/enbyphobia, misogyny, racism, classism, ableism, etc. As a general rule, don't discriminate against anyone further down the social ladder or, in other words, just don't be an asshole.
No illegal content, specifically anything illegal under the jurisdiction of Germany. Yes, be gay do crime, but i don't have the resources to fight legal battles just for girldick.gay to stay online.
Provide alt text for images and videos
Use content warnings where appropriate. For example: selfie/ec (eye contact), mh (mental health), sh (self harm), etc. You get the idea.

Give a hint as to what kind of person you are when signing up. I can't afford to run an instance that needs 24/7 monitoring and moderation, so please reference your website/twitter/previous fediverse account or any other indication that you might fit in this community.
Don't be completely inactive. New accounts should at the very least set up their profile after being accepted; and i reserve the right to delete those that don't after a reasonable time.

glaceon.social.text: Please see the rules here: https://glaceon.social/about/more

glammr.us.text: glammr.us is a space for folks interested in productive conversation about, well, galleries, libraries, archives, museums, memory work and records.

We want this to be a fun, pleasant, and harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, or religion.

We do not tolerate harassment of participants in any form. Participants asked to stop any harassing behavior are expected to comply immediately. If someone asks you to leave them alone, leave them alone.

glasgow.social.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No harassment of other users on this or other servers.
No content illegal in the following countries: United Kingdom, Germany
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No disinformation regarding public health issues or political/military campaigns.
No spam. This includes commercial advertising, promotional campaigns, and SEO.

English language only.  We cannot moderate all languages.  At this time we are able to moderate English only.  Unsupported language accounts will be suspended.  See https://joinmastodon.org/servers to find a server in your country or language.

glitch.cat.family.text: Comrades should follow the Basic Interaction Guidelines, reasonable expectations, etc.
Comrades must not endanger the glitch.cat.family community.
This server holds no guarantees or obligations towards those not working in solidarity with its interests.

glitch.braydmedia.de.text: Be nice to each other and use common sense
Don't use this instance solely to post advertisements. It's a federated social network, not an advertisement place.
Do not publish content illegal in Germany and/or the Netherlands, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
Content promoting the ideology of National Socialism is not allowed.
We have zero tolerance for racism, homophobia, transphobia or simliar content that is hateful towards specific individuals or groups.
Accounts that only crosspost from other platforms without posting exclusive content on here will be removed without a warning.
Do not flood or spam the timeline with posts.
In case you see content that is against the rules or against the laws in Germany / the Netherlands please use the report feature.
If you post NSFW content or about sensible topics please use content warnings.

globalskywatch.social.text: Be kind, honest, respectful, and keep conversation clean and friendly.

glitch.taks.garden.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting

glitch.lgbt.text: Treat others with human decency. No hate speech, violent rhetoric, slurs, none of that.
Stay tasteful and legal. There's a line, don't make us responsible for you crossing it. Be smart.
Use content warnings when appropriate for NFSW or sensitive topics/media.

gluck.cc.text: Children under 13 prohibited. You must be at least 13 years of age, and you must not collect personal information online from a child under 13 years of age. See https://www.ftc.gov/legal-library/browse/rules/childrens-online-privacy-protection-rule-coppa

Use empathy and respect. Remember that your words can have consequences and don't say anything here if you wouldn't say it to a friend. The culture here is different from Twitter or Facebook. Observe how people interact and try to behave as well or better than everybody else

Content warning (CW) should be used for stressful or triggering content. Mark any toxic posts with a descriptive CW to allow other members of the Fediverse to engage with it or not. Use the CW like the subject for a email to a large audience that some may not want to read
Cite sources, credit others. Images and media should be annotated. Where the material is not yours, source attribution should be provided, preferably with a link to the original.
Mind your gigabytes. Please upload your videos to another platform like PeerTube  or YouTube and post links instead of uploading video here.

Expect pruning of old data. Data entered into this server is stored temporarily and I do not plan to provide a long-term archive. Retention is currently set to store content for 90 days but Iâ€™ll adjust retention depending on costs.

gnulinux.social.text: No automated cross posting from Twitter, RSS, or other services.
Please do not spam or self-promote yourself (humor and m3m3s, however, are most welcome).
If you impersonate someone, please state that in your profile and exercise discretion.
We recommend using descriptions for images and video (ALT tag) to be inclusive of those with vision issues.
Challenging the community with critical ideas and good thought partnering is welcome, ass holes are not - be respectful during dialogue or debate.
No hate or targeted harassment of any other user, regardless of what side of an issue you reside on.
Accounts for and/or promoting proprietary products are prohibited. You may make accounts for and/or to promote Free Software products, whether commercial or otherwise.
We respect the individual freedom of the community member in deciding whether reposts are endorsements or otherwise, and whether the content they post should contain a warning.

grandma.space.text: If someone asks you to stop, STOP. Ignoring such a request, especially from a mod, will result at minimum in a timeout.
If there is an issue, use the reporting tools so moderators and admins can handle it.

No bigotry or harassment. grandma.space has a ZERO TOLERANCE policy for the instigation or perpetuation of hateful speech and ideology, disrespect of its members or staff, incendiary behavior, or other such inappropriate conduct.
Provide appropriate content warnings on potentially sensitive posts and use nsfw tags liberally on adult images, spoilers, and other content that not everyone may want to see.
Current event discussion is permitted but you are highly encouraged to use a current event or politics content-warning.

graphics.social.text: No advocating violence. Do not engage in harassment, including but not limited to bullying, stalking, and unwanted sexual advances.
No bigotry of any kind. Including but not limited to: racism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, ageism, fascism, nationalism, colonialism, white supremacy, or religious extremism.
No hacking. Do not engage in unauthorized access or abuse of the server's systems or data.
No pornography. It's just not that kind of instance, find another home on the fediverse.

No deceptive content. Do not post deceptive or misleading content, including but not limited to impersonation, phishing, misinformation and explicitly: cryptocurrency, multilevel marketing scams, NFTs and anti-vax misinformation.

No illegal content. Do not post illegal content, including but not limited to child pornography, non-consensual pornography, threats of violence, incitement to commit violent acts, and any content that violates the DMCA.
No doxxing. Do not share personal information about others without their consent.
Be kind, don't be a jerk. It's what all these other more specific rules are trying to define.

No scraping the contents of this site for machine learning training. That includes using any text, image, video or audio posted for training, testing, or general use with artificial intelligence, including but not limited to large language models like GPT and neural networks.

greennuclear.online.text: Although this server is free to use, please consider donating to keep this service online and be able to grow. Thank you!
You agree to the terms of service by masto.host
Any language is welcome. Mind using the correct language option when posting. This enables our translation service to work.
Don't upload videos directly to the server. Please use an external service, like PeerTube, YouTube, etc.
We care about correct information. Don't spread false information.

greennet.social.text: Sexually explicit or violent media should carry appropriate content warning'
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism. No Nazis.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information

gronp.masto.host.text:
No names!

If you share a screen shot of someone else's post, their name must be blurred. We hate rules but this protects our group from being attacked and reported.

Just because we don't follow Facebook standards doesn't mean Anything Goes!

The entire point of Gronp is that it's the friendliest place you can visit. We never argue, except in pretend, and our pretend arguments are ludicrous 

So if you spew hate or anger in Gronp, just leab.

No Politics!

Admeen  fines politik meems bohring n wil deleet dem ef shee feil liek it. Yah em drunk on powar. Leab ef et hertz u sew bayud. O wate refer 2 rull 1.

groupthink.fun.text: All people are welcome and entitled to take part in the discourse. Speech that objectifies, marginalizes, belittles, ridicules, or is hostile to any demographic recognized by the United States as protected(http://jk.mt/yq), will result in a ban.

growers.social.text: Sexually explicit or violent media should not be posted, there are other options better suited for this.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No harassment, dogpiling, or doxxing of other people.
Use a content warning when sharing news items or politically related media. We're here to be social and respectful, politics can be an unwieldy beast and we'd really appreciate not dealing with it.

When creating an account here note the service is still small and self-funded. I'm don't soliciting payments for this service and intend to keep this running as best as I can. Service interruptions can happen and in this case, I will try my best to bring everything back online as soon as possible.

gruene.social.text: Achte die WÃ¼rde deiner Mitmenschen und Mitnutzer*innen
Beachte die geltenden Gesetze, insbesondere das Urheberrecht, das PersÃ¶nlichkeitsrecht und den Datenschutz.

Solltest du Inhalte, insbesondere Ton, Video und Bild, verÃ¶ffentlichen, die andere verstÃ¶ren kÃ¶nnten, beispielsweise durch Darstellung von Gewalt, verwende bitte die Inhaltswarnung-Funktion ("Als heikle Medien markieren")
Solltest du eine Verletzung dieser Regeln bemerken, nimm das bitte nicht stillschweigend hin, sondern informiere die Moderator*innen unter @moderation

gs.leftic.club.text: Utiliser ce service dans le respect de la loi franÃ§aise.

grumble.social.text: No bigotry. Any form of bigotry is grounds for account termination. Since I vet everyone the chance of this happening is exceedingly low, but I want it to be explicit. Also: TERFs and nazis fuck off.
Don't be a dick. There's no value to it. It just makes you a dick.
Post in good faith. If you assume someone is posting in bad faith... well, your reply will probably also be in bad faith. So just don't.
Don't dog-pile. There's no value in it, it doesn't make the world a better place. No one wants to see it, and it's a waste of your own time.
Vet your content. Looking at you metal folk. No one wants to see known white supremacists boosted, so if you get called out for it, that's on you.

Unfollow/mute/block and move on. While I encourage using CWs for trauma triggers, there is no expectation of CWs for topical content. If someone is posting content you don't want to see, remove them and move on.
Don't post anything illegal in the EU, because that's where this site is hosted and doing so risks me simply taking the server entirely offline to avoid any legal issues.

guild.pmdcollab.org.text: You need to be 13 years old or older to use this service
Be nice.  Do not harass people, do not stalk or impersonate anyone.
Use Content Warnings.  Do not post sensitive content, especially sexual, without appropriate content filters and NSFW settings
Moderators can limit your account or remove content if they rule that you are in violation of these rules or the spirit of these rules.
German laws for legal/illegal content apply.
Subject to change: These rules will be updated in the future, be sure to check them regularly.

gulo.monster.text: This is a two user instance and at least one user is an anachafeminist & mischief maker. Teehee.
ACAB, BLM, Landback, Free Palestine, No Liberation without Collective Liberation, Intersectional & Revolutionary Feminism, Queer & Trans Rights Now
This instance has a 100% butch saturation rate :verifiedbutch:

gulp.cafe.text: Use Content Warnings and Sensitive Image tools
Try to report problems using the Report Button
Read and abide by the spirit of our Code of Conduct

guitar.rodeo.text: No racism, homophobia, transphobia, or misogyny.
Love each other, help each other out.

gweep.cat.text:
don't be mean.

i alone decide what that means, but figure it's gonna be leftist stuff and i have no patience.
Let me know if you sign up and don't get an email. (You probably won't and we will need to add your address to SES first.)

Don't get us in trouble with other servers. 

If we get blocked by other servers I will most likely respond by removing your account. The exception is fascists and racists and the like-- if you get us blocked by them, good work! (But please don't paint a target on this server.)

gxtech.social.text: Be respectful. You will not always agree with everyone on the internet, and others will likewise not always agree with you.
No violence or threats of violence.
No hacking (of this server or any other system that you are not otherwise authorized to access).

hackers.town.text: No commercial accounts, advertising, or excessive promotion.
No bots, unless they're cute, funny, or useful. Bots should avoid posting to the public timeline.
Content that is borderline NSFW or could be construed as NSFW at a glance should be put behind a CW (Content Warning).
No discrimination based on gender, sexual minority, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, religion (or lack thereof), or national origin.
No holocaust denialism, Nazi symbolism, or promotion of National Socialism.
No fake accounts unless they are clearly labeled as such.

Don't make us make a new rule.
If the defense of an action is that it's not specifically outlined as against these rules, consider instead this rule
Any siloed corporate social media entity that is not fediverse native that tries to federate with hackers.town will be blocked.

Typical Content warnings include (But are not limited to) politics, food, alcohol and drugs, eye contact and NSFW material (If you would not share it in a work chat, it probably needs a CW) . 
If staff or other users ask you to CW something, please edit the post.
If you willfully misgender or deadname a person, we will kick/ban/block/defederate.

h-i.social.text: This instance has a zero-tolerance policy for racism, sexism, queerphobia, Islamaphobia, antisemitism, etc. Any accounts that engage in these behaviors will be banned.

Boundaries are to be respected. If a person asks to disengage from a discussion, please honor that request politely. Accounts that continue to harass, stalk, and abuse after the request is made will be banned.

This is a sex-positive instance, so nudity and NSFW content is acceptable. Just put it behind a CW. Accounts that do not put this content behind a CW will be warned. After three warnings, the account will be banned.
Harassment, bullying, and antagonization will result in an immediate ban.
If using an artist's work in your post, always give credit to said artist.

Accounts that post sexual depictions of minors (this includes loli), content such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism, and conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism will be immediately banned.

hachyderm.wtf.text: Used for dev/test activity for hachyderm.io only. Not actively moderated. Signups are disabled.
The same rules that apply on hachyderm.io apply here.

h-net.social.text: Be courteous, respectful, and understanding in interactions with fellow users.
No racism, sexism, ableism, religious-based hate, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or classism.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent or white supremecist ideologies.
No harassment, intimidation, or other abuse of other users.
No intentionally false or misleading information, including unfounded or disproved conspiracy theories.
No libelous or slanderous posts about users and nonusers.
H-Net reserves the right to suspend, block, or remove accounts that do not abide by our rules of engagement, including harassment of other users.
H-Net Network Accounts - If you are joining the instance on behalf of an H-Net network, your account name must follow the naming format â€œ@H_NETWORKNAME@h-net.socialâ€

hackodon.com.text: All content moderation decisions are final.
All bans are non-negotiable and at the sole discretion of the server's owner
Don't post stuff that can't or shouldn't be posted. If you don't know what this means, please contact the moderator!

Your interest in this private instance is appreciated, but your registration will be rejected unless you have made prior arrangements with the instance's owner. Honestly, you probably would rather be somewhere else.

hackerspace.au.text: No bots that are not labeled as such in their profile
Keep conversations civil and respectful even in disagreement
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, anti-Semitism, or casteism
Be somehow involved with either the Hackerspace or Makerspace movement within Australia

hades.town.text: No racism, sexism, queerphobia or other forms of hate speech.
No incitement or glorification of violence (including war and the military)

halfey.moe.text: This is a single-user instance. I (halfey) am the rule(s).

hamradio.tel.text: We'll try to keep the rules pretty simple here, basically, treat others with decency and respect.
Hate speech and bullying are not tolerated.

hamont.social.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No harassment of other users on this or other servers.
No content illegal in the following countries: Canada
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No disinformation regarding public health issues or political/military campaigns.

No stalking or harassment. In general, if someone asks you to stop interacting with them, then stop. Stalking, harassment, hate speech, or doxing that is posted to other instances or on other social media platforms is still grounds for having your account terminated here.
No posting (or threatening to post) other people's personally identifying information ("doxing").
No promotion of conspiracy theories (eg anti-vax, anti-mask, anti-COVID).
No scraping content from web interface or API.

honk.masto.host.text:
Only HONK, emojis, images, and binary. Be more goose. 

No Nazis, no TERFs, no other assorted fascists.

hoosier.social.text: Hoosier.Social is inclusive to everyone of all ages, nations, races, genders, faiths, and creeds.  Racism, sexism, homophobia, and transphobia (including misgendering, deadnaming, or promotion of so-called "conversion therapy") are forbidden & posts that violate this rule will be removed.
Please keep our space safe for all and family friendly. No spamming. No personal attacks. Your opinions are welcome, but we encourage thoughtful conversation over provocation.

Hoosier.Social Admins have unilateral authority and judgment over users that violate rules.  Users can be immediately suspended without appeal.  Admins will de-federate any servers whose users act as a group to harass or attack this server or our users.
Users should not assume privacy on this server or anywhere on Mastodon. It's not designed to be private. Assume that anything you post here, including direct messages, are publicly visible.
These rules can be changed or updated at any time by Hoosier.Social Admins.
By joining Hoosier.Social you agree to these rules.

horrorhub.club.text: Don't be a dick. - The universal rule
Slurs and hate speech are not tolerated.
Use CW tags for Gore and other NSFW posts.

Don't do anything that would cause another instance to defed (completely block) our instance. When I receive reports, I will take the steps necessary to resolve the remote grievance if I find it has merit, and I will reach out to you via DM to inform you of the decision I've made.
Observe Mastodon etiquette as best as we can. A majority of us are new to this network that has been around for many years and has its own culture.
No content that is considered illegal in the United States
No posting misinformation or misleading information.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users

hotdok.dk.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, religious extremism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment of other users, or revealing of personal information about other users

No shortened links, e.g. bit.ly, t.ly, goo.gl, ift.tt, lnkd.in, is.gd or t.co (These are malicious because link-shorteners track users without their consent and obscure the destination address, which also prevents users from being able to decide whether they want to visit the link beforehand).

howdee.social.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting
No content illegal in The United Kingdom
No incitement of violence or promotion of discriminatory or violent ideologies.

Be respectful. Racism, Sexism, Homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia and and other forms of hate and discrimination are not welcome, your behaviour elsewhere may also be considered if brought to our attention.
The sites staff team will ultimately have the final say on any and all moderation actions.
No spam, harrassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users, this includes mass and spam reporting.
No intentionally false or misleading information. By extension, do not pose as persons of interest.
Controversial, reactionary, NSFW, and satirical or similar content may be removed if not obviously Content Warned where appropriate.

howdidthisgethere.masto.host.text: No racism, sexism, anti-LGBTQ, anti-any-religion, or anti-no-religion, or other degrading of people or groups based on their race, gender, who they love, or who/what they worship (if they do worship).

ibite.lol.text: Entire instance is 18+. You must be 18 or older to create an account on this instance.
No hate speech. Hate speech is any content which furthers or promotes disdain or violence toward a specific group of people. This includes homophobia and transphobia, as well as racism and sexism.
No harassment. Harassment is persistent abusive behavior toward a specific individual on-site for any reason.
This is primarily an art instance. Please refrain from posting real-life nudity or AI-generated artwork, or you may be asked to move.
Explicit content must be spoilered and CW'd, to promote easy interactions with other instances.

iconfactory.world.text: The custom emoji on this instance have been lovingly handcrafted by The Iconfactory for maximum Mastodon fun and are for NON-COMMERICAL USE ONLY. Do not use them with content that's hateful, harassment, or pornographic. Don't put them on the blockchain, either.

All images originating on this instance are protected by U.S and International copyright law, and may not be sold or appear in any other medium. The copyrights are held exclusively by The Iconfactory.

idf.social.text: No commercial advertising, no uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources, no untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content (including artistic depictions) and no untagged gore and extremely graphic violence (including artistic depictions)
No racism or advocation of racism, no sexism or advocation of sexism, no discrimination against gender and sexual minorities or advocation thereof, and no xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

Breaking any of the rules above may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service.

ilbery.family.text:
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, xenophobia, or casteism.
Transphobic behavior such as intentional misgendering and deadnaming is strictly prohibited.

No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
Calling for people or groups to be assassinated, murdered, or attacked physically is strictly prohibited. Support for violent groups or events is prohibited.

No harassment, block evasion, dogpiling, or doxxing of others
Coordinated activity to attack other users is prohibited. Posting of private personal information about others is prohibited.

Do not share information widely-known to be false and misleading.
False and misleading information and links from low-quality sources may not be posted, especially if they are likely to mislead or confuse others or endanger their safety.

Content created by others must be attributed, and use of generative AI must be disclosed
Content created by others must clearly provide a reference to the author, creator, or source. Accounts may not solely post AI-generated content.

Please try to use ALT text for media attachments.
While failing to do so will not result in moderator action, we all should be trying to be as accessible as possible and it makes media attachments better for everyone.

illo.social.text: No discrimination of any description, e.g. racism, transphobia
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other people
Sexual or violent media must be marked as sensitive

im-in.space.text: Don't be a d*ck, respect the others (no hate speech, racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia) and fight in direct messages.

Please keep bad memes or any political incorrect stuff out of the public timeline.  
Feel free to use the "unlisted", "private" or "direct" visibility options when talking between friends and with people who are okay about that.

Not safe for work (NSFW) content is allowed if you put it behind both a #NSFW tag and add a content warning (the "CW" or warning button below the message text box). 
Content depicting sexualized minors (including drawn, a.k.a. loli/shota), self-harm, gore and forced acts is not allowed.
As stated in our ToS you must be 16 of age or more to use this instance.
Don't make parody accounts or try to impersonate someone or a group.

Accounts for for-profit companies or used for advertising only, SEO boosting, or SPAM will be suspended.
If you truly want to participate in the Fediverse, please ask the admin for permission before joining.

Please do not use a public anonymizer email service (like temporary boxes or forwarders). 
You will be asked to change your email under a time limit or will be suspended. Self-hosted forwarders are exempt of this rule.
No promotion of cryptocurrencies or NFTs. Commenting on the surrounding news about it is still allowed.

Please put politics and activism behind CWs when posting with the "public" visibility. A few times is OK but repetitive ignorance of this rule will result in a limitation of visibility of your account.
Respect Switzerland's (owner's country) and Germany's (server location) laws.

ilys.fm.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information

imker.social.text: Keine Inhalte, die die UnterdrÃ¼ckung von Mitgliedern marginalisierter Gruppen fÃ¶rdern oder befÃ¼rworten. Keine gruppenbezogene Menschenfeindlichkeit basierend auf Eigenschaften wie Geschlecht, ethnischer ZugehÃ¶rigkeit, Behinderungen, Herkunft, Bildung, Religion usw.
Keine BelÃ¤stigung, kein Stalking, kein Mobbing, kein Deadnaming/Misgendern. Keine Diskussion, wenn Leute klarmachen, dass sie nicht kontaktiert werden wollen.
Keine Inhalte, die in Deutschland illegal sind. Keine Handlungen, die dieser Instanz schaden (sei es der Technik, dem Ruf oder der Sicherheit)
Weder rechts- noch linksradikale Inhalte, keine VerschwÃ¶rungstheorien.
Keine automatisierten Accounts (auÃŸer von der Moderation abgenickt).   Das gilt insbesondere fÃ¼r Bots, Crossposter, Feedposter usw.
Posts auf der lokalen Timeline brauchen CWs (Inhaltswarnungen) fÃ¼r Gewalt, Sex, Tod/Krankheit und Politik (insbesondere bei negativen oder kontroversen Themen).
Posts auf der lokalen Timeline brauchen Bildbeschreibungen.
Die kompletten Regeln und Nutzungbedingungen findet Ihr unter https://meta.imker.social/regeln.html und https://meta.imker.social/nutzungsbedingungen.html.

implausiblyaverage.online.text: Be kind. This is supposed to be a cool, fun place where we want people to feel welcome. You don't have to be nice all the time, but you do have to be kind.
Don't be a jerk. No bigotry of any kind, don't be an ass, don't harass or attack others, don't harass people off this instance, and don't make the instance worse.

Being on the instance is a privilege, not a right. If we think what you're doing harms the server, makes it worse, or generally makes people unwilling to be here, then you don't get to be part of the instance anymore.
Mods/Admins get the final say. This is an extension of rule 3, but we're going to mod to the best of our ability to keep the Implausibly Average community welcoming, kind, and fun.

No NSFW content without Content Warning

Hate speech is not permitted at all.
Share content only that you have permission for.

indg.club.text: This space is hosted by and for Indigenous people of North America and World Wide. Members of any and all First Nations welcome. Hate speech of any kind is not tolerated. Don't be a lousy relative.
Use of this server encourages LAN BACK, whereas telecom infrastructure spans unceded Indigenous Territory and therefore we must reclaim communication that spans our land as we claim the land itself

independent-media.co.uk.text: Hate speech will not be tolerated and users will be removed

indieapps.space.text: Please do not request personal accounts. Only accounts dedicated to apps!
Please setup a verified link to your app's website in each account on indieapps.space.
Do not use your account for information unrelated to your app.
Use your app account only for news, announcements, tips, and user support (through unlisted or direct messages) for your app.
Only apply for account for apps developed by independent individuals or small teams.

indieauthors.social.text:
Be restrained with opinions not related to indie publishing, indie authors, and indie books. 

Posts, debates, or opinions making judgments on people's lifestyles, beliefs, personal identification, political affiliation, etc. are subject to moderation.

Be tolerant. 
This server will not condone, support, or allow intolerant or hateful communications of any kind.
Don't post copyrighted material unless you are the copyright holder or it falls under Fair Use w/attribution.

Be reasonably active (post).
Indie Authors Social is an active and passionate community of Authors-Helping-Authors. Accounts will be suspended from this instance for prolonged periods of inactivity and:  no profiles, no links, no posts., no follows.
Abide by US law for content posted or attached to messages.

indiepocalypse.social.text:
Free speech does not mean freedom from consequences.

No racism, sexism, queerphobia, transphobia, xenophobia or bigotry of any kind are allowed.
Indiepocalypse has a zero-tolerance policy for harassment, dogpiling, bullying or doxxing.
No NFTs, no crypto, no blockchain. There are crypto-related instances on the Fediverse that are better suited.
The following content will be removed and will result in revocation of access to the service: sexual depictions of minors, beastiality, and promotion of Nazi symbolism and ideology.
Promotion of your games, projects and storefronts *are* allowed and encouraged, but spam is not. Do *not* directly message users to advertise.
Bots need to be approved by the admins or moderators of Indiepocalypse before being allowed.

Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive an/or hidden under a Content Warning (CW) when posting. Because they cannot be marked, all avatars, headers, and bio content must be appropriate for all audiences.
Accounts for groups / organizations / brands / sites / doujin circles, et. al are welcome as long as they are indie. If you question if your group is "indie", feel free to ask!
AI-created and AI-altered art and writing is generally **not** allowed on this instance. There are valid ethical concerns regarding what material is being used to train models for AI bots.

indieweb.social.text: No spam or excessive self-promoting in posts.
No bots that are not labeled as such in their profile.
Keep conversations civil and respectful even in disagreement.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, anti-Semitism, or casteism (including targeted misgendering, deadnaming, or promotion of so-called "conversion therapy").
No sexually explicit or violent posts or media allowed
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies

indiehackers.social.text: DO interact with others as if you're at a friend's party: be polite, inquisitive, supportive, observant and all the other nice things that make parties great. And above all: have fun!
DO NOT ruin your friend's party by being nasty, obnoxious, hateful and all the other things that will get you ejected from a party.

indigenousgulf.online.text: This instance is for Indigenous Mississippi River Delta/Gulf Coast organizations and community members to connect! Please respect that.

This instance does not allow bigotry and hate speech. You will be evicted from this digital community if found to be doing so. No racism, gender or sexuality based hate, body shaming, antisemitism, etc.
No punching down or lateral violence please.
Please describe your images as much as possible for accessibility to screen readers and the like.

Use common sense with Content Warnings (CWs). Tag potentially triggering conversations, intense politics (both as you see fit), solicitation, violence, and nudity/kink content. Tag anything lewd, or 'NSFW'- things inappropriate for an office environment.

inductive.space.text: No content that is illegal in Germany. No spam. No pornography.
Read and adhere to the Berlin Code of Conduct. https://berlincodeofconduct.org

Use content warnings for spoilers or sensitive subjects such as sexual content, violence, mental health, et cetera. Err on the side of caution, but please don't use content warnings as general subject line, use hashtags on top of your posts instead.
Please add captions to all images where reasonably feasible.
No commercial accounts, such as accounts used mainly for advertising a commercial entity, without approval.
No automated content, such as bots or crossposters, without approval.
Main posting languages should be English, German and Dutch (I can't moderate effectively if I don't understand large parts of the posts).
Read the About page before joining. https://inductive.space/about

infosec.exchange.text: Do unto others as you think they would want done to them.
Mark sensitive content with a content warning.
Gratuitous obscenity that serves no practical benefit to a discussion is not permitted.
Illegal content such as child pornography, unsurprisingly, is not permitted
Spam is not permitted, this includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services.

Hate speech and abusive or threatening behavior is not permitted, specifically that which directed at any gender, nationality, religion, race, age, pizza topping preference, or sexual identity.  One can hate on systemd all day long here.
Lack of a specific rule against a certain behavior does not indicate acceptance of that behavior.  Each of us has a limited amount of time in this world.  Don't be a jerk.
Violating one or more of these rules may result in an immediate, permanent ban without notice or warning.
You may not impersonate a person or brand without a clear indication the account is unofficial and/or a parody. Parody accounts are permitted, as are legitimate brand accounts.

No attacks against (or from) the instance.

You may not do anything which may impact confidentiality, integrity or availability of Infosec.Exchange, the users of the service or their data.
For more details see https://wiki.infosec.exchange/rules/start
No doxing (aka doxxing) or disclosing personal information without consent and as a means of harassing or causing others to harass another person.
No harassment in the form of continued engagement after a person has requested contact to stop

Automated posting:
- accounts that post >50% using automation must be labeled as a â€œbotâ€ in the user profile to help provide a visual indicator to visitors
- automated posts must be limited to one post per hour/24 per day with post visibility set to â€œpublicâ€. There is no limit on â€œunlistedâ€ posts.

isocial.cloud.text: Using a disposable email address is not permitted.
It is prohibited to buy, sell, or transfer any account.
Please ensure that all bot accounts are properly marked and identified.
Do not Interfere with, disrupt, or create an undue burden on the Site or the networks or services connected to the Site.
Harassing, annoying, intimidating, or threatening any of our admins or agents engaged in providing any portion of the Site to you is strictly prohibited.
Don't bypass Site restrictions, including restricted sections. We take security seriously and need your cooperation to maintain a safe platform.
Copying or modifying the Site's software, which includes Flash, HTML, PHP, JavaScript, CSS, Ruby, PostgreSQL, and Redis, is strictly prohibited.

Violence, harassment, and other similar types of behavior discourage people from expressing themselves and ultimately diminish the value of global public conversation. Our rules are to ensure all people can participate in public conversation freely and safely.

The following content is prohibited on our platform: Violent Speech, Violent and Hateful Entities, Sexual Exploitation, Abuse/Harassment, Hateful Conduct, Perpetrators of Violent Attacks, Sensitive Media, Illegal or Regulated Goods or Services.

Private Information: You may not publish or post other people's private information (such as home phone number and address) without their express authorization and permission. We also prohibit threatening to expose private information or incentivizing others to do so.
You must not infringe on the intellectual property rights of others, including their copyright and trademarks.
It is prohibited to create accounts with the intention of replacing or imitating a suspended account.
It is unacceptable to impersonate an admin or a system account.
We will maintain certain data that you transmit to the Site for the purpose of managing the performance of the Site, as well as data relating to your use of the Site.
Although we perform regular routine backups of data, you are solely responsible for all data that you transmit or that relates to any activity you have undertaken using the Site.

You agree that we shall have no liability to you for any loss or corruption of any such data, and you hereby waive any right of action against us arising from any such loss or corruption of such data.
Using bots for malicious purposes is not permitted.
Content created by the use of AI must be disclosed.
Ai Profiles that solely share AI-generated content will not be tolerated.
You are not allowed to spam multiple reports for the same content.

You agree that by accessing the Site, you have read, understood, and agreed to be bound by all of these Terms of Use. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE WITH ALL OF THESE TERMS OF USE, THEN YOU ARE EXPRESSLY PROHIBITED FROM USING THE SITE AND YOU MUST DISCONTINUE USE IMMEDIATELY.

We want this to be a harassment-free environment, regardless of gender, gender identity, age, sexual orientation, disability or whatever other personal situation. Sexual language and imagery is not appropriate.

This is a JVM related technologies mastodon server. As such, it should be useful for developers using that platform and ideally it should be used to talk about our beloved programming language (Java, Kotlin, Scala, Groovy... you name it).
Of course, we can also socialize and talk about other topics, and it's ok. But if you plan to use mastodon ONLY for other topics, there are a lot of better servers for you out there.
This service is maintained by volunteers. If you find it useful, please consider any financial funding. You can colaborate and see where the money goes at https://opencollective.com/jvm-social .

kclc.us.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
No content illegal in the United States.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
Bots must be marked as bots in their profile preferences, and automated posts should be unlisted.
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information.
Do not spam or abuse network features.
Public posts which contain nudity, sexually explicit, or violent content must be marked with an "NSFW" content warning and media marked as sensitive when posting.

kcmo.social.text: Pretend you know people IRL and be nice to them like you would in person

Moderation and rule enforcement is done on a best effort basis to keep the above rules and CoC operating.  It may be inconsistent but always working to the goals of making space for everyone.  Read the about page or CoC for more info.

kei.fashion.text: The minimum age to join this server is 16 years old. If found to be younger, you will be banned.

Racial slurs, discrimination against gender and sexual minorities (including trans-exclusionary radical feminism), ableism, fatmisia, xenophobia and/or violent nationalism, and targeted harassment of any other kind is not allowed. Accounts flagged will be investigated and banned from the server.
Copyright protections still apply to images and other content. Please cite sources when reposting content. Content may be removed if the original creator requests.

DDLG, kink, sexual harassment, sexual interaction with minors, and other sexually explicit content is absolutely unpermitted on this server and are bannable offenses. This includes boosts to the server.
NSFW content is allowed but it cannot be sexually explicit content and must be properly tagged #NSFW and marked as sensitive with appropriate content wrappers.
No flooding of public timelines (making public posts in quick succession) You will potentially be flagged for spam.
Coordinate criticism is not allowed as default unless EXPLICITLY REQUESTED by the original poster.
Discussion & images regarding print replicas outside of an educational context (contrasts between original & fakes, how to avoid buying fakes, verifying a fake, etc.) are not permitted.
No NFTs, cryptocurrency, or AI content is allowed.
The rules of harassment apply to users on other servers as well. If you're reported for harassment by other admins or server users, you will be investigated and potentially banned.

kinky.business.text: Exclusively 18+. Zero tolerance for underage or otherwise illegal content.
Keep everything here consensual. No exceptions.
Do not flood the server with posts. No more than a small number of pictures in rapid succession. Violating it will get you silenced or suspended.
If you're posting a picture that's not yours, attribute it correctly. We like original content (text, pics, etc.) 100 times more than random porn off the Internet.
Use sensitive media flag *and* content warning (CW) for NSFW media. No full-on nudity in avatars.
Respect each other, absolutely no hate speech

You're here to *be* here - the main purpose of an account on this instance should be to contribute to the community, not advertising a business or directing traffic elsewhere. Any advertisements should be unlisted or follower only.

kind.social.text: Don't be an asshole, and don't post anything illegal. Those concepts guide most other rules & moderation.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, discrimination, bigotry, ableism, harassment, disinfo, conspiracists, trolls, etc. Please, also report this whenever seen.

Content Warnings & Sensitive Media labels are required for depictions of nudity, bloodshed, or extreme harm (NSFW.)
CWs, Alt Text, & PascalCase hashtags are encouraged to improve everyone's experiences, especially disabled users. However, policing or bullying people to use them is unacceptable.

Small businesses & independent creators, along with their self-promotion, are welcomed and encouraged.
However, no big corp/org advertising, spam, or accounts.
No crypto advertising, spam, or accounts.
No "AI" advertising, spam, or accounts.
No proselytizing or preaching.

Automated & Bot accounts must be labeled as such. If the account will be regularly posting more than 3 times a day, posts should be set as Unlisted/Quiet Public by default to prevent clogging up our Local Live Feed.

Check out the admin's Pinned Posts for user info like: how to migrate servers, app suggestions, Mastodon norms, & more. The admin's profile can be found at https://kind.social/@Texan_Reverend
If you have questions or want help configuring your account & app, Texan_Reverend is only an @ away.

kinktroet.social.text: Kein Hate Speech, kein Rassismus (Race Play okay, aber bitte passend taggen).

No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information.

Do not spam or burst post-boost. Bot accounts should be limited to 1 post per hour.

kinkyelephant.com.text: Don't be a dick. Being nice to each other is the most important rule of this instance.
Don't post stuff you don't have the rights to without permission. This is a creator-friendly instance.
Hywel is running this instance out of his own pocket for BDSM models, producers and fans. If you don't like the way this instance is run, start your own. That's what Mastodon is for :-)
If you post illegal stuff, you're out.

Please mark "Not Safe For Work" (NSFW) content with the eye button for images AND the CW button for text. It is important to DO BOTH for every post so vanilla users on other instances know what they are getting.

kokoro.shugetsu.space.text:
We choose whether you have the right to play, not you.
If you consider your rights(So-called freedom of speech) to be limited, then you're right. Leave as you like. This only applies to those jerks who believe their trash view shall be swallowed by any other innocent people.

Show kindness and sympathy.
Please avoid political conflict, discrimination, privacy poking and extreme(especially anti-social) views, in any kind. Maintain a rational and human atmosphere. We may even not need to do any action - users will do their own judgement.

Respect to one's copyright.
Please do not repost any user's content and post to any exterior(We define this as "Out of Fediverse") platform without a permission. You may face a ban doing so.

Protect yourself.
No one will ask for your private information for any reason in the Apartment. Even including Kokoro-chan. Protect yourself against spam and online fraud.

No spammy content.
Please do not refer to sensitive content such as violence, harassment, and pornographic content. However, this rule is not strictly sentenced, since "spammy" is the main(and also a blurry) definition. If you can be sure the content will bring joy and not trouble, go ahead.

Violence of law will be banished.
Again, do not cause trouble. If any contents are related to CP(Child Porn), severe harassment, or privacy poking of other users or site moderators, you WILL be banished.

lakedistrict.social.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.

No disinformation regarding public health issues or political/military campaigns.
Commercial advertising and promotional campaigns are permitted, on the proviso the business being advertised is located in the Lake District or wider Cumbria region.
Unless marked as a parody, there is no impersonation of other individuals, public figures or organisations permitted.
