mastodon.digital-science.com.text: Do not post, share or otherwise transmit anything that is unlawful, fraudulent, misleading, infringes or violates another's rights, pornographic, indecent, false, defamatory, derogatory, threatening, obscene, abusive, offensive, hateful or inflammatory.

Do not post, share or otherwise transmit anything that is likely to harass, upset, annoy, alarm, embarrass or invade the privacy of, any person, deceitful, promotes or advocates an unlawful act or activity, discriminatory, sexually explicit or violent.

Do not post, share or otherwise transmit health or other sensitive personal information, classified, controlled unclassified or other regulated information, personal information of others, or anything which you are not authorised to post, share or transmit
Do not impersonate or misrepresent your affiliation with any person or entity
Do not probe, scan, or test the vulnerability of any system or network
Do not tamper with, breach or otherwise circumvent any security or authentication measure
Do not access or use any non-public area / content or shared area you have not been invited to
Do not interfere with or disrupt any user, host, or network
Do not introduce, or otherwise use to facilitate the spread of, spyware or any other malware.
Do not access or search by any means other than our publicly supported interfaces (for example, â€œscrapingâ€)
Do not send unsolicited communications or spam
Do not send altered, deceptive or false source-identifying information, including â€œspoofingâ€ or â€œphishingâ€

Do not infringe any trademark, copyright (including design rights), database rights, or other intellectual property rights, or privacy or other rights, of any other person or breach any contractual or other legal duty

mastodon.dredgelords.com.text:
Dredgelords is a fun clan for GRSM, furry, & ally gamers. We transcend stereotypes, and do not gatekeep people's identities.
Be curious, not cynical.
No discrimination based on race, gender, sexuality, nationality, or age. If you are offended by equality this is not your server.  Those not signing the tolerance treaty are not tolerated.
Content warnings are to be used for distressing, hurtful, depressing or triggering content.  They have other uses too, but those are the required cases.
Use sarcasm, rudeness, or hostile jokes only with people you are already close to and know they are cool with it.
Visit your account settings and set them correctly. Please make regular backups of your account if you value its contents.
Obey USA copyright law.  This server is based in the USA and subject to legal authority therin.
No rules lawyering.  Rules are subject to moderator interpretation. You shall be in the spirit of compassion and acceptance, not the letter of it.

mastodon.draeh.org.text: Zero-tolerance policy for hate speech (racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia/transmisia, misgendering/dead naming, xenophobia, ableism, etc) or illegal activity of any kind.
Be respectful to others. No harassment or trolling is allowed. No violent posts. No personal attacks of any kind.
All NSFW and sexually explicit posts require a Content Warning (CW) AND a Sensitive Media tag. Please add Alt Text descriptions to images and media where appropriate.

Users are expected to behave as a person and not a brand or storefront. Self-promotion is allowed and encouraged (ex. going live posts, links to personal content creation), but please do not spam the Local feed or send direct messages to advertise. Paid advertising/links of any kind is not allowed.
No promotion or discussion of Cryptocurrency, NFTs, or multi-level marketing schemes is allowed.
By applying, you agree to the server rules. A reason for joining is required. Applications with short generic answers (i.e. â€œleaving Twitterâ€) will be declined.

mastodon.ehlo.world.text: Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other peopleâ€™s personally identifying information (â€œdoxingâ€) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.
Do not post adult content, including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention (including sexualized comments or jokes).

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on â€” just keep the toot itself interesting).

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.
Do not â€œshitpostâ€ - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged, there is no place for â€œshitpostingâ€ here.
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour; criticize ideas, never people.

Do not tone police. Toots may violate the standards of civility we set here, but you should not criticize users for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them. In neither case should you criticize their tone.
Do not toot in languages other than French or English (which makes moderation prohibitively difficult).
Do not debate moderation actions in public toots. If you disagree with how a moderator enforced this CoC you may direct-message the moderation team or email moderation@ehlo.world.

mastodon.frl.text: Geen illegale c.q. strafbare inhoud, b.v. (gewelddadige) pornografie met kinderen of zonder toestemming, uitlokking of uitnodiging van illegale diensten, etc, etc...
Geen berichten of links naar inhoud die haatgroepen, terrorisme, massaal geweld of oproepen tot geweld ondersteunt, uitbeeldt of promoot.

Geen berichten of opmerkingen die QAnon-gerelateerde inhoud of soortgelijke weerlegde samenzweringstheorieÃ«n ondersteunen of promoten. Moderators kunnen naar eigen goeddunken beslissen of een bericht in strijd is met deze regel. Vogels zijn echt. De aarde is rond. En doorgaan.
Geen posts of links met geseksualiseerde afbeeldingen van minderjarigen, of ze nu fotografisch, geschreven, getekend, antropomorfisch of geanimeerd zijn.
Alle pornografische, erotische of NSFW-inhoud, in wat voor vorm dan ook, moet worden gemarkeerd met een inhoudswaarschuwing.

Geen visuele content die dierenmishandeling, executies, (zelf)moord, verminking, zichtbare ingewanden, overmatig bloed of verkoolde lichamen afbeeldt. Voor alle andere gewelddadige afbeeldingen is een inhoudswaarschuwing vereist.
Geen spam of plaatsing van kwaadaardige links (zie algemene richtlijnen).
Geen bedreigingen, pesterijen, aanmoediging noch promotie van zelfbeschadiging, of aanvallen op een individu of groep.
Geen accounts die zich voordoen als iemand anders. Duidelijk gemarkeerde parodie accounts uitgezonderd (denk om de volgende regel!).

Accountnamen van (bekende) (merk)namen, plaatsnamen en andere geografisch namen zijn expliciet voorbehouden aan de vertegenwoordigers daarvan.
Moderatoren behouden zich het recht voor een accountnaam te ontnemen en toe te wijzen aan de juiste persoon/vertegenwoordiger.

Geen haatspraak. Aanzetten tot haat wordt gedefinieerd als denigrerende berichten of links gericht op een individu of groep op basis van ras, mentale of fysieke handicap, religie, genderidentiteit, geslacht, nationaliteit, leeftijd, klasse of seksuele geaardheid.
Geen "shitposting" - terwijl humoristische posts zijn toegestaan, en eigenlijk wordt aangemoedigd, maar er is hier geen plaats voor "shitposting".
"bots" onder voorbehoud. Geautomatiseerde accounts die overwegend (door)posten van een andere bron zijn alleen in overleg toegestaan.

mastodon.furrybrigade.net.text:
Since this is a server for everyone, we advise following the basic house rules we have. 
We ask everyone to have common sense. If you know it isn't very kind, stop and do not continue.

Strictly no NSFW.
This server is for everyone and not everyone is open to that kind of stuff

We advise that everyone should respect each member here. We do not want anyone hating each other here as this server is a family-friendly server. If someone is harassing you, let the mods know and they will take things from there
Keep things on the topic. Provided that this is a the PhiliFUR and Furry Brigade instance, all convention-related post or suggestions are open. Also general Philippine furry discussions are allowed.
Strictly no racism or bigotry here. As the 3rd rule says, we advise respecting each other here.
No forms of Drama related to personal or even inside a community. Strictly do not bring up drama here
Spamming is strictly prohibited. Any forms of spamming intending to cause the instance to stop, harassing other users, etc., is not allowed.

mastodon.hams.social.text: We suggest using your radio callsign as your username. If you don't have one yet, want to avoid doxing, or are a SWL that's ok too.

Anyone is welcome to report inappropriate behavior, they will be listened to, and action will be taken. This will be anything from a warning, to banning. Moderation decisions will be made using the Paradox of Tolerance.
Expect anything you post on mastodon.hams.social to be public, including direct messages, that way you can never be surprised or embarrassed.
Any images or videos uploaded to mastodon.hams.social MUST have an appropriate textual description. If you need help with this, please ask!
Your right to free speech does not supersede my right to call you out and kick you out for being a dick.
Please be respectful of others. Their age, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, background, preference for transistors over valves, etc. are all _NOT_ reasons to be a twit.
No spam, no commercial advertising (occasional personal listings are OK), no sexually explicit or violent media (yes that includes pictures of your gun), no threats of violence.
No illegal content - this server is hosted in California, United States.
When apply for an account, if you've actually read these rules, please end your "Why do you want to join?" with the phrase "badger parsnips".

We're trans-inclusive, body-positive, and anti-racist here.
You must be over 18 years of age.
You must have the legal rights to any content you post.

mastodon.ie.text: No bigotry, racism, xenophobia, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, anti-Traveller speech or any hate speech.
We have Threads blocked, just so you know

mastodon.indiegames.online.text: Promotion of your games, projects and storefronts *are* allowed and encouraged, but spam is not. Do *not* directly message users to advertise.

Sexually explicit or gory media must be marked as sensitive and/or hidden under a Content Warning (CW) when posting. Because they cannot be marked, all avatars, headers, and bio content must be appropriate for all audiences.
No racism, sexism, queerphobia, transphobia, xenophobia or bigotry of any kind. No Nazi or alt-right symbolism or ideology.
No harassment, dogpiling, bullying or doxxing.
No content illegal in Canada or the USA.
No NFTs, no crypto, no blockchain.

No content generated using tools like Midjourney and Stable Diffusion which are trained on the works of others without their consent, attribution, or compensation. Procedural generated content, or models trained on properly licensed source data, are allowed.

mastodon.iking.ca.text: No incitement of violence and no promotion of misleading or violent ideologies.
No harassment, dogpiling, or unwanted advances.
No content illegal in Canada or copyrighted content that you don't own rights to.
Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked appropriately.
No spamming. Excessive posting, boosting, advertising or mass-marketing posts will be actioned accordingly and based on intent.
Be yourself. Accounts intended to impersonate or parody are not permitted, and those found to be directly misrepresenting themselves as another person or entity will be actioned accordingly.
Agree to the Terms of Service and Code of Conduct.

mastodon.iow.social.text:
Do:
Using welcoming and inclusive language.
Being respectful of differing viewpoints and experiences.
Gracefully accepting constructive criticism.
Focusing on what is best for the community.
Showing empathy towards other community members.

Do not post:
Sexualised language/imagery/unwelcome sexual attention or advances.
Personal/political attacks inclusive of racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia.
Publishing othersâ€™ private information.
Publish any illegal content in the UK.
Incitement of violence/violent ideologies

Commercial:
Company accounts are welcome but advertising is not permitted on this server. Over promotion, bot like behaviour replying to users, etc. will not be tolerated.

Public interest accounts:
Use of accounts for public figures is encouraged however, we ask you interact with comments and the community and not use your account as a notice board or press release hub by ignoring comments/interactions with other users.

** You must **
Have a link to the IoW (UK) and state how in the signup process.
Requests with no link stated in the "Why do you want to join" will be rejected.

mastodon.jamidisi-edu.de.text: Treat others with respect: Avoid any form of insult, bullying, or discrimination, including but not limited to racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, anti-Semitic, and misogynistic statements or actions against others.
Use appropriate tone: Use a respectful and friendly tone, even if you disagree with someone.
Respect privacy: Do not share personal information without explicit permission and respect the privacy rights of others.
No spam posts: Refrain from publishing unwanted advertising or similar content that does not fit the community.

Mark sensitive content: Please mark any content that may contain common triggers, is sexually explicit or violent as sensitive (CW) to ensure the safety of other members. Note: Accounts that exclusively post such content may be limited or banned.

mastodon.kbpmessick.com.text: Be Respectful: Treat others with courtesy and respect. Avoid offensive language, personal attacks, or any form of discrimination.

No Harassment: Harassment of any form is strictly prohibited. This includes but is not limited to bullying, stalking, or unwanted attention. Additionally, the instance does not tolerate gender-critical, sex and gender discrimination, transphobia, or misogyny.
Content Guidelines: Ensure your posts adhere to our content guidelines. No explicit or adult content, hate speech, or illegal activities are allowed.
Privacy Matters: Respect the privacy of others. Do not share personal information without consent. Report any violations promptly.
Stay On Topic: Keep discussions relevant to the instance's purpose. Off-topic posts may be removed.
No Spam or Self-Promotion: Refrain from spamming or excessive self-promotion. Share content responsibly and engage meaningfully.
Follow Instance Moderation: Follow the guidance of instance moderators. Report issues and cooperate in maintaining a positive community.
Use CWs Appropriately: Utilize Content Warnings (CWs) for sensitive or potentially triggering content. This fosters a considerate environment for all users.
Multiple Accounts: Limit the number of accounts per user to avoid confusion and maintain transparency.
Respect Server Resources: Do not overload the server with excessive posts or activities. Be mindful of resource usage.

Forbidden Topics: Strictly no promotion or gathering of sexual content involving minors, gore, graphic violence, National Socialism, Nazism, Holocaust denial, racism, Alt-Right (disguised as freedom of speech), spreading falsehoods, violence incitement, conspiracy theories, or disinformation.

mastodon.kenpo.social.text: As the famous Wil Wheaton proclaimed, don't be a dick.

You will not engage in any form of harassing, discriminatory, threatening, or offensive speech or behavior including but not limited to race, gender identity and expression, national origin, disability, marital status, age, sexual orientation, or other protected categories.

We strictly prohibit transphobic behavior, hateful speech, and any form of violence targeted towards transgender individuals. Our commitment is to create a platform where everyone feels welcome and respected.
Clearly content warn (content and discussions considered of mature or possible traumatic nature [gore, war, trauma, etc.]). Keep it safe for the casual observer.
No promotion of gambling, Crypto, NFTs, anti-vaccination, self-harm, terrorism, illegal activities, abuse/exploitation, or violence.

Be Kind and Respectful. Donâ€™t be racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist, fatphobic, etc.
Use the report system. If a user or instance is breaking the rules, we recommend just reporting the content and not engaging.
Must consider others at all times.

mastodon.llarian.net.text: If your actions are causing the moderation load to become too high, you will be removed, even if it isn't your fault.

Any illegal content will be moderated and will likely result in your being banned.

Just don't do it.

Be kind to your peers! Treat others with empathy and respect.

mastodon.monotropa-satellite.social.text: Do not share copyrighted material without permission. Credit artists.
Comments about the story, as it is unfolding, should go on https://lovenotfound.com instead of here.

mastodon.moonling.nl.text: When posting sexually explicit or violent media, it is mandatory to mark it as sensitive.
Spam or advertising is strictly prohibited.
Incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies is strictly forbidden.
Harassment, dogpiling, or doxxing of other users is not allowed.
Posting illegal content is strictly prohibited.
Please be aware that privacy is not guaranteed on this server or anywhere on Mastodon. Assume that everything you post, including direct messages (DMs), is publicly visible.
Sharing fake news, disinformation, or misinformation is not permitted.
This server adheres to the legal requirements set forth by Dutch legislation, ensuring full compliance with applicable local laws and regulations.

mastodon.monoceros.co.za.text:
No illegal content.
Don't post anything that is illegal under South African law. This includes hate speech, and racism.

All admin's decisions are final.
This is not a public server.

mastodon.moule.world.hint: Absolutely ZERO tolerance for content illegal in the USA (server host) or Australia (operated from) or the promotion of them, such as pedophilia/CSAM (including lolicon, shotacon etc.), zoophilia, necrophilia, beastiality, animal abuse, rape, incest, terrorism, terrorists or other extremists, copyright violations, crime instructions, and all other crimes. Relevant authorities will be reported to if need be.

No racism, sexism, ableism,  all forms of queerphobia (homophobia, biphobia, transphobia, aphobia etc), promotion of so-called "conversion therapy", Islamophobia, antisemitism, xenophobia, body-shaming, white supremacy, fascism, nazism, casteism, eugenics, or any other hateful, discriminatory, or harmful ideology.
No conspiracy theories, propaganda, pseudoscience, disinformation campaigns, sensationalism, alarmism, clickbait, or similar. Nothing shared from unreliable sources.
No sealioning, gaslighting, targeted deadnaming or misgendering, witch-hunting, dogpiling, or other forms of harassment or toxic behaviour.

No stalking, doxxing, or uploading others' information without their consent. No bots nor anyone who ignores no-index requests or scrapes / reposts othersâ€™ media without their consent. No linking to websites that disrespect user privacy, like demanding account creation or disabling ad-blockers and browser extensions, or have a lot of trackers or commercial interests.

While this instance values all forms of self-expression, including sex work and consensually-created not safe for work (NSFW) media, it aims for an experience of the Fediverse that is safe for work (SFW). Therefore, interactions with users and instances that post or link to NSFW alt accounts or media (including behind content warnings), such as porn or sexually suggestive media, gore, violence, or shock media, will be limited. Adult nudity in the context of artistic, medical, educational, non-pornographic (i.e., not intended to provoke or focus on sexual arousal), and non-gory expression is not considered NSFW but should be behind a content warning.

No trolling, intentionally starting arguments, nor spamming hashtags with off-topic posts. No spamming links to scams or malware. No federation with users and instances with high posting rates that could overwhelm smaller instances such as this one, or instances with no moderation and open sign-ups that could easily become spam vectors.

Use concise and descriptive alt text in all media uploads and only boost media with alt text. Respect everyoneâ€™s identity by referring to them by how they wish to identify. Only link to resources with good accessibility. Remember intersectionality, check your privilege, and take steps to dismantle all forms of systemic oppression and be more inclusive of others.

This server encourages frequent use of content warnings, especially on posts referencing triggers such as (but not limited to): food, eye contact, controversial topics, medical procedures, media that could cause eye strain or seizures, loud media, insects, wounds, nudity, death or dying, references to tragic or traumatic events, substance use, media spoilers, mental health, or anything else that may be triggering for others or otherwise would merit a content warning. No federation with instances that regularly post such topics without content warnings.

When uploading media, always research and cite the original creator of the media. Respect the media's license. No plagiarism or posting others' work without permission or citation. This includes media generated by "AI" models which are trained on scraped media without their authors' consent.
Do NOT justify or threaten ANYONE with violence, death, nor encouraging self-harm nor suicide, not even as a "joke". Do not encourage others to threaten these.
This instance reserves the right to defederate from other instances for reasons not outlined in these Server Rules.

mastodon.modspil.dk.text: Be excellent to each other. No hate speech. Any language is allowed.

mastodon.murkworks.net.text: DON'T be a dick. That's not a suggestion; we use active moderation against racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia. Trans men are men, trans women are women. If you disagree, don't be here.
The easier it is for me to maintain this server, the more likely it stays up long term. See rule 1!
If we don't know you personally, you can't have an account. We're confident we can handle 20 people (up from *two* two weeks ago) but we are resource-limited. Really. Stop asking.

As we operate under United States jurisdiction, we are required to follow DMCA protocols. Here is a copy of our DMCA statement and compliance rules: https://solarbird.net/mastodon.html - please do not make us have to use them.

While we are a private instance, we can be required to turn over user data where required by law or by order or other legal requirement of a court, administrative or law enforcement agency, or governmental entity.

Data posted here but replicated to other instances can be similarly subpoenaed in those instances under the terms of their local laws. This information includes but is not limited to posted content and identifying information such as IP addresses.

No new links to Twitter as of 2 June 2023.

I will not be in any way aid Elon Musk's alt-right propaganda machine, or a man who personally sticks anti-trans propaganda video in the faces of tens of millions of people.

If that is not acceptable, you are welcome to migrate to another instance.

mastodon.myocci.social.text:
Sexually explicit or violent media are not allowed on this instance
This includes content that is particularly provocative even if it may not show specific body parts, as well as dead bodies, bloody injuries, and other gore. Particularly obscene content are prohibited entirely.

No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, xenophobia, or casteism.
Transphobic behavior such as intentional misgendering and deadnaming is strictly prohibited. Promotion of "conversion therapy" is strictly prohibited. Criticism is permissible unless being used for discrimination.

No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
Calling for people or groups to be assassinated, murdered, or attacked physically is strictly prohibited. Support for violent groups or events is prohibited.

No harassment, block evasion, dogpiling, or doxxing of others
Repeat attempts to communicate with users who have blocked you to solely to harass or insult individuals is strictly prohibited. Coordinated activity to attack other users is prohibited. Doxing is prohibited.

Do not share information widely-known to be false and misleading
False and misleading information and links from low-quality sources may not be posted, especially if they are likely to mislead or confuse others or endanger their safety.

mastodon.naturalorder.me.text: Always remember Wheaton's Law.   Don't be a dick.
If you are experiencing harassment, contact @admin, I've no compunctions about banning users/instances if they're violating rule 1.
If you're going to be Racist/Homophobic/Transphobic, just save me the trouble, and don't bother, I will ban you.

No AI/ML Clause.  You are prohibited from using any data/content from this website for training or developing any artificial intelligence or machine learning model.  Any unauthorized use of data for AI/ML purposes will be considered a violation of copyright law and may result in legal action.

This instance does not agree with, nor consent to the "bridging" of any content to any closed platform, such as BlueSky, Reddit, Twitter, or any other platform that is not using the ActivityPub protocol.

mastodon.mythoughtprocess.info.text:
This is a place for free, uncensored discourse. 

Be respectful. Be reasonable. Be strong! Be free! Don't threaten any person or any person's property. That is illegal, and if you threaten someone on this server, I will assist in any way, with prosecution.
Grow a thick skin. Learn to be talked to aggressively, and sometimes, shouted at.
If you don't like it, leave. This place is not public. It is not yours. And you have no entitlement to anything other than an adherence to the LAWS. And your feelings do not govern this server.

mastodon.nz.text: You MUST describe your link to NZ as part of your reason for wanting to join on the next page. Applications without this will be declined. You must be a kiwi or honorary kiwi, at home or abroad, to join Mastodon.nz.
You may only have one account on Mastodon.nz and be at least 13 years of age.
Personal accounts only. We do not allow bots, commercial, business, organisation or purely promotional accounts.
Automated cross-posting from other services such as twitter is considered to be a bot and is not allowed. If you have a blog or something and you want feed that through, this is generally fine.

No spamming. The occasional mention of your shop, fundraiser etc. is fine. It's hard to give a defined daily limit of what constitutes spam. Personal or professional (i.e. Mutual Aid/Kickstarters) fundraisers must be clearly tagged as such.

Content Warnings are mandatory on posts containing gore and/or violence. Posts about politics must be tagged one or more of #nzpol, #tÅrangapÅ«, #pol, and/or #politics, and optionally may be content warned.
No impersonation of others. We may consider obvious parody accounts, but they must be agreed with @theMods in advance.
No hate speech, racism, sexism, ableism, homophobia or transphobia.
No illegal content, gore or violence for the sake of it, incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies or conspiracy theories.
No NSFW content. A bit of casual swearing is fine, but don't be derogatory or aggressive to other users (see rule 12).
Be kind. No abuse or harassment will be tolerated.
Content hosted on Mastodon.nz or produced by its users may not be reused outside of the fediverse without the express permission of the author(s).
Mastodon.nz complies with copyright laws. We expect you to as well. Your content must be your own or acceptable use.

Image descriptions: It is expected that users will add image descriptions to their uploads for
our visually impaired users. Unless there is a reason you can not, you must do so.
Copy of rules with more detailed guidance can be found at https://mastodon.nz/rules.pdf

Focus on what is best not just for us as individuals, but for the overall community

mastodon.online.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, xenophobia, or casteism.
mastodon.online.hint: Transphobic behavior such as intentional misgendering and deadnaming is strictly prohibited. Promotion of "conversion therapy" is strictly prohibited. Criticism of governments and religions is permissible unless being used as a proxy for discrimination.

mastodon.online.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive or with a content warning
mastodon.online.hint: This includes content that is particularly provocative even if it may not show specific body parts, as well as dead bodies, bloody injuries, and other gore. Particularly obscene content may be prohibited entirely. Profile pictures and header images may not contain sexually explicit or violent media.

mastodon.online.text: No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
mastodon.online.hint: Calling for people or groups to be assassinated, murdered, or attacked physically is strictly prohibited. Support for violent groups or events is prohibited.

mastodon.online.text: No harassment, block evasion, dogpiling, or doxxing of others
mastodon.online.hint: Repeat attempts to communicate with users who have blocked you or creation of accounts solely to harass or insult individuals is strictly prohibited. Coordinated activity to attack other users is prohibited. Posting of private personal information about others is prohibited.

mastodon.online.text: Do not share information widely-known to be false and misleading
mastodon.online.hint: False and misleading information and links from low-quality sources may not be posted, especially if they are likely to mislead or confuse others or endanger their safety.

mastodon.online.text: Content created by others must be attributed, and use of generative AI must be disclosed
mastodon.online.hint: Content created by others must clearly provide a reference to the author, creator, or source. For adult content, this should include performers. Accounts may not solely post AI-generated content.

mastodon.nzoss.nz.text: No automated cross posting from Twitter, RSS, or other services.
No spam (blatant advertising without relevant thoughtful content).
Descriptions required for images and video (ALT tag) to support those with sight issues.
In the event of a dispute, site administrators' decisions are made on a good faith basis (informed by the NZOSS Code of Conduct) and are final.
No racism, sexism, ableism, transphobia, or otherwise harassing individuals for what they are.
No commercial accounts for proprietary products. We want real people and Free and Open Source Software/Hardware projects (commercial is fine).
Be civil and be kind. If you need to criticise, punch up, never down. Hate speech, intended to incite or offend, is not acceptable.

mastodon.praxis.red.text: Do not behave in a way that would cause an outside force to act on you to prevent what you're doing from harming another living being.

mastodon.pretendo.network.text: Treat everyone with respect. Absolutely no harassment, witch hunting, sexism, racism, or hate speech, etc, will be tolerated.

No NSFW or obscene content. This includes text, images, or links featuring nudity, sex, hard violence, or other graphically disturbing content. Swearing and other strong language is allowed as long as it is not over used or used in a way to insult/harm others.
No spam or self-promotion (server invites, advertisements, etc) without permission from a developer/staff member, unless otherwise allowed by the channel.

Do not share/discuss anything illegal. This includes, but is not limited to, game/firmware dumps, any parts of any console SDK, etc. If it feels illegal, it probably is. If you aren't sure, don't share it. Do not share downloads or links to tools which promote piracy.
Keep all discussion in English, please. This makes moderation a lot easier, so we ask you to please use a translation service if necessary.

mastodon.raddemo.host.text: Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other peopleâ€™s personally identifying information (â€œdoxingâ€) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.
Do not post adult content, including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention (including sexualized comments or jokes).

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on â€” just keep the toot itself interesting).

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the Raddemo community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.
Do not â€œshitpostâ€ - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged, there is no place for â€œshitpostingâ€ on Raddemo.
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behavior; criticize ideas, never people.

Do not tone police. Toots may violate the standards of civility we set on Raddemo, but you should not criticize users for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them. In neither case should you criticize their tone.
Do not toot in languages other than English (which makes moderation prohibitively difficult).
Do not debate moderation actions in public toots. If you disagree with how a moderator enforced this CoC you may direct-message the moderation team or email team@raddemo.host.

mastodon.radio.text: We suggest using your radio callsign as your username. If you don't have one yet, plan to change it soon, want to avoid doxing, or just enjoy listening, that's ok too.
Please be respectful of others. Their age, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, background, preference for transistors over vales, etc. are all _NOT_ reasons to be a twit

Anyone is welcome to report inappropriate behaviour, they will be listened to, and action will be taken. This will be anything from a warning, to banning. Moderation decisions will be made using the Paradox of Tolerance.
Expect anything you post on mastodon.radio to be public, including direct messages, that way you can never be surprised or embarrassed
Any images or videos uploaded to mastodon.radio _MUST_ have an appropriate textual description. If you need help with this, please ask!
Your right to free speech does not supersede my right to call you out and kick you out for being a dick
No spam, no commercial advertising (occasional personal listings are OK), no sexually explicit or violent media (yes that includes pictures of your gun), no threats of violence.
No illegal content - this server is hosted in UK
When apply for an account, if you've actually read these rules, please end your "Why do you want to join?" with the phrase "hippo cornflakes"

mastodon.redgarterclub.com.text: 1) This instance does contain sexually explicit content and language. No one under 18 or who cannot view explicit adult content under the law will be allowed. Violators will be removed post haste.

2) Debate is welcome here, but be civil and respectful. However, snark or smack towards those who are obviously disrespectful or just being plain scmucky will be allowed at my discretion. To avoid that, simply don't be a schmuck or a bootyhole.

3) THIS IS A PRO SEX-WORK/PRO-SEX WORKER INSTANCE. My bias is clear and distinct; I am for full decriminalization of sex work and full and free adult sexual expression and exchange. Don't come here expecting to change my core beliefs; you won't be successful.

Consensual sexual adult speech and media is more than welcome here. However, it's strongly suggested for the sake of respect towards the squeamish and sensitive that you label any nudity or explicit sexual content as "sensitive".

Do not upload any content that does not involve legal consensual *adult* sexual acts, images, or language. Also, sexual content involving animals or children, scat, golden showers, or lack of consent IS STRICTLY PROHIBITED, and subject to instant removal and banishment of its provider.

Spamming of links to adult sites is strictly prohibited and subject to instant banishment. Linkage to official adult sites of performers is allowed, as long as it goes to the splash pages of the content providers, or to legitimate fan support sites. "Catfishing" to fake sites is strictly prohibited.

This instance is explicitly and very much Left of center. I toot from a sex-positive feminist/Independent Left/Socialist POV; and my opinions are mine alone. Take it as you wish. Your opinions of me do not matter, unless I make it so.

I reserve to myself as administrator and moderator of this instance the right to run it as I see fit, and my decisions are final, and not subject to debate. This is not a free carrier for abuse, hate, bigotry, poop posting, or otherwise hostile speech. Don't temp fate!

mastodon.scot.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia (including targeted misgendering, deadnaming, or promotion of so-called 'conversion therapy').
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No harassment of other users on this or other servers.
No content illegal in the following countries: United Kingdom, Germany
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No disinformation regarding public health issues or political/military campaigns.
No spam. This includes commercial advertising, promotion of services, and SEO.
No impersonation of other individuals, public figures or organisations, unless clearly marked as a parody.
All automated (bot) accounts must enable the bot flag in their account preferences, respect #nobot markers, and post as unlisted unless making less than one post per hour.

mastodon.seattlematrix.org.text: Do unto others as you think they would want done to them.
Mark sensitive content with a Content Warning.
Gratuitously obscene content serving no practical benefit to a discussion is not permitted.
Illegal content such as child pornography, unsurprisingly, is not permitted.
Spam is not permitted, this includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services.
Hate speech, abusive or threatening behavior is not permitted.
Lack of a specific rule does not mean something is permitted.
Violating one or more of these rules may result in an immediate, permanent ban without notice or warning.
You may not impersonate a person or brand without a clear indication that the account is unofficial and/or parody.
No attacks against (or from) the instance.
Above borrowed with love from Infosec.Exchange

mastodon.sdf.org.text: This server abides by the Mastodon Covenant
Organizations are welcome to engage with the community in a non-commercial, non-advertising manner.
Artists, musicians, writers and artisans are welcome to engage with the community regarding their craft.
Do not engage in harassment, hateful content or posts of a derogatory nature.
Do not make advertising posts for the sake of purely promoting a commercial product or service.
Content originating from this site may not be used for machine training or other data mining activities without the individual author's consent.

mastodon.snmsoc.org.text: No racism. However, "reverse racism" does not exist.
No sex worker-exclusionary radical feminism allowed.
No sectarianism. Marxist-Leninists, Maoists, and Trotskyists are all allowed. So are anarchist allies (but not anarcho-capitalists).
No vote-shaming. Referring to Sanders voters derogatorily or as "Bernie Bros" will get you banned.
No crypto bros/NFT advocates. We are firmly opposed to these late-stage capitalist ideas.

mastodon.social.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive or with a content warning
mastodon.social.hint: This includes content that is particularly provocative even if it may not show specific body parts, as well as dead bodies, bloody injuries, and other gore. Particularly obscene content may be prohibited entirely. Profile pictures and header images may not contain sexually explicit or violent media.

mastodon.social.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, xenophobia, or casteism.
mastodon.social.hint: Transphobic behavior such as intentional misgendering and deadnaming is strictly prohibited. Promotion of "conversion therapy" is strictly prohibited. Criticism of governments and religions is permissible unless being used as a proxy for discrimination.

mastodon.social.text: No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
mastodon.social.hint: Calling for people or groups to be assassinated, murdered, or attacked physically is strictly prohibited. Support for violent groups or events is prohibited.

mastodon.social.text: No harassment, block evasion, dogpiling, or doxxing of others
mastodon.social.hint: Repeat attempts to communicate with users who have blocked you or creation of accounts solely to harass or insult individuals is strictly prohibited. Coordinated activity to attack other users is prohibited. Posting of private personal information about others is prohibited.

mastodon.social.text: Do not share information widely-known to be false and misleading
mastodon.social.hint: False and misleading information and links from low-quality sources may not be posted, especially if they are likely to mislead or confuse others or endanger their safety.

mastodon.social.text: Content created by others must be attributed, and use of generative AI must be disclosed
mastodon.social.hint: Content created by others must clearly provide a reference to the author, creator, or source. For adult content, this should include performers. Accounts may not solely post AI-generated content.

mastodon.snld.ca.text: Respect others: Avoid hate speech, bullying, and harassment. Treat others with kindness, respect, and understanding, regardless of their background, beliefs, or opinions.
Embrace Diversity: Celebrate and embrace differences in race, ethnicity, religion, gender, sexual orientation, and more.
No Spam or Scams: Avoid posting spam, excessive self-promotion, excessive advertising, or false information.
Be Mindful of Content: Be mindful of the content you post. Avoid posting explicit or graphic material and respect others' privacy by not sharing their personal information without their consent.
No Trolling or Incitement: Avoid engaging in trolling or inciting others, including making inflammatory comments or starting arguments.
Follow the Law: Do not engage in any illegal activities or post content that violates any laws or regulations.
Have Fun: This is a social platform, so remember to have fun and enjoy the community!

mastodon.stickbear.me.text: ABSOLUTELY ZERO TOLERANCE of child pornography, or discussions of minors in inappropriate and explicit manners.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No content illegal in Canada, The United States, or copyrighted content that you don't own rights to.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
Do not share false or misleading information that may lead to physical harm.

Be Decent Do not harass, insult, discriminate against, or otherwise intentionally harm other users of any kind, local or federated. Do not deliberately spread misinformation, including pseudoscience and conspiracy theories.
Parody and accounts intended to impersonate are not permitted.
Be Sentient Avoid creating advertising or bot accounts on this instance without permission. There may be exceptions, but it is best to consult with either of the administrators before going ahead.
Be Lawful Do not post or link to content that could get us hit with a violation of copyright. Only post personally identifiable information if you have explicit permission to do so.

Be Mindful Politics, Religion, and other controversial topics should be posted behind a content warning. Be mindful of people you interact with, as they may have had experiences drastically different from yours, including severe psychological or physical trauma.

Describe your content. Please try to describe your media posts to the best of your ability to accommodate disabilities such as blindness and deafness. If you cannot do so, there is nothing wrong with asking for help. Currently, tagging @ImageCaptionsPls@a.gup.pe is the best way to do so.
Please post any sexual content as Unlisted or stricter, and make sure to add an appropriate content warning.

Cross posting (using software to post the same content on multiple social media services) is only allowed if you regularly check your account here and interact with notifications. IMPORTANT: Please do not cross post twitter retweets or quoted tweets!

bans, violators, etc. If you are caught violating these rules you will be informed of your violation, exactly what the violation is, and depending on the sevarity of the violation your account may be suspended or perminantly terminated with or without warning.

coming from another instance. If your coming over from somewhere else, due to being terminated, your account is subject to stricter review and limitations. Note that even if your account is approved, if violations come to light, from instances you left previously, your account may be terminated.

The password When signing up, please include the following password alongside your reason in the why you'd like to join text. woof. This ensures to us that you have indeed read and will abide by the rules set forth in this instance! make a complete sentence with the password in it if you can!

mastodon.teia.art.text:
Read the Full Code of Conduct/Core Values/Terms & Conditions document here:
https://github.com/teia-community/teia-docs/wiki/Core-Values-Code-of-Conduct-Terms-and-Conditions#code-of-conduct
We do not condone harassment or abuse against any member in any community environment, online or offline, for any reason. Abusive actors can get banned from any Teia related spaces.
Be civil and respect each other. Don't harass, impersonate, or belittle others. Respect each others personal boundaries.
Don't post spam or vandalize the space.
Look for ways to contribute and find positive solutions. Stay open minded and empathetic around areas of improvements. And take initiative to help out where you can.
If you see something wrong, voice it and try to help people without a voice.

Content warnings: 
Please post any content that may be deemed NSFW/disturbing behind mastodon's content warning feature to keep this place safe for all.

mastodon.tekdmn.me.text: Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other peopleâ€™s personally identifying information (â€œdoxingâ€) constitutes harassment.

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on â€” just keep the toot itself interesting).
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.

Remember that different communities may have different standards for communication, choice of words, and expectations of civility. It's not your job to determine what is and is not acceptable tone, topic, or language, for the greater Mastodon community.

mastodon.theshowshow.tv.text: Impersonation is strictly forbidden. Anyone caught impersonating may face account termination. Impersonation does not necessarily mean a specific person. It can also mean using misleading usernames (E.g., containing "admin").

Keep it friendly. We all have good days, and we all have bad days. Some of us are wicked video producers with tons of experience, and others are brand new to the content creator game. This is a place where no matter how your day is going, you'll treat other people with respect.

Try to be helpful. A big part of this community is about sharing our own experience and knowledge with others. Have you created a tutorial? Publish it here. See a question or struggling creator? Share your knowledge. Let's build a great community together.

This server is for content creators. Clearly, the discussion doesn't always have to be about content creation or production, however if you are not a content creator, this is not the server for you. Please read the About page for more details about the focus of this server.

On this server, we respect all people. Period. If you disrespect any person or group, or attempt to use our server as a "platform" for your own agenda which could be perceived as disrespectful toward any other person or group, your account may be terminated at our moderator's discretion.

mastodon.tinyfox.dev.text: All images featuring animals must be suitable for all ages, including minors, and must not contain any explicit, graphic or violent content.
No images of animal cruelty or abuse will be tolerated. This includes but is not limited to images of animals being hunted, trapped, or subjected to any form of physical harm or violence.
Images of animals in captivity or in zoos must be respectful and not exploit the animals in any way.

Images of animals in the wild must not disturb their natural habitats or behaviors. This includes but is not limited to images of animals being fed by humans or interacting with human-made structures.
No images featuring dead or hunted animals for sport or personal gain will be allowed. This includes images of taxidermy or hunting trophies.
Any images featuring animals must have proper context and should not be used for misinformation or spreading false information.
If an image featuring an animal is posted, it must not be used to promote or glorify speciesism, hate speech or any form of discrimination.

All images featuring animals must be in accordance with the laws and regulations related to the treatment and depiction of animals, including but not limited to animal welfare laws, endangered species laws, and wildlife protection laws.
Any image that does not comply with these rules may be removed by the server administrators without prior notice. Repeat offenders may face temporary or permanent bans from the server.

If you have any questions or concerns about these rules, please reach out to the server administrators for clarification. We aim to maintain a safe and respectful environment for all users, including our animal friends.
Replies to posts featuring animals must also adhere to the same guidelines and rules listed above.

No inappropriate or offensive comments will be allowed in response to animal posts. This includes but is not limited to hate speech, abusive language, or derogatory comments about the animal or its species.
Replies should be respectful and not exploit or degrade the animal depicted in the post.
All opinions and discussions in replies should be based on facts and credible information. Misinformation or spreading false information about the animal or its species will not be tolerated.
We encourage all users to engage in respectful and educational discussions about animals, their habitats, and their welfare. Let's work together to promote empathy and compassion for all species.

mastodon.vaporghost.at.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive or with a content warning
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia and in general discrimination
Do not promote violence or violent ideologies
No harassment, doxxing and so on
Do not share information widely-known to be false and misleading
Content created by others must be attributed
Respect other peoples opinions and boundaries (don't be a prick)

mastodon.vervainglobal.com.text: Nothing illegal that's going to land any of us in hot water.

mastodon.vlaanderen.text: Be friendly and keep it civilized
This server is no place for hate speech, racism,fascism, and other forms of abusive behavior.
No things that infringes Belgian law such as child pornography or EU law by extent
Server admin(s) can change these rules at any time if needed. These will be communicated in the announcements
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
Do not intentionally share misleading information

Organizations and companies must use their organization/company e-mail address when signing up. Although we reccomend that they set-up their own instance or using an managed hosted Mastodon platform (see ToS)
Do not try to inpersonate other users or brands. Unless it's a parody. But keep it civilized.
Use content warnings (CW) where needed such as spoilers and 'sensitive' posts that may trigger other people.
Please consult the @admin if you want to use a bot account on this instance.
Posting excessive amount of ads or self promotion is disallowed

mastodon.vhack.eu.text: Do not post anything that discriminates or advocates for discriminating against a certain group of  people (e.g. racism, homophobia, transphobia, misogyny, etc.)
Use content warnings for sensitive content like NSFW content, politics or (mental) health

mastodon.vshn.social.text:
VSHN Corporate Content only

This is the corporate instance of VSHN AG, only active employees are allowed to have an account.

mastodon.vhome.info.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
No false or misleading information that may lead to physical harm

mastodon.vtip.me.text: No spoilers (unless properly marked and warned)!
No racism, sexism, anti-Semitism, transphobia, homophobia, ableism or gender discrimination will be tolerated!
Don't be a jerk!  Be kind to others.  No trolling, harassment, personal attacks, doxing, dog piling or overall a**holery.
No violent threats or incitement to violence!
No disinformation or misinformation. Spread quality information to the community.
When in doubt ask. NSFW items should be avoided (unless it's good)!
Don't just sit there! Introduce yourself when you become a member!
Don't be offended if this is not the right community for you. Come and go as you wish. Invite others you think would enjoy and contribute to this community.
Be mindful!  This is a public forum.  Unless you know how to (i.e. DM) do not share phone numbers, email addresses, home address, locations where you are or will be, etc.
Remember this is a private server!  No guarantees it will be around forever or safeguard your data. Use at your own risk!!
Use common internet sense. While people here may seem nice, they may not be.  Do not communicate with people you don't know outside this space unless you take precautions.
Unless otherwise noted, this is not a place for kids.  18 and over please.

mastodon.vapronva.pw.text: Mark NSFW or explicit content as sensitive. This content, however, is generally discouraged.
Harassment, doxxing, or any form of bullying is strictly prohibited.
All posts and shared content must adhere to the laws of Russia.
Discrimination or hate speech of any kind is forbidden. Uphold an environment of inclusivity and respect.
Be civil, considerate, and kind. In simple terms, don't be a dick to others.
No excessive self-promotion or spamming; avoid posting repetitive, irrelevant, or disruptive content.
Respect copyright and intellectual property rights â€” do not post copyrighted material without the proper authorization.

mastodon.well.com.text: Do not use slurs based on race, gender, sexuality, religion, ethnicity or national origin.

Do not promote violence toward or engage in harassment of any individual or group. â€œHarassmentâ€ includes posting private information that makes it easier for others to target an individual ("doxing"). Harassment may also include taunting, being deliberately provocative or posting in bad faith.

Do not use your account to post irrelevant advertisements, promote high-risk investment opportunities, or link to sites that may install malware. Announcing, linking to or promoting your own work
is allowed.
Do not knowingly or repeatedly spread misinformation, especially about important topics of public concern such as elections or epidemics.

Demonstrate awareness of community expectations and use best practices for hiding explicit posts and graphic images behind content warnings. Use privacy tools to limit the audience for your posts if appropriate.
Follow relevant laws, including the DMCA. See https://www.well.com/tools-and-help/member-agreement/ and  https://www.well.com/tools-and-help/dmca-policy/ for complete rules

mastodon.world.text: No illegal content, e.g. child pornography, solicitation of illegal services, etcâ€¦
No posts or links to content supporting, featuring, or promoting hate groups, terrorism, mass violence or calls to violence.

No posts or comments supporting or promoting QAnon related content or similarly disproven conspiracy theories. Moderators have sole discretion to decide if a post violates this rule. Birds are real. The Earth is round. Get over it.
No posts or links featuring sexualized depictions of minors, whether photographic, written, drawn, anthropomorphic or animated.
No pornography featuring depictions of rape or non-consensual violence.
A Content Warning must always be used when posting all other pornographic, erotic or NSFW content, whether photographic, written, drawn or animated.
No visual content depicting executions, murder, suicide, dismemberment, visible innards, excessive gore, or charred bodies. All other violent imagery requires a Content Warning.
No visual content depicting animal abuse. All other posts related to animal abuse require a Content Warning.
No threats, bullying or attacks on an individual or group.
No encouragement or promotion of self-harm.
No accounts that impersonate anyone else unless clearly marked as such for the purpose of parody.

No Hate Speech. Hate speech is defined as derogatory posts or links targeting any individual or group based on race, mental or physical disability, religion, gender identity, sex, nationality, age, class or sexual orientation.
No â€œshitpostingâ€ - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged, there is no place for â€œshitpostingâ€ here.
No targeted misgendering, deadnaming, or promotion of so-called "conversion therapy".
Banner and Avatar images must comply with the other rules, so no NSFW images etc

mastodononline.com.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive or with a content warning
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, xenophobia, or casteism.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies

mastodonsweden.se.text: Must follow Code of Conduct, and you must be able to read the CoC which is found in Swedish down below.
Content must adhere to Swedish or European laws.
Absolutely no harassment of any kind, this is covered by the CoC.
Anything remotely NSFW should be labeled as such and hidden and is in general not advised to post at all. Like blood, gore, violence, sexual images and videos.
No advertising. You may advertise your own work to a reasonable extent, reports from users and moderators discretion decide what is reasonable.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:    
Excessive advertising, Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, 
Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:    
Racism, Sexism, Casteism or advocation of thereof

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:    
Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof,

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:    
 Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism, Spreading disinformation or conspiracy theories that undermine public health

The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:    
Sexual depictions of children, Content illegal in Sweden, Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

mcr.wtf.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No harassment of other users on this or other servers.
No content illegal in the United Kingdom
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No disinformation regarding public health issues or political/military campaigns.
No impersonation of other individuals, public figures or organisations, unless clearly marked as a parody.
No spam or SEO. Accounts existing entirely or mostly of spam will be suspended. Self promotion and limited advertising is acceptable, especially where relevant to the community.
No posting in languages other than English. Unfortunately this makes moderation impossible for us.

medic.cafe.text: No snake oil, no "alternative" medicine. We keep it evidence based.
We're here to interact, meaning we do not allow bot-only accounts and view accounts auto-posting without any interaction in the comments or others' content with suspicion.
Hate speech, any form of discrimination, anything that violates the First Law, "do no harm," is strictly forbidden and will lead to a ban.

meemu.org.text: Content warnings required. Use common sense with Content Warnings(CWs). Tag nudity, politics, violence, and kink content. Tag anything lewd, or inappropriate for an office environment, generally considered stuff the average person wouldn't wish to see at work.
Don't abuse crossposting. Crossposters from other services must be CW'd and set as unlisted.
Use image descriptions as much as you can.
Harassment and abusive behaviors are not allowed. This includes harassing other instances because you disagree with their policies

We have a zero tolerance policy for racism, sexism, homophobia, promotion of right wing/nazi ideology, transphobia, ableism, animal abuse. We reserve the right to expand this list at moderator discretion for topics we may have missed.

No advertising This means no accounts on behalf or brands, or accounts representing organizations and/or for the purpose of advertisement allowed. Exceptions: personal accounts promoting artistic services like commissions.

You must be at least 18 years of age to register. Although we aren't an adult-oriented instance, we do federate with instances which are, and we cannot guarantee the timeline to be suitable for minors.
No AI generated content, promoting cryptocurrencies, NFTs, or blockchains.

meh.social.text: All People registering an account on meh social are accepting these rules as the starting point for conduct guidance. You are also agreeing to review and abide by our to abide by our full Code of Conduct described in our About section.

No Person registering a meh.social account shall use the account for harassment, threat or intimidation, nor to compromise the safety, privacy or comfort of any other person on this or any other instance.

The following are not permitted anywhere on meh.social: Holocaust denial and Nazi symbolism; promotion of fascist, supremacist, violent or hateful ideology or symbolism, including in choice of user name or avatar; willful mis/disinformation that may harm others.

The following are not permitted on the Public timelines: graphic sexual, violent, or otherwise disturbing images without a content/media warning; excessive advertising, spam, or excessive cross-posting; post forwarding from other instances/networks, including bots and repeaters.
No Person shall engage in behavior disruptive to the ongoing communication amongst others; if you are asked to cease an interaction or contact, publicly or personally, you will do so.

If a participant engages in behavior that does not conform to these rules, the admins may take any action they deem appropriate, up to and including deletion of an account from meh.social and identifying the participant publicly as someone about whom we've received complaints.

megalonyx.social.text: Be a personal friend of Al. This really is a private server for a couple of people.

meghadeep.social.text: Be Meghadeep Roy Chowdhury, or his pets (his fur babies, not the other kind).

megatherium.org.text: Megatherium.org is a private server. We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone at any time for any reason.
Posting of the following types of content is not allowed: advertising and spam, pornographic or sexually explicit imagery, graphic violence
Harassment of any kind is not allowed. Discrimination on the basis of sex, gender, race, color, national origin, age, disability, etc. is not allowed. Be respectful.
Cat photos are mandatory. If you do not have access to cat photos, other small animal photos may be substituted.

mejia.social.text: Let's keep it simple. We want mejia.social to be inclusive and welcoming to everyone of all ages, nations, races, genders, faiths, and creeds.
Please keep our space safe and family friendly for all . No spamming. No personal attacks. Your opinions are welcome, but we encourage thoughtful conversation over provocation.

I actively moderate and will immediately suspend without appeal and in my sole judgement any account that violates these rules. I also, from time to time, de-federate any servers whose users act as a group to harass or attack this server or our users.
By joining mejia.social you agree to adhere to these rules. Thank you!
Please understand - you have no privacy on this server or anywhere on Mastodon. It's not designed to be private. Assume that anything you post here, including DMs, are publicly visible.
Please DO NOT post any copyrighted material anywhere on this Mastodon instance/server.

melendez.land.text: Respect Others: Treat fellow Mastodon users with kindness and courtesy. Remember that behind every avatar is a real person with feelings.

Mind Your Language: Keep the conversation friendly and inclusive. Avoid offensive language, hate speech, or anything that could make others uncomfortable. We're all adults here, but try to stick to this one :)
No Spamming or Trolling: Nobody likes their feed cluttered with spam. Keep the content meaningful and avoid any form of trolling or harassment.
Mind the Privacy: Be cautious about sharing personal information. Respect the privacy of others and avoid sharing content that could compromise anyone's safety.
Think Before You Post: Take a moment to consider the potential impact of your words. Remember, once it's out there, it's out there.
Give Credit Where Due: If you're sharing content or ideas from others, acknowledge the source.
Report, Don't Retaliate: If you encounter any issues or violations of the rules, report them to the moderators of the server that posted the toot. instead of engaging in confrontation.
Be Patient and Understanding: Not everyone will share your views. Be open to diverse opinions and engage in constructive discussions rather than heated arguments.

mellified.men.text: No trolling, bullying, or harassment of other users, on this instance or elsewhere. Honest conflicts are inevitable, but if someone asks you to leave them alone, you are expected to do so.
No endorsement of racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, anti-Semitism, Islamophobia, or white supremacy. Period. This includes symbols, memes, and jokes.
Mark images in your posts that could be inappropriate for public viewing as "sensitive." This includes graphic violence, sexual content, and images that may be shocking.
Do not publicly reveal the personal information of others. This includes sharing the contents of other users' followers-only posts or direct messages without permission.
All content uploaded to this service must be legal in the United States.
No spamming or otherwise abusing this service. This includes followbots and other bots that interact with users without their consent.

Include a descriptive content warning (CW) if you're posting something that readers will likely find upsetting or prefer to be opt-in. Explicit discussion of sex and violence must always be CW'd. For everything else, use your judgment.

member.ro.text:
Nu postaÈ›i continut ilegal, spam, MLM-uri, conÈ›inut de prost gust.
Marcati continutul NSFW, dacÄƒ este cazul.

mementomori.social.text: Be kind. Be human to one another.
No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No content illegal in the following countries: Finland, United Kingdom, Germany
No harassment of other users on this or other servers.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No disinformation regarding public health issues or political/military campaigns.
No things above "We have questions" in the conspiracy chart. Look it up.
No spam, excess flood. No crypto ads (talking about cryptos and invesments are obviously allowed). No hoaxes. Companies are OK and being active does not equal spam.
No impersonation of other individuals, public figures or organisations, unless clearly marked as a parody.
Accept using Mastodon Bird UI as your main theme. The theme is inspired by Twitter and is not the default Mastodon interface. It is exprerimental and in ongoing development.
Accept modifications to the Mastodon core. The most notable features are: 10000 character limit, bigger link previews, opt-out extensive open text search. See all of them at help.mementomori.social.

Accept the mortal nature of things, that anything can change in any moment and all rights to changes are reserved by the owner of this server (@rolle@mementomori.social). Accept that even though servers are the lifeline of the owner there could still be downtime (see status.mementomori.social).

Accept that we are using the nightly version of Mastodon. We are using the bleeding edge version of Mastodon and it may sometimes contain bugs. Accept that the owner of the server is not responsible of these bugs, they can be reported to github.com/mastodon/mastodon/issues.

memtech.social.text: By joining memtech.social, you are agreeing to follow the Python Code of Conduct (https://www.python.org/psf/conduct/)

mendeddrum.org.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No harassment of other users on this or other servers.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies. No disinformation.
No spam. This includes targeted commercial advertising, promotional campaigns, and SEO. Cans of spam (or pictures thereof) are allowed.
Explicit (NSFW) content must have a content wrapper and/or sensitive media marker but is otherwise allowed.
Don't pose as somebody else, especially not a famous author, except if you are one (writers of official biographies count). Please attribute non-original work. Use of AI must be disclosed.
This server runs on hardware, free time and nerves donated by volunteers. Don't abuse any of the three.
Please do not upload videos; use video services like vimeo, youtube, or other services instead and post a link. This preserves storage and bandwidth and keeps costs down.

mensmaaktmooi.nl.text: Plaats geen projecten zonder bronververmelding (en vergeet vooral jezelf ook niet ;) )

mentalhealth-masto.com.text: No  racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information

No seeking crisis or emergency support.  There is no one here to assist.  This community  is strictly for information and discourse.   If you are having a mental health crisis please call 911 in the United States or emergency services that are provided in your country.

meow.lgbt.text: You must be 18+ to use this service.
Don't post content which is illegal to host in the U.S.
Add content warnings to NSFW or otherwise sensitive material.
Be respectful of the space and of other users (don't be a dick, no racism, transphobia, etc.).

meowr.me.text: No content that's illegal in the UK or the EU

misjump.net.text: This server is US-based, so users must be 13 or older per COPPA

mitchelltribe.social.text: No Sexually explicit or violent media. Please keep our space safe for all and family-friendly. No spamming. No personal attacks. Your opinions are welcome, but we encourage thoughtful conversation over provocation.

I actively moderate and will immediately suspend without appeal and in my sole judgment any account that violates these rules. I also, from time to time, de-federate any servers whose users act as a group to harass or attack this server or our users.
Please understand - you have no privacy on this server or anywhere on Mastodon. It's not designed to be private. Assume that anything you post here, including DMs, are publicly visible.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No content that is illegal in the United States of America, the Portuguese Republic/Portugal or the Republic of France.
If there is an issue you think needs to be brought to attention DM @michael@mitchelltribe.social

mitten.dur.ch.text: You should know me in real life to join.

mkultra.monster.text: We do not tolerate discriminatory behavior and content promoting or advocating the oppression and hate of members of marginalized groups or communities.
We do not tolerate threatening behavior, stalking, and doxxing.
We do not tolerate harassment, including brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user that would be considered block-evading. This includes sea-lioning.
We do not tolerate mobbing, including name-calling, intentional misgendering or deadnaming.
We do not tolerate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
We do not tolerate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above-mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.
Content that is illegal will be deleted and will lead to immediate account suspension.
We do not tolerate spam, including excessive crossposts from other social networks (this shouldn't be needed, as Threads is working on federation, and Twitter is dead).

AI-prompter content, i.e., AI generated â€œartâ€ (art theft), scraping, AI-generated fiction, or music, is an immediate ban without warning. Even content that is marked "AI generated" is a suspension. We support artists, writers and musicians on this instance.
NSFW content, violence, or death (especially photos of such) must be CWed

mkultra.me.text: You will immediately cease and not continue to access the site if you are under the age of 18.
Mark sexually explicit or violent content with a content warning.
Illegal content such as child pornography, unsurprisingly, is not permitted.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
No posting of malicious links, spam or advertising.
Lack of a specific rule against a certain behavior does not indicate acceptance of that behavior. Each of us has a limited amount of time in this world. Don't be a jerk.
No attacks against (or from) the instance. You may not do anything which may impact confidentiality integrity or availability.
