moris.social.text: Respect and Kindness: Treat everyone with respect, kindness, and empathy. Harassment, hate speech, discrimination, and personal attacks will not be tolerated.
No Hate Speech: Hate speech, racism, sexism, or any form of discrimination will result in immediate removal from the server.

No Illegal Content: Do not post, share, or promote illegal content, including but not limited to child exploitation material (CP), illegal drugs, hacking, or any activities that violate local or international laws.
Content Guidelines: Do not post explicit, offensive, or adult content. Keep discussions and content suitable for all ages.
No Spam or Self-Promotion: Avoid spamming the server with excessive links or self-promotion. Promote your work or content responsibly and in relevant channels.
Privacy and Consent: Respect the privacy and consent of others. Do not share personal information about someone without their permission.
No Trolling or Flame Wars: Do not engage in trolling, flame wars, or intentionally disruptive behavior. Constructive criticism and civil discourse are encouraged.
Respect Copyright: Do not post copyrighted materials without proper permission or attribution. Always give credit to creators when sharing their work.
Stay On-Topic: Keep discussions relevant to the channels you're in. Use appropriate channels for specific topics.
No Impersonation: Do not impersonate other users, moderators, or public figures.
Reporting Concerns: If you witness any violations of these rules, report them to the moderators for swift and fair resolution.
English/French Preferred: While we celebrate Mauritius' cultural diversity, the primary language for communication on this server is English or French to ensure inclusivity.
No Political or Religious Debates: To maintain a peaceful environment, refrain from engaging in heated political or religious debates.
Use CWs for Sensitive Content: Use Content Warnings (CWs) for sensitive or potentially triggering content to give users the option to view or skip such posts.
Respect Server Staff: Follow the instructions and decisions of server administrators and moderators. They are here to maintain a positive community.
Stay Informed: Familiarize yourself with these rules and any updates to them. Ignorance of the rules is not an excuse for violations.

mstdn.games.text: Be yourself. Be genuine. Make connections. Have fun. We welcome you to post about topics outside of gaming as well!
We have a zero-tolerance policy for hate speech (racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia/transmisia, misgendering/dead naming, xenophobia, ableism, etc) or illegal activity of any kind.

Be respectful to others. No harassment or trolling is allowed. No sexually explicit or violent posts. No personal attacks of any kind (bullying, trolling, name-calling, etc) or spreading of disinformation.

Users are expected to behave as a person and not a brand or storefront. Self-promotion is allowed and encouraged (ex. going live posts, links to personal content creation), but please do not spam the Local feed or send direct messages to advertise. Paid advertising/links of any kind is not allowed.

Use 'Content Warnings' (CWs) on your posts with respect for your fellow users (i.e. politics, graphic imagery, spoilers, personal topics, etc). In addition, NSFW posts require a Content Warning (CW) AND a Sensitive Media tag. Please add Alt Text descriptions to images and media where appropriate.

Crossposting using a 3rd party app is OK: Those posts MUST be posted as Unlisted or Followers-only and cannot be listed as Public. Accounts here are expected to be created with the intention of interacting with the community directly. Accounts that appear to be bots will be suspended.
No promotion or discussion of Cryptocurrency, NFTs, or multi-level marketing schemes is allowed.

IMPORTANT: By applying, you agree to the server rules. **PLEASE GIVE A GENUINE REASON why you would like to join.** Applications with short generic answers (i.e. â€œI like gamesâ€ or â€œleaving Twitterâ€) will be declined. *We are an English-speaking server* Thanks!

mstdn.party.text: Posts that contain nudity, sexually explicit, or violent content must be marked with an "NSFW" content warning and media marked as sensitive when posting

mstdn.plus.text: Nudity and sexually explicit content is prohibited for accounts registered on this instance

mstdn.plus.text: Violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
mstdn.plus.hint: This rule is written as it is on mastodon.social as well as many other generalist instances. The omission of any specific term is not intentional, and bad faith attempts to challenge the exact terminology are considered to be in violation of the rule.

mstdn.plus.text: No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
No content illegal in the United States, Germany, or Finland
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
Bots must be marked as bots in their profile preferences, and automated posts should be unlisted.
mstdn.plus.hint:
Any accounts that produce automated posts and do not plan to manually respond to replies are considered "bots" here. This rule applies to all bots, other than local accounts that either:

* provide content of general public interest AND post at an average frequency of at most once per hour with reasonable spacing, or
* bridge their own accounts on other platforms (that is not ActivityPub).

mstdn.plus.text: You must select the appropriate language for each post.
mstdn.plus.hint: See https://fedi.tips/setting-your-language-preferences-on-mastodon-and-filtering-out-posts-in-other-languages/. This is necessary for the proper functioning of the timeline language filter. If a post is in multiple languages, choose one that represents a significant part of the post.

mstdn.plus.text: Do not spam or abuse network features.
Please read https://mpp.bus-hit.me for moderation information and best practices.

mstdn.science.text: Please avoid using overtly sexual aliases or other nicknames and sexual avatars/banner images  that might detract from a friendly, safe and welcoming environment for all.
Please be kind and courteous. Thereâ€™s no need to be mean or rude.
Respect that people have differences of opinion and that every design or implementation choice carries a trade-off and numerous costs. There is seldom a right answer.
Please keep unstructured critique to a minimum.
We will suspend your account from interaction if you insult, demean or harass anyone. That is not welcome behavior.
Private harassment is unacceptable. No matter who you are, if you feel you have been or are being harassed or made uncomfortable by a community member, please contact a moderator
Likewise any spamming, trolling, flaming, baiting or other attention-stealing behavior is not welcome.

No Distribution of Misinformation. Our server aims for a positive community by prohibiting the spread of inaccurate or misleading information. This includes false news, deceptive stats, and incorrect advice.

mtg.garden.text:
Nothing discriminatory 	

Instances by the Fediverse Foundation are expressly inclusive and open to everyone.

Therefore, any form of discrimination is prohibited. This includes but is not limited to: ableism, antisemitism, homomisia, islamomisia, classism, racism, sexism, transmisia, etc.
Nothing illegal 	Do not post anything illegal (Austrian law / EU law).

Nothing harassing 	

No spam, trolling, bullying, or similar annoyances.

No calls for hate or violence.

No pornography.

Nothing (intentionally) fake 	

No fake news, misinformation, science denial

No spreading rumors or propaganda

Nothing automated 	

No bots, no crossposting (e.g. mirroring of Twitter posts etc.) without context or other interaction.

No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies

musicians.today.text: Do not share intentionally false or misleading information.

No hate speech, derogatory language, offensive comments, or the use of slurs directed at groups of people, especially those historically marginalized. Neo-Nazi, alt-right, and anti-LGBTQ content is explicitly forbidden.
No incitement or promotion of violence including self-harm and suicide.
Do not hit on people. Do not pry or inquire into people's sexual or personal lives.
No harassment, dogpiling, bullying or doxxing.
No NFTs, no crypto, no blockchain.
NSFW content must be marked as sensitive and/or marked with a relevant Content Warning (CW) when posting. Avatars, headers, and bio content must be appropriate for all audiences.
No explicit sexual, violent or gory content. No sexual depictions of minors.
Sign-ups will only be approved for musicians (professionals and hobbyists).

musicworld.social.text: No illegal content, e.g. child pornography, solicitation of illegal services, etcâ€¦
No posts or links to content supporting, featuring, or promoting hate groups, terrorism, mass violence or calls to violence.

No posts or comments supporting or promoting QAnon related content or similarly disproven conspiracy theories. Moderators have sole discretion to decide if a post violates this rule. Birds are real. The Earth is round. Get over it.
No posts or links featuring sexualized depictions of minors, whether photographic, written, drawn, anthropomorphic or animated.
No pornography featuring depictions of rape or non-consensual violence.
All other pornographic, erotic or NSFW content, whether photographic, written, drawn or animated, must be marked with a Content Warning.
No visual content depicting executions, murder, suicide, dismemberment, visible innards, excessive gore, or charred bodies. All other violent imagery requires a Content Warning.
No visual content depicting animal abuse. All other posts related to animal abuse require a Content Warning.
No Spam (see Code of Conduct above).
No threats, bullying or attacks on an individual or group.
No encouragement or promotion of self-harm.
No accounts that impersonate anyone else unless clearly marked as such for the purpose of parody.

No Hate Speech. Hate speech is defined as derogatory posts or links targeting any individual or group based on race, mental or physical disability, religion, gender identity, sex, nationality, age, class or sexual orientation.
No â€œshitpostingâ€ - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged, there is no place for â€œshitpostingâ€ here.

muso.social.text: We try to be inclusive, so exclusionary, divisive, aggressive, or consistently obnoxious behavior is unwelcome. Thus, no racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism, ageism.
Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies will be tolerated.
No harassment, piling on, ganging up on, or doxxing of other users.
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information.
Donâ€™t do anything thatâ€™s illegal in the US.

mx.pontual.social.text: We are inclusive and welcoming to everyone of all ages, nations, races, genders, faiths, and creeds.
Please keep our space safe for all and family friendly. No spamming. No personal attacks. Your opinions are welcome, but we encourage thoughtful conversation over provocation.
We actively moderate and will immediately suspend without appeal and in our sole judgement any account that violates the rules.

Full rules at https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/about/governance/policies/social-content-policies/ Mozilla has done an excellent job of describing how a well run social network should be governed. Read it.

my0.net.text: No discussion of specific actions that would be illegal in North America
Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism

my-spaces.social.text: Just try to be respectful with one another. We have more than enough toxicity on twitter as it is

myf.one.text: Itâ€™s Sofâ€™s rules or the hirule

myke.social.text: Be kind. Be respectful of other users, refraining from name-calling, personal attacks, shaming and argument tactics like devilâ€™s advocate positions.

myopic.one.text: Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other peopleâ€™s personally identifying information (â€œdoxingâ€) constitutes harassment.

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on â€” just keep the toot itself interesting).
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.

Do not tone police. Toots may violate the standards of civility we set on Myopic.one, but you should not criticize users for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them. In neither case should you criticize their tone.
Do not attempt, under any circumstances, to use Myopic.one to engage in, publish or contribute to any form of illegal activity, whether housed on this server or otherwise.
Do not engage in discourse with the intent to anger, distance, gaslight or generate conflict with others.

Abuse of the Report feature, and attempts to engage mods to ban other users without demonstrable breach of instance rules will be interpreted as an attempt of targeted harassment and in breach of Rule 1.

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the Myopic.one community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.

myprivate.social.text: As the famous Wil Wheaton proclaimed, don't be a dick.

You will not engage in any form of harassing, discriminatory, threatening, or offensive speech or behavior including but not limited to race, gender identity and expression, national origin, disability, marital status, age, sexual orientation, or other protected categories.

We strictly prohibit transphobic behavior, hateful speech, and any form of violence targeted towards transgender individuals. Our commitment is to create a platform where everyone feels welcome and respected.
Clearly content warn (content and discussions considered of mature or possible traumatic nature [gore, war, trauma, etc.]). Keep it safe for the casual observer.
No promotion of gambling, Crypto, NFTs, anti-vaccination, self-harm, terrorism, illegal activities, abuse/exploitation, or violence.

mysocial.community.text: Be considerate of others. You don't have to agree, but you do need to treat one another with fairness and kindness.
There will be more rules. Make a suggestion.

mystical.garden.text: We do not tolerate threatening behaviour, stalking, and doxxing.
We do not tolerate discriminatory behaviour and content promoting or advocating the oppression of members of marginalized groups.
We do not tolerate harassment, including brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted.
We do not tolerate mobbing, including name-calling, intentional misgendering or deadnaming.
We do not tolerate nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
We do not tolerate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above-mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.
Actions intended to damage this instance or its performance may lead to immediate account suspension.
Content that is illegal in Germany will be deleted and may lead to immediate account suspension.
Toots containing a piece of art must be credited, ideally with a link back to the source.
Use of bots on this instance is subject to admins' authorization.

nashtodon.com.text: This instance is intended for Nashville citizens and related accounts. "Greater Nashville Metropolitan Area" seems to be a good guide here.

No trolling or s**t posting. We strongly encourage use of your name as your display name, where applicable. If you want to be anonymous, get an account on another server. Remember, the goal is in-person relationships and making local change.
Don't post anything which would violate US law or TN State law.
Don't be a jerk. Hate speech, discrimination, and harassment of any kind are not tolerated here.
No spam. This includes using completely unrelated hashtags in your posts

neighborli.xyz.text: If you run an automated account, please mark it as such.
neighborli.xyz.hint: Bots and other automated accounts are okay to use on Neighborli. We just ask that you please use the toggle to mark it as an 'automated account' in your settings.

neighborli.xyz.text: Please keep NSFW content behind a content tag.
neighborli.xyz.hint:
It is okay to post NSFW content on Neighborli, but we ask that you keep it behind a content tag out of consideration for other users who would not like to see it. 

NSFW content not behind a content tag will be removed.

Neighborli is based in and follows the laws of the United States of America. Posting illegal content will result in the removal of the illegal content, possible account ban, and depending on the severity, handing the issue over to the appropriate authorities.

We welcome users of all kinds to come to Neighborli and post generally what they want, but nobody appreciates spam. Please don't post the same things over and over. If you must, boost the post you want to promote a few times a week. Please just don't fill up the timeline with it. You don't want to see spam, either - so be considerate!

neovibe.app.text: This instance is 18+. Absolutely no underage or illegal content.
No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No disinformation regarding public health issues or political/military campaigns.

No spam or unverified use of copyrighted material. This includes promotional campaigns, and SEO. If you have a self-run small business, please request permission before linking to any products for sale. We would like to make sure all items being sold are legal under this instance's USA laws.
No impersonation of other individuals, public figures or organizations, unless clearly marked as a parody.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No harassment of other users on this or other servers.
Final Rule: ONLY FUN IS ALLOWED! Have fun!

nerdculture.de.text: Be friendly and polite to each other
No hate speech, no discrimination of others, regardless of their age, gender, nationality or whatever
Don't annoy others and don't get easily annoyed by others.
Do not upload material for which you don't have the rights
No automated posts by bots, except when you have permission to do so by the server admins
Don't abuse this service or server.
Treat other how you want to be treated by them - with respect!

This is a service running on a private server and as a friendly user you are welcome to use this service, but in the end the server admin can cancel user accounts and will do when the user misbehaves. The admin will decide in the end.
Valid mail address required! You'll receive reminder mail after 6 months of inactivity to log in again. If you don't react to those mails, your account will be deleted after 7 months of inactivity.
Allowed languages are German and English as main languages while as the following languages are tolerated: Dutch, French, Spanish, Italian.

This service is free of cost for you.
However offering this service does have cost implications. If you can afford some cents per week it would be great when you could contribute in sharing the server costs. Of course this voluntarily for you.

No free-speech extremists, no far-right extremists, no nationalists. This includes people that elect or support such political parties like AfD in Germany, Fratelli d'Italia in Italy or Rassemblement National in France, etc.. If you support these parties, this instance is not for you.
Alt Texts for Pictures encouraged. Please conduct descriptive texts for pictures you upload (Alt Texts). This helps visually impaired users and others enormously in their online life.

neurodifferent.me.text: We support self-identification/diagnosis as these are often inaccessible due to cost, biases and other factors. Questioning folks are welcome.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, queerphobia, able-ism, etc. will be tolerated.

No shortened links, e.g. bit.ly, t.ly, goo.gl, ift.tt, lnkd.in, is.gd or t.co (These are malicious because link-shorteners track users without their consent and obscure the destination address, which also prevents users from being able to decide whether they want to visit the link beforehand).
No advertisements for cryptocurrencies, NFT's, or multi-level marketing schemes.
We strongly discourage posting un-described images or video on Public privacy setting.

No neurodifferent user is to create cross-post only accounts from Twitter, RSS on Public privacy setting on this server. Note: this rule applies to the users of neurodifferent.me.  Other instances have their own rules regarding this.
No serious dishonesty that is hurtful to others shall be posted by a user on this server.
No promotion or support of treatments which aim to suppress characteristics of individual identity (ABA, Conversion Therapy) is permitted on this server.

neuromatch.social.text: No discriminatory language, sexism, racism, misogyny, ableism, homophobia, or transphobia
No fascism. No nazism. No casteism. No genocide denial. No genocide apology.
No anti-vaxxers. No climate change deniers. No Flat Earthers.

neurology.social.text: Disagreements and scientific debates are fine, but refrain from personal attacks.
Zero tolerance for hate messages of any kind.
No discrimination, including racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No incitement to violence or promotion of ideologies of violence.
No spam, no scamming, and no posting of malicious links

This server offers accounts for researchers and medical professionals in the areas of neuroscience, clinical neurology and psychiatry. Please provide proof that you belong to the intended user group, e.g. through a relevant website link, in the "Why do you want to join?" field on the next page.

neuss.social.text: Es gilt das Grundgesetz der Bundesrepublik Deutschland in der aktuellen Fassung.

neurodiversity-in.au.text: No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
Threatening, abusive, intolerant or illegal behavior will be removed. We have a zero tolerance approach to racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia.
The Content Warning ("CW") flag should be used for anything that, again, you wouldn't feel comfortable showing to your grandmother. This includes NSFW content, gore, and other similar items.
Account registrations are monitored. Even though account signups are open, your account may be suspended if a human considers it potentially fake or bot.
Always be kind to each other. Don't say anything you wouldn't face to face.
This server is actively moderated. You will probably not be advised of the outcome of a complaint that you made, but rest assure it will be investigated.
Moderation and administration decisions are Final.
This server is in NSW, and all your data will remain in Australia. We are firm believers in data sovereignty.
No bots without explicit permission from the server admin team
Obey Australian law and international treaties.
The goal of these rules is to ensure that this remain a safe, non-judmental space where it is ok to unmask.

No commercial accounts without admin approval

Neurodiversity-in.au is provided without any payment required to ensure it is available for the most vulnerable in our community.

newsie.social.text: Do not threaten, glorify, or promote violence against individuals or groups, or promote or glorify terrorism or violent extremism.
You may not use our service for any unlawful purpose or in furtherance of illegal activities.
You may not post or share sexual imagery and/or content,  or child sexual abuse material (CSAM), including artistic depictions.

You may not impersonate individuals, groups, or organizations in a manner that is intended to, or does mislead, confuse, or deceive others.

newsmast.social.text: You'll find our Community Guidelines at https://www.newsmastfoundation.org/community-guidelines/
Age restrictions: Newsmast account holders must be at least 18 years old.
Be you: Users are not allowed to assume someone elseâ€™s identity or that of other groups or organisations to mislead people.
Misinformation & Fake news: Do not share false or misleading information, including medical claims that canâ€™t be backed up or manipulating content with intent to mislead.
Defamation: Do not make false statements about others that unjustly harm their reputation.
No hate speech: We donâ€™t allow hate speech or the encouragement of violence for any reason. This includes promotion of so-called 'conversion therapy'.

Abuse, harassment and trolling: Do not harass people or encourage harassment or abuse of any kind, including threats, degrading statements and making private details public without permission. Do not post or comment solely to offend or annoy. This includes targeted misgendering and deadnaming.

The following content is strictly not allowed. Posting this content will result in your account being deleted: Adult content (including pornography), Illegal activity, Graphic content, Child sexual exploitation, Encouraging self-harm, Terrorism.

Fraud: Do not attempt to generate traffic or revenue from fake lotteries, sweepstakes, giveaways, phishing links, or spamming. Do not use third-party apps to artificially distort your views, likes and comments.
Bot accounts: Bot accounts and other automated feeds must be marked as such, or be deleted. We impose a follow limit of 5,000 profiles and discourage excessive posting.

nfld.me.text:
No hate speech. We have a zero-tolerance policy on hate speech. 
This includes slurs or any form of degrading, dehumanizing, or derisive speech based on characteristics such as race, heritage, disability, age, sex, sexual preference, gender, socio-economic status, or religion.

No harassment or doxing. 
Treat any other users' known personally identifying information with respect.

No content which is illegal in the countries of Canada or the United States of America. 
We are hosted on a US server and serve content to users in Canada. Content which violates law in either of these nations will be removed and offending users/instances will be limited or banned.

Mastodon servers which break our rules will be banned from federating with nfld.me. 
It is possible to follow users on servers all around the world. The Federated Timeline also streams posts from other servers. Those which break our rules will be limited or blocked from communicating with us.

Don' go postin' tings ya wouldn' want yer mudder ta see. 
In other words, be considerate of others when posting. Remember that your neighbours, family, and friends are here. Let's maintain a good sense of community.
No spam. Excessive advertising or mass-marketing posts will be limited accordingly. Local business endorsement is allowed in moderation. This is not a marketplace, however.

No impersonation of other individuals or entities. Those found to be representing themselves as another person or entity will be dealt with accordingly. Clearly indicate whether your account is a parody account.

No pornography, gore, or obscenity. This is not the place to share that content. Please provide a content warning (CW button in post box) for material depicting non-pornographic nudity, violence, unsafe actions, and/or potentially disturbing media.
Do not attack or abuse the host, and please report any found vulnerabilities or bugs to the instance admin.

Please direct requests for site features to the Mastodon open-source project. While we may implement downstream changes specific to our instance as we see fit, we wish to maintain relative parity with the latest stable Mastodon release.
Nobody under the age of 13 is permitted to use nfld.me. If you know your child aged 13 to 17 is using this service, please ensure they know how to use online social spaces safely.
No intentionally false or misleading information. Please ensure any news you post is factual and from a reputable source. Intentionally reported misinformation (disinformation) will not be tolerated.

nfld.social.text: No incitement of violence and no promotion of misleading or violent ideologies.

Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked appropriately.
Agree to the Terms of Service and Code of Conduct.

nicuverse.org.text: You shall follow this Code of Conduct (CoC).
Content must adhere to laws in Sweden.
Absolutely no harassment of any kind is allowed, as also covered below by the CoC.
Anything remotely NSFW should be labeled as such and hidden and is in general not advised to be posted at all. Like blood, gore, violence, and sexual images and videos.

You may advertise products or services to a reasonable extent.
It is the moderators discretion to decide what is reasonable.
We do not allow racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
We accept no harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline: Excessive advertising, uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources, nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions.

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service: Racism, Sexism, Casteism or advocation of thereof.

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service: Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism, Spreading disinformation or conspiracy theories that undermine public health

The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service: Sexual depictions of children, content illegal in Sweden, conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism or other extreme political or religious movements.

You are personally held responsible for any content you post, also in a legal sense.
No such responsibilities are held by 99nicu, the server admin's or mod's or any person connected to those.

nineworlds.social.text: This site is intended to create frith. Exchanges of information, ideas, and fun are encouraged.
UPG is personalâ€”it's right there in the name "Unverified Personal Gnosis". Don't like someone's UPG? Don't argue, don't comment, just move on to the next post.
No bigotry of any kind; no threats; no harassment.
While it's fine to promote your books, art, business, etc. you are expected to engage in the creation of community, not just sell your stuff. Interact, don't just post.

If your behavior undermines any of the above in any way, you may be warned and given a chance to correct your behavior. Or you may simply find yourself banned.

Thor has given the admins a version of Mjolnir which works in Cybergard for our Ban Hammer. We will use it.

nileane.fr.text: Hateful conduct â€¢ I will not permit any form of bigotry or hateful ideology, including but not limited to: fascism/nazism, racism, misogyny, homo/trans/queerphobia, antisemitism, ableism, as well as threats against marginalised communities or the â€œdebateâ€ about their right to a safe existence.

Harassment â€¢ I will not permit harassment, including but not limited to: insults, bullying, dogpiling/brigading, bad faith trolling, or boundary violations. Requests to terminate conversations are to be respected.

Safeguarding â€¢ I will not permit content that endangers others, such as othersâ€™ personal or identifiable information (â€œdoxxingâ€) or the sharing of private conversations without consent. Promoting or encouraging self-harm or suicide will not be permitted.

CSAM/Abuse â€¢ Sexualised depictions of children, real (â€œchild pornâ€, child sexual abuse material) or fictional (â€œloliconâ€, â€œshotaconâ€), as well as sexual content shared without consent (reposting, â€œrevenge pornâ€), are not permitted and will be removed.
Misinformation â€¢ I will not permit the promotion of misinformation and conspiracy theories. Impersonating individuals or organisations is not permitted, with the exception of parody.

Spam â€¢ I will not permit spam, including but not limited to: excessive automated/identical posting, unsolicited off-topic replies, corporate advertisement, excessive/unsolicited promotion, crossposting on the public timelines.
Illegal content â€¢ This instance is subject to French law. Therefore, any content illegal in France may be removed without prior warning.
Be nice â€¢ Mutual respect and kindness are strongly encouraged. Unprompted aggression may be dealt with as needed on a case-by-case basis.

nnia.space.text: Do not insult others' personal identities and do not make derogatory or dismissing statements about marginalized demographics. This applies to jokes about marginalized demographics you don't belong to.

Maps of any contact stance are allowed to join, but pro contact and pro c-leaning views should not be promoted. Contact discourse can happen on a cross-instance basis. This rule does not apply to contact discourse around other paraphilias.

Respect boundaries of other members. Do not behave aggressively towards them (suicide baiting, mockery, gaslighting), do not share what they said with people outside of map fediverse without explicit permission.

Posting NSFW images is not allowed. NSFW topics can be discussed (jokes, educational questions, etc). The requirements are that the post is impersonal (no suggestive conversations between members, no explicit fantasies), content warnings are added, and the post setting are set to "followers only".

Do not approach chronological children and young teens with relationship intentions, on site or offsite, and do not accept their advances, unless you are their chronological peer. But if you're struggling with your behavior and realize you need help, it's safe to reach out, and we'll do our best.
Don't post, solicit, or advertise child sexual abuse images. Also, don't post non-abusive and casual images of real life children, even if that's your own childhood photos.
If you are a chronological young teenager, do not use this site to approach chronological adults or way older teenagers with relationship intentions.
Do not admit to past or present felonies, unless they have already been adjudicated and you clearly and immediately say so each time you mention them.

Do not post or link to images of gore.  If you want to direct users to an image of gore, use a search hint; for example, you could suggest users search for "Ron Goldman dead crime scene."  If it involves nudity or is sexualized, use a content warning and set the post privacy to "followers only."

nomadic.social.text: No illegal content or conduct. Content or conduct that is illegal in the United States is strictly prohibited.
Racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, and other discrimination is prohibited. Users who engage in such conduct are not welcome on our platform.
Donâ€™t stalk or harass other users. Respect other users of our service and other federated instances.

Access to nomadic.social data by Meta inc., itâ€™s subsidiary organizations, or 3rd party organizations working on their behalf, is strictly prohibited.

nonprofits.masto.host.text: Unless otherwise specified, rules apply not only to original posts but also to boosts.

Hate and threats of violence will not be tolerated. Disagreements and differing viewpoints are allowed, but they should be kept to a professional level and not devolve to personal attacks, attacks on any person's identity, or implied or explicit threats.

Harassment is forbidden, which mostly consists of failing to stop engaging with someone in ways they have asked you to cease. Other situations may be considered harassment and the final decision is up to the administrators.
Keep posts professional and only boost posts which are fitting to a professional environment.
Images, videos, audio recordings etc that are directly attached to a post should have a description alt tag, be described in the post itself, or contain the #Alt4Me hashtag.
Do not randomly mention people with advertisements. To let others know about your services, post public content or, within reason, reply to ongoing conversations if you have something to add.

Administrators have final say. If a specific local user is jeopardizing the server or harassing others on any instance, action will be taken. In extreme cases, we may reach out to the user's organization. The intent is not to be heavy handed, but to protect others on mastodon from abusive behavior.

You represent your company. As such, registration will only be approved with your work email address. This is different from other instances, but needed so that nonprofits have a place to reach out to and engage with interested parties on other servers that may not welcome company related accounts.

now.ez-oo.com.text: Freedom of Expression: Users have the right to freely express their thoughts and opinions.

obsidianmoon.com.text: No hate.  Being critical of religion and persecution does not count as hate.  Mock TERFs/GCs and Nazis all you like.
No getting this server de-federated, blocked, banned, limited from reasonable servers.  Piss off Nazis and TERFs all you want.
Don't start shit with other instances.  Keep your beef away from here.
No disrupting the community.  Means: no hacking from, to, or at this instance, being a shithead to other users, or causing system load past what the hosting can take.

No NSFW images/videos.  Sorry.  Not a lewd instance.  If you have a question about content, ask the admin.

oceanplayground.social.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No harassment of other users on this or other servers, including impersonation.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.

No commercial advertising, multi-level marketing businesses, promotional campaigns, and SEO. 

If you're a local business you may add value to this platform through your proximate actions. Share valuable information, resources, and insight; don't directly advertise.
Sensitive content should have content warnings. Your "boosts" will be considered endorsements, even if your bio says they aren't! Please take responsibility for what you boost to locals here.

occult.town.text: Appropriation & appropriative practices are not tolerated within this instance. If it's not yours to use, don't use it. Examples of this include Indigenous American practices, initiatory/closed religions (hoodoo, vodou, etc), and entities found in initiatory/closed religions (like Lilith).
Listen to marginalised voices when it comes to marginalised subjects - including when discussing closed/initiatory paths.
The instance is otherkin/d, alterhuman/alterbeing, therian, & godspouse/spiritspouse friendly.
Donâ€™t perform unsolicited magic, divination, or channelling on/for people.
There are many ways to practise or engage with spirituality, religion, occultism, etc - your way is not the only way and some folks might do things differently. Respect each otherâ€™s practices.
Bigotry including white supremacy, transphobia, homophobia/queerphobia, misogyny, antisemitism, racism, ableism, sanism, nationalism, nazism & fascism is grounds for a ban.
Donâ€™t harass each other or make derogatory remarks.
No spam, misinformation, or conspiracy theories.
Approach conversations and toots in good faith and kindness.
Occult.town is friendly to entheogen usage & chemognosis, but please tag it with a CW out of courtesy
Animal remains/vulture culture finds should be spoilered & tagged with a CW out of courtesy
NSFW content should be spoilered out of courtesy

ohai.social.text: We do not tolerate discriminatory behavior and content promoting or advocating the oppression of members of marginalized groups.

We do not tolerate threatening behavior, stalking, doxxing, or harassment (including brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted).
We do not tolerate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
We do not tolerate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above-mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.
All explicit (NSFW) content must be marked as sensitive and have a content warning. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
Content that is illegal in Germany will be deleted and may lead to immediate account suspension.

okla.social.text: No toxic and hateful speech. We have a zero-tolerance policy on toxic and hateful speech. This includes attacks against anyoneâ€™s gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, nationality, religion, age, disability, personal appearance, or socio-economic status.

No incitement of violence and no promotion of misleading/violent ideologies. You may not make specific threats of violence or physical harm, death, or disease to an individual or group of people. This includes, but is not limited to, promoting misleading information that may lead to physical harm.

No harassment, dogpiling, or unwanted advances. You may not continue to engage with a user who has explicitly requested that you stop. This includes consistent baiting, bad-faith gaslighting, unwanted sexual advances, etc.
No doxxing of other users. Unauthorised requests for or distribution of any personal information or data is not allowed. Please treat personally identifying information with respect and privacy.
No content illegal in the United States or copyrighted content that you don't own rights to. Illegal or copyrighted content is not allowed to be stored, posted, or discussed on okla.social.

Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked appropriately. Posts and images with sexually explicit or violence must be flagged as sensitive and contain a content warning noting either â€˜NSFWâ€™ or â€˜Violenceâ€™ when posting.
No spamming. Excessive posting, boosting, advertising or mass-marketing posts will be actioned accordingly and based on intent.

We encourage the use of alt text/captions for all pictures.
We require CW's for NSFW content. We encourage the use of CW's in other contexts as well, but do not require them for politics or activism.
This server is hosted by the Oklahoma Objector Community and is admin'ed by @jmb@okpeace.org. At this time we are not accepting new members.
No Oppression ---- Do not post content that is Antisemitic, Islamophobic, Homophobic, Transphobic, Racist, Abelist, Sexist, etc.

oldbytes.space.text: No sexism, no racism, no hate speech, no LGBTQphobia, no nazis, no spam, no public unflagged porn, no climate change denial, etc...
I also believe it's important to remind you that this server was made and is being run by a queer activist.
This server thrives to be inclusive, and I will ban without much regret.

People are encouraged to use the report function as they see fit, and can be confident that their complaints will be heard and dealt with in some way. I want everyone to feel safe here, and if that doesn't sound like something you like, you should probably find another server.
No scam content allowed regarding cryptos, and other wallet magic money back things. Links to profiles for donations only are ok, invites are not.

Bots are allowed as long as the "is bot" profile flag is enabled, a contact info (fedi, other...) is in the BIO and the bot doesn't post as Public visibility too often (other visibilities are ok), and no spam
Please write a real registration reason, less than four words or really vague will gets you rejected instantly, and IN ENGLISH please

onephoto.club.text: OnePhoto.Club has UNIQUE RULES and POSTING LIMITATIONS. It is NOT FOR GENERAL USAGE.
OPC Members ONLY post about our travel + outdoor adventures. Yep, thatâ€™s rightâ€”this is a single-topic server.
At its heart, OPC is a photo sharing community that serves as a remembering practice for our adventures.
Posts are often driven by ongoing prompts, like #OPCWeeklyTheme, #OPCSpecialTheme, #OnThisDay, and others. You can participate in these even as a non-OPC member.
Good vibes only (no politics, bad behavior, ai-generated photos, etc).
Weâ€™re about people, not brands, so this is an ad-free zone.
OPC is a semi-private club with strict rules of conduct and a well-established culture, but is open to new members. We love connecting with new friends!
You MUST READ the guidelines at https://about.onephoto.club/ before signing up. Use the code word when doing so.

packmates.org.text: You must be at least 18 years old.
Do not post NSFW content of characters that are underage or which could easily be mistaken as such.
Your account handle, name, avatar and profile must be SFW and not include shocking, disturbing or controversial content.
You may not use packmates to post or share content that glorifies, advocates for or supports content such as: racism, hate speech, LGBTQ+ phobia, bigotry, authoritarianism, nazism, etc...
Flag and add a content warning to media and posts that are NSFW, triggering, controversial, divisive, etc.

Packmates users can post real photos and videos with NSFW content as long as they are related to themselves in some way and any third parties who have not given consent are blurred out. Yes: naked selfie. No: irl porn found on the internet.

Do not use packmates for: call-outs, finger-pointing, uncivil discussion, trolling, accusations, expressions of hate, etc... Especially targeting other people, collectives, or small projects. Example: "People who do petplay are fucking disgusting", "FYI @xxx is $*%#, block me if you talk to them"

An exception to the above rule can be made for statements that are not truly hostile ("ahrg, I hate this new XYZ, so frustrating") or which are very general, broad or target major publicly known individuals. Eg. "I hate spaghetti", "I hate Elon Musk", "I hate capitalism".

If you don't like something or feel triggered, consider just blocking or filtering instead of engaging with unsolicited replies. Block and report if it violates any rules at packmates or the originating instance.
Do not post or share details, locations, photos or other personal identifiable information about someone without their consent.
Do not use packmates to post / share content that is illegal (jurisdiction: Germany) or to encourage, plan / hint at breaking the law.
Parody accounts are currently not permitted. Please message @Wander first if you want to create a non-personal account such as for a bot, your guild, your clan, your organization, etc.

Personal accounts can be used to announce and promote your small and personal business in a reasonable frequency and without using hyperbole, alarm or overly emphatic sales-speech. Eg. announcing commissions, announcing a new release of your app, announcing your etsy creations, etc.

Above all: be kind and enjoy your stay! At packmates we value kindness, being mindful of others and using your account in a constructive manner (eg. sharing your art, interacting with friends, talking about your projects and hobbies and avoiding toxic drama or disruptive behavior).
IMPORTANT: when signing up, please explain why you would like to join. Account activation might take much less but could take up to 24-48h.

page.lgbt.text: Intolerance and discrimination, in any form, is not permitted. This includes, but is not limited to, racism, sexism, ableism, homophobia, and transphobia. TERFs and "gender criticals" are not welcome here.
Bots/automated accounts are allowed, but must be flagged as a bot in the account's profile settings.
Accounts that engage in scamming of any kind are not permitted. Peddling of NFTs is also not permitted.
Do not harass other users, and do not intentionally go out of your way to annoy or upset anyone. If somebody asks you to stop doing something (within reason), stop.

Do not spam or advertise excessively. Self-promotion is fine, but excessive unsolicited advertisement is not. Feel free to promote yourself or your creations/products - just don't be too excessive and don't direct it at other people unless they invite you to do so.

Explicit/adult content is permitted but must be behind a content warning describing the types of content present. Illegal content is not permitted, nor is sexual material depicting minors. Pornography depicting real people is not permitted as we cannot verify that the subjects gave consent.

Moderation staff are allowed to impose additional restrictions based on their own judgement, if they determine that doing so is in the best interests of our users and/or the instance as a whole. A full reason for the decision will always be given.

Queda prohibido el acoso a usuarios, usuarias y usuaries en todas sus formas, incluyendo el acoso sexual, sealioning, flaming, doxxing, bullying, joseo, subtooting, outing o suplantaciÃ³n de identidad entre otras formas de acoso.

Se bloquearÃ¡ a toda cuenta o dominio que promueva conductas lesivas para la salud como el consumo y distribuciÃ³n de drogas, los trastornos de alimentaciÃ³n, las autolesiones, el suicidio, la ludopatÃ­a y la apologÃ­a de conductas daÃ±inas para la salud fÃ­sica y mental de la persona en general.

Queda terminantemente prohibida la distribuciÃ³n de textos, enlaces o material multimedia donde se incluya o sugiera actividad sexual o desnudos de menores, reales o figurados. Los administradores de Paquita podrÃ¡n contactar con las autoridades en caso de que detecten posible actividad delictiva.

Paquita es una instancia libre de pornografÃ­a. No se permite a usuarios, usuarias o usuaries, trabajadores sexuales o no, que distribuyan repetidamente enlaces o material multimedia donde se muestre actividad sexual o fluidos corporales, aunque se haga catalogando el material como sensible y #NSFW.

Compartir material multimedia o enlaces sobre desnudez estÃ¡ permitido, siempre que sean desnudos propios de la persona que sube el material, sin involucrar a terceros, y que se catalogue como material sensible y se incluya advertencia o CW sobre este contenido, con las etiquetas #NSFW y #Nudity.

Se puede compartir ocasionalmente el propio trabajo o el de otras personas, pero no estÃ¡ permitido el marketing agresivo, el spam o publicitar productos y servicios si se recibe un pago o recompensa sustancial por ello.
Se considera recompensa sustancial cualquier regalo al usuario por un valor superior a 20â‚¬. El beneficio propio por compartir cualquier enlace promocional ha de ser debidamente advertido.
Se bloquearÃ¡ a usuarios y dominios que compartan repetidamente bulos (especialmente bulos polÃ­ticos, cientÃ­ficos o sanitarios) o teorÃ­as conspirativas tales como la TeorÃ­a del Reemplazo.

Queda terminantemente prohibido promocionar o distribuir contenidos relacionados con las criptomonedas, esquemas Ponzi o de economÃ­a piramidal, juegos de azar, apuestas de cualquier tipo, loot boxes o consejos de trading tanto en mercados regulados como no regulados.
Se prohÃ­be la difusiÃ³n de material multimedia o enlaces que muestren a personas en estado de embriaguez o bajo el efecto del abuso de drogas, tanto legales como ilegales.

PodrÃ¡ mostrarse material audiovisual de alcohol y tabaco siempre con content warning y en un contexto de moderaciÃ³n. Se prohÃ­ben los enlaces para comprar o promocionar alcohol o tabaco en cualquier circunstancia.

Queda prohibida la difusiÃ³n o promociÃ³n de textos, enlaces o material audiovisual acerca de las llamadas â€œbebidas energÃ©ticasâ€ con alto contenido en cafeÃ­na, cuyo marketing estÃ¡ dirigido especÃ­ficamente a menores, especialmente vulnerables.
EstÃ¡ terminantemente prohibida la difusiÃ³n de material audiovisual o enlaces que muestren drogas ilegales o de venta muy restringida, como la marihuana.

Se prohÃ­be aconsejar la toma de cualquier medicamento, requiera este o no prescripciÃ³n mÃ©dica. Si una persona solicita consejo mÃ©dico y alguien habilitado para ello quiere dÃ¡rselo, deberÃ¡ ser estrictamente en privado.

En Paquita se interpretarÃ¡ la insistencia en dar consejos sobre dieta, estilo de vida y salud a una persona que no los ha solicitado como una forma de acoso. Intentar avergonzar a una persona por su cuerpo o aspecto fÃ­sico supone expulsiÃ³n inmediata.

La legislaciÃ³n aplicable en la instancia Paquita es la del estado de EspaÃ±a. Asimismo, no se permitirÃ¡ ningÃºn contenido ilegal en Alemania. Paquita se adhiere activamente a los principios de la DeclaraciÃ³n Universal de los Derechos Humanos y la ConvenciÃ³n de Derechos del NiÃ±o.

En semejanza al concepto jurÃ­dico de "buena fe", Paquita espera que sus usuarios se atendrÃ¡n en todo momento al espÃ­ritu de la normativa aquÃ­ esbozada y no intentarÃ¡n aprovechar detalles formales de la redacciÃ³n de las normas en su beneficio.

parens.social.text: Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other peopleâ€™s personally identifying information (â€œdoxingâ€) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on â€” just keep the toot itself interesting).

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the Fosstodon community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.
Do not â€œshitpostâ€ - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged, there is no place for â€œshitpostingâ€ on parens.social.
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
Do not post adult content, including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention (including sexualized comments or jokes).
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour; criticize ideas, never people.

Do not tone police. Toots may violate the standards of civility we set on Fosstodon, but you should not criticize users for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them. In neither case should you criticize their tone.
Do not debate moderation actions in public toots. If you disagree with how a moderator enforced this CoC you may direct-message the moderation team or email admin@parens.social.

paravielfalt.zone.text: Diese Instanz ist ein Safe Space fÃ¼r Menschen mit Paraphilien, deren SexualitÃ¤t von der sogenannten â€NormalitÃ¤tâ€œ abweicht. Grundlage ist die Ãœberzeugung, dass kein Mensch aufgrund seiner sexuellen und romantischen Empfindungen ausgegrenzt, verurteilt oder angegriffen gehÃ¶rt.

Wir erwarten einen zivilen und respektvollen Umgang untereinander. Missachtung wird mit moderativen Sanktionen bis hin zum Ausschluss aus der Instanz geahndet. Rassismus, Sexismus, Diskriminierung, Transphobie, Queerfeindlichkeit und Ã„hnliches wird nicht toleriert.

Wer meint, illegale sexuelle Kontakte z.Â B. zwischen Erwachsenen und Kindern sollten legal sein, oder dass nur das Umfeld Schaden verursacht (â€Pro-Contactâ€œ / â€Pro-Câ€œ), ist hier falsch. Wer anderswo mit solchen Aussagen aufgefallen ist, kann der Betrieb eines Kontos auf Paravielfalt verwehrt werden.

Diese Instanz ist nicht fÃ¼r das Posten von Pornografie da. Pornografische Inhalte werden bei Bekanntwerden sofort gelÃ¶scht. Das Gleiche gilt fÃ¼r Inhalte, die nach deutschem Recht strafrechtlich relevant sein kÃ¶nnen.

Diese Instanz wird von wenigen Freiwilligen in unserer Freizeit betrieben. Wir betreuen das Projekt nach bestem Wissen und Gewissen, geben aber keine Garantien fÃ¼r VerfÃ¼gbarkeit, stÃ¶rungsfreie Nutzbarkeit oder DatenintegritÃ¤t.
Wir behalten uns vor, diese Nutzungsbedingungen bei Bedarf anzupassen. Dies wird mindestens 14 Tage vor Inkrafttreten der neuen Bedingungen angekÃ¼ndigt.

partyon.xyz.text: Good vibes only. No Anti-Black, Anti-Queer hate speech. No sexism. No racism. No fascism.
No harassment. No group harassment. No doxing.
Post positively. Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.
Do not post adult content, including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention (including sexualized comments or jokes).
Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as does any overly commercial promotion.

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the PartyOn community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.
Do not â€œshitpostâ€ - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged, there is no place for â€œshitpostingâ€ on PartyOn.
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
Do not debate moderation actions in public toots. If you disagree with how a moderator enforced this CoC you may direct-message the moderation team.

partyparrot.social.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
No content illegal in the US.
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information.
Bots must be marked as Bot in their profile.
No spamming or aggressive promotion. If you want to promote something do it responsibly with supporting facts and never only links.

pawb.fun.text: Rule #1 â€“ Illegal Content or Conduct
pawb.fun.hint:
Content or conduct that is illegal in the United States is strictly prohibited.

For the avoidance of doubt, this includes but is not limited to: Instructions on how to commit crimes, encouraging acts of violence or terrorism, child sexual abuse material (CSAM) or depictions thereof, and unauthorized access or exploitation of computer systems.
Racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, and other discrimination is prohibited. Users who engage in such conduct are not welcome on our platform.

Respect other users of our service and other federated instances. If someone doesnâ€™t want anything to do with you, leave them alone. Attempts to bypass blocks, including creating alternate accounts for that purpose, is prohibited.

â€œScreenshot dunkingâ€, or the act of taking screenshots of posts to repost and harass without directly replying, is strongly discouraged. If someone is annoying you, harassing you, or a genuine danger to other users, block and report them.

pawb.fun.text: Rule #4 â€“ Misinformation and Deceptive Content
pawb.fun.hint:
Misinformation, scams, Ponzi schemes, and other deceptive tactics have become rampant on other platforms and we donâ€™t want to see a resurgence of it in the Fediverse.

Examples of prohibited content include, but are not limited to, the following: COVID and health misinformation, pro-insurrection (Jan 6th) comments or endorsement, NFTs, â€œcryptoâ€ (blockchain & tokens, NOT cryptography), MLMs / pyramid schemes, flat earth claims.

Content warnings (CW) are REQUIRED for NSFW content, political discussion and debate, religious promotion and debate, and drug mentions. Please review https://pawb.social/post/101 for more information.

pawb.fun.text: Rule #5.2 â€“ Sensitive Content in Content Warning Message
pawb.fun.hint: Don't put polarizing, graphic, or sensitive content in the content warning (CW) description.

pawb.fun.text: Rule #6 â€“ No Spam or Advertising
pawb.fun.hint: Spam and advertising is not acceptable, but friendly automated bots are welcome. Where possible, try to restrict any recurring automated posts to Unlisted to avoid cluttering the Local and Federated timeline. Content posted by small businesses is NOT considered advertising for the purposes of this rule.

pawb.fun.text: Rule #7 â€“ Disengage and Report Abuse
pawb.fun.hint:
If a user or instance is breaking the rules, we recommend just reporting the content and not engaging. We donâ€™t want users to end up getting caught in the crossfire for attempting to correct a user in good faith, as this makes our jobs significantly harder.

Additionally, the team is here to help â€“ If youâ€™re unsure on a particular post, user profile, instance, etc. and donâ€™t think weâ€™ve seen or dealt with it yet, please send in a report. No user will ever be penalized for genuine use of the report system.

pawb.fun.text: Rule #8.1 â€“ Account / Post Language Missing
pawb.fun.hint: We require that all posts are properly marked with the language used, which can be done at the account level through the account preferences page, or per-post by clicking the language button next to â€œCWâ€ (Content Warning).
You may not impersonate an individual, group, or organization with the intent to deceive, confuse, and exploit other users. Parody accounts should tag themselves clearly in their profile description.

Bot accounts must mark themselves as a bot and must post using â€œUnlistedâ€, â€œFollowers onlyâ€, or â€œMentioned people onlyâ€, so we can keep the local and federated timelines clear and focused on users.

pawb.fun.text: Rule #8.4 â€“ Unauthorized Brand / Government Accounts
pawb.fun.hint: No brand or government-affiliated account may be registered on Pawb.Social services without prior written and publicly recorded approval, except furry fandom-operated brands and events covered by the exception in our full rules. This rule ONLY applies to accounts on Pawb.Social services.
If you have been suspended from any Pawb.Social instance, you may not create another account on any of our services.

pawb.fun.text: Rule #8.6 â€“ Prohibited Avatar / Header Image
pawb.fun.hint: All avatars and header images must not contain any content that is prohibited by any other rule in the Code of Conduct, especially content that requires a Content Warning (CW).
The full Code of Conduct can be found at https://docs.google.com/document/d/1jXkulJKMWEmv-cb_jaYkG2L0sTcZeHKdcqwImNkf6Ko â€“ Some rules and wording listed here have been summarized for brevity.

pdx.sh.text: Be kind. Don't harass, doxx, or otherwise make people's lives difficult. Existing on this planet is hard enough already.
No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
Don't do illegal shit. No piracy or other things I'm going to get DMCA take down notices for.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies. In short, don't be a fucking fascist.
Violation of any of the above rules will result in an immediate ban.
Swearing and shit is fine. Other content rules TBD by the community.
If you're a jerk, I'll suspend (warning) or ban (repeated offenses) you.

Consider other people when making your toots. If someone else might have a bad time when they see your post, or might need a moment to collect themselves before seeing it, please put it behind a content warning. There is a lot of grey area here so let's try to find a good balance here.

pebble.social.text: Graphic violence: Content that is excessively gory or violent is not allowed.
Private information. You can't publish or post other people's private information (like their home phone number and address) without their permission.
Dangerous and hateful organizations: It is not allowed to promote either of these things. We will delete any known accounts owned by specific violent extremists, or perpetrators of mass violence.

Coordinating Harm: we do not allow activities such as organized harassment, coordinated attacks, planning, organizing or promoting violence, or any other behavior that poses a threat to individuals, communities, businesses, property or animals.
Adult content, including pornographic content, is not allowed.
Child sexual exploitation and child nudity related content material is not allowed.
Encouragement or advocacy of self-harm and suicide is not permitted.
Controlled or prohibited goods and services. Use of our service for any illegal activity involving illicit goods or services is not allowed.

Enforcement circumvention. If an account has been permanently suspended for severe violations of our community guidelines, Pebble reserves the right to suspend any other account owned by the same user, regardless of when the account was created.
Abuse and harassment: Harassment or encouraging abuse and harassment of any kind is not allowed.

Hate speech and incitement to violence: Hate speech and prejudiced speech is not tolerated here. Do not call for violence against people based on ethnicity, national origin, caste, race, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, religious affiliation, age, illness, and/or sexual orientation.

Misleading identities. You can't pretend to be another person, group, or organization to trick, confuse, or mislead people, including imitating official platform accounts. We do not allow the use of fictitious or computer generated identities or profiles.

Artificial disruption, and deceptive accounts and spam. Misusing the platform and sending spam is not allowed, including financial scams. You can't use our services to artificially spread information in a way that messes with or disrupts other people's experience on our server.

penfount.social.text:
Be nice:

Be civil, courteous, and respectful. Do not use extreme language or act with hostility.

Be a good person:

Do not insult, mock, or attack other users based on race, gender, age, occupation, physical or mental health, or opinions about fountain pens.

No transactions allowed:

Do not use this server as a platform for any sort of transaction for money or other value.
Links to a page that offer a product or service are allowed, as long as the transaction is external from the server.
No pornographic content: Do not post pornographic or otherwise age-restricted content. Nude art may be submitted with an appropriate content warning.
Giveaways: Do not post giveaways without moderator approval.

peoplemaking.games.text:
No discrimination or harassment, including but not limited to racism, sexism, ableism, homophobia or transphobia.

In regards to PeopleMaking.Games' stance on recent "Mastodon Discourse": Tone policing marginalized groups is tantamount to harassment. It is not productive or useful.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.

Provide appropriate content warnings on potentially sensitive posts. We permit and even encourage topical discussions, but ask that you respect the rights of others to have autonomy over the content they engage with.
Posts containing art not owned by the poster must be credited, ideally with a link back to the source.
The actions of individuals you bring to the community reflect back on you. Be responsible with your invites, and avoid posting an invite link in a public place.
Mastodon v4 does not currently support badging for given roles. Until there is a UI implementation, using the "Astro" logo in your username is restricted to Moderators and Administrators. Thank you!

No NFTs, Crypto, or Web3 promotion. While these topics can be discussed at a distance, preferably behind CWs, if your primary reason for being here is to monetize via Web3 there are more suitable crypto-related instances available. NFTs may not be used in profile pictures.

piclub.social.text: Respect others: Maintain politeness and respect in communication, avoiding the use of offensive or provocative language. Respect others' viewpoints and positions, actively listen, and provide constructive feedback.

Protect privacy: Uphold users' privacy rights by not sharing or disclosing others' personal information without permission, including but not limited to real names, contact information, home addresses, etc.

Follow the law: Strictly adhere to local laws and regulations, prohibiting the posting of any content that violates legal provisions, including but not limited to malicious defamation, insults, pornography, violence, etc.

Keep content relevant: Ensure that the content posted is relevant to the server's theme or discussion topics, and refrain from posting irrelevant information or spam content. Maintain the depth and meaningfulness of discussions.

Respect intellectual property: Do not infringe upon others' intellectual property rights, including but not limited to copyrights, trademarks, patents, etc. Do not post unauthorized works of others, including text, images, audio, video, etc.
Follow the rules: Adhere to the rules and guidelines set by the server, including but not limited to registration terms, terms of use, etc., to ensure the orderly and stable operation of the server.

Respect administrators: Respect and obey the management decisions of server administrators. If you have any questions or objections, you can raise them through appropriate channels, but do not engage in malicious behavior or violations.

Foster a positive atmosphere: Share beneficial, positive, and inspiring content, encourage mutual assistance and support among users, and create a positive and friendly communication atmosphere to build a harmonious community together.

Equal treatment: Treat all users equally, without discrimination or differentiation based on race, gender, sexual orientation, religious beliefs, status, etc., to establish an inclusive and open communication environment.

pie.gd.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, antisemitism, xenophobia, casteism, or similar behavior.
No harassment of any kind. This includes dogpiling, doxxing, and any other unwanted behavior that's intended to make someone sad.
No sexually explicit media (it creates legal issues). Violent media must be marked as sensitive.
Do not post or amplify false or misleading information.
Do not post or amplify content that's illegal under US law.

pigeon.place.text: No sexual content involving minors (including artistic depictions); no gore or extremely graphic violence (including artistic depictions)

No bigotry (i.e. National Socialism, Nazism, Holocaust denial, racism, alt right/"free speech", transphobia, misogyny) - critical discussion is OK. Any images of explicit hate symbols being discussed (e.g. swastikas) must be under a Content Warning
No trolling, blatantly inciting violence, or dangerous misinformation (e.g. antivax, conspiracy theories) - critical discussion is OK
No bots or automated mass following/content aggregation

pippo.dev.text: No illegal content, e.g. child pornography, solicitation of illegal services, etcâ€¦
No posts or links to content supporting, featuring or promoting hate groups, terrorism, mass violence or calls to violence.
No posts or links featuring sexualized depictions of minors, whether photographic, written, drawn or animated.
No pornography featuring depictions of rape or non-consensual violence.
All other pornographic or erotic content, whether photographic, written, drawn or animated, must be labeled as sensitive content.
No posting of malicious links or spam.
No threats or direct attacks on an individual or group.
No encouragement or promotion of self-harm.
No accounts that impersonate anyone else unless clearly marked as such for the purpose of parody.

No Hate Speech. Hate speech is defined as derogatory posts or links targeting any individual or group based on race, mental or physical disability, religion, gender identity, sex, nationality, age, class or sexual orientation.

plantegg.wiki.gd.text: This instance is a profandom instance. This means that the content within may contain fictional expression that may be seen as "problematic", i.e. certain ships, or artistic content.
This instance is not a place for pro-c or real abuse/exploitation advocacy. Fiction is fiction. Reality is reality. Any claims otherwise are false.

Attempted infiltration, harrassment, doxxing, or mass reporting of this instance for its profandom views will not be tolerated. Do not attempt to join the instance, it is for the family. Those in the family know who they are and receive invites.
All NSFW art and text should go behind a CW, to make public browsing more comfortable. The CW should clearly state what kind of art or text it is, along with a tag in the post body, for curation.
Minors are disallowed from interacting with this instance, even in the case of a federated post. This is an adult space.

plutus.social.text: You will not engage in any form of harassing, discriminatory, threatening or offensive speech or behavior including but not limited to race, gender identity and expression, national origin, religion, disability, marital status, age, sexual orientation, or other protected categories.
This server abides by the Mastodon Covenant - Please be excellent to each other.
Have fun, be creative, be inquisitive. This is your social network.
Clearly content warn 18+ content, food, drugs (legal or otherwise), slurs, ableist language, and other commonly tagged things. Keep it safe, we don't want to host your nudes.
No promotion of gambling, anti-vaccination, self-harm, terrorism, illegal activities, Abuse/exploitation, or Violence.

pnw.zone.text: Have fun and be respectful! Posts on PNW.zone are moderated. We promote robust dialogue from all viewpoints, but want to cultivate a trusted instance for others to join. Therefore we will moderate threats of violence, harassment, harmful disinformation, hate speech, and similar content.
No spamming the server. This includes excessive commercial advertising, promotional campaigns, and SEO. Any commercial postings should relate to the PNW community.
Clearly content warn (CW) content and discussions considered of mature or possible traumatic nature (gore, war, thirst traps, trauma). Keep it safe.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
The use of bots on this server is not permitted without prior approval.
Pornography on the local timeline is not allowed.
Do not break the code of conduct (found on About page).
You must be 13 years of age or older to create an account on this instance.
Public posts and profiles must be in English to allow for moderation.

pnw-mastodon.com.text: Don't post anything that is illegal in the US.

pocketpixels.club.text: Do not share intentionally false or misleading information

No hate speech ... No aggressive, mocking, or undermining statements about any group of people for things they can not change about themselves. This includes but is not limited to racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting. Low-res video game violence only needs to be marked if it has graphic blood.
No sharing of copyrighted material like roms that you don't hold the copyright for. This puts the entire community an jeopardy.
No sharing AI-generated artwork that uses copyrighted artwork in the training dataset.
No limited edition digital assets or cryptocurrencies can be promoted or sold here.

podcasts.social.text: Diese Instanz ist ausschlieÃŸlich zur Einrichtung von Accounts fÃ¼r Podcasts gedacht. Keine persÃ¶nlichen Accounts. Jeder Podcast nur einen Account. / This instance is only for creating accounts for podcasts. No personal accounts. Only one account for each podcast.

podvibes.co.hint: This can be open to interpretation, but for the most part common sense should prevail, which means none of the following is allowed: racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia (including purposeful misgendering/deadnaming), ableism, classism, bigotry, harassment, doxxing, or just generally targeted meanness. This isn't necessarily an exhaustive list, but a good rule of thumb is: Podvibes = Good vibes. ğŸ˜

A wide variety of things can trigger trauma, and it can be tough to ensure you're capturing them all. Put in a good faith effort and be open to feedback is all we ask. And, to be clear, this is generally a firm suggestion more than a hard rule.

Comply with all local laws, regulations, and ordinances. Do not discuss or attempt to organize any illegal activities on this website. We don't wanna play cop. Or play with the cops. So be above board, please and thank you.

podvibes.co.text: Posts from accounts may not be suitable for kids.
podvibes.co.hint: Some audio fiction content may deal with adult themes, and what's legal and accepted in one part of the world is anathema to another.  We're not nannies. We're not the arbiter of morality. It's up to the accounts to use content warnings, and we're happy to remind them of that as needed. But Mastodon gives you lots of tools to keep your timeline free of content you personally find objectionable. Use 'em.

podvibes.co.text: We're mostly for fans and creators of audio fiction!
podvibes.co.hint: We picked this niche on purpose, but you don't only have to post about audio fiction. I mean, have you seen Evo's account? We know you have passions and interests outside of audio fiction. All of that is good to share here. Have fun! Let your freak flag fly!

pointbob.org.text: This is a place for civility.  Do not do anything here that would get you punched in the face if you did it in person.

pogs.cafe.text: Be kind to your fellow gamers.
No content illegal in the EU.
No incitement of real life violence.
No discrimination based on any ground.
No harassment or privacy violations against other users.
