polyam.space.hint: Including but not limited to fascism, racism, sexism, antisemitism, ableism, misogyny, queermisia, xenomisia etc.

polyam.space.text: Sensitive content has to be marked as sensitive and/or behind a content warning
polyam.space.hint: Sensitive content includes nudity, gore, politics and any other potential harmful or triggering content.
Do not toot links generated by link shorteners which obfuscate their destination (e.g. bit.ly, t.co). The destination of a link should be clear.

polyam.space.text: No dunking (i.e. spreading of hate-speech to "dunk")
No promoting or advocating crypto currencies or blockchain technologies
No LLM or machine learning generated content produced with stolen data

polyam.space.hint: Sharing or promoting conspiracy theories or misinfo is not allowed. Jokes containing misinfo need to be clearly marked as such.

pone.social.text: This is a pony first instance: It's expected most users will be fans of the show My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic
Expect all sorts of topics to be discussed here, not necessarily just ponies
This is not a safe space; you may be offended by the things you see here; we will not regulate anyone's speech (except for the next two rules)
Do not spam or abuse the server

Do not post illegal content (anything exploitative of real life minors, anything showing animals being abused, etc.).  Foalcon, lolicon, etc. is allowed as long as it does not represent actual people.
Add CW for all visual NSFW content.  This helps maintain our federation status.

ponjour.com.hint: You must be 16 years or older to use this site.
Be respectful. No Targeted Harassment of anyone on this server or in the Fediverse, including but not limited to dogpiling, doxxing, threats of violence.
Do not disclose others' private information without permission.
Protect your personal information. Do not share it with strangers.
Avoid discussing political topics, including national policies, global issues, ideologies, sectarianism, or racism.
No incitement or promotion of terrorism content, including but not limited to text, images, and videos.
Posting or sharing any child pornography is strictly prohibited, including text, images, videos, or games.
Do not post real-life images or videos showing explicit nudity.
NSFW content must be folded and marked as â€œSensitive Content.â€
Do not post any advertisements or marketing promotions.
Follow the laws and regulations of your region when using this site.
I acknowledge that violating any server rules may result in the deletion of individual posts or the suspension/ban of the entire account. By creating an account, I accept all the rules.

pon.ee.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
No media-heavy bots or mirror accounts.

pony.social.text:
Be pony-like and kind to other members.

Trolling, impersonation, and similar acts are not acceptable!
This instance is Safe-For-Work primarily, NSFW content should be kept unlisted and have appropriate Content Warnings applied
If you talk about offensive topics, adding a Content Warning is recommended.
If you run a bot account, it must not respond or tag people by itself, only when prompted directly.
Harassment, Brigading, Doxing or Stalking will not be tolerated, Friendship is Magic after all
No hatespeech, transphobia, homo-/biphobia or any other similar, inciting or exclusionary content is tolerated
But actually the best pony is Trixie

Important note for creating an account: You must be 18+ to request or create an account and consent to associated data processing under GDPR. Please include a note during your request that your are 18 years or older.

pool.social.text: No illegal content, e.g. child pornography, solicitation of illegal services, etcâ€¦
No posts or links to content supporting, featuring, or promoting hate groups, terrorism, mass violence or calls to violence.

No posts or comments supporting or promoting QAnon related content or similarly disproven conspiracy theories. Moderators have sole discretion to decide if a post violates this rule. Birds are real. The Earth is round. Get over it.
No posts or links featuring sexualized depictions of minors, whether photographic, written, drawn, anthropomorphic or animated.
No pornography featuring depictions of rape or non-consensual violence.
All other pornographic, erotic or NSFW content, whether photographic, written, drawn or animated, must be marked with a Content Warning.
No visual content depicting executions, murder, suicide, dismemberment, visible innards, excessive gore, or charred bodies. All other violent imagery requires a Content Warning.
No visual content depicting animal abuse. All other posts related to animal abuse require a Content Warning.
No threats, bullying or attacks on an individual or group.
No encouragement or promotion of self-harm.
No accounts that impersonate anyone else unless clearly marked as such for the purpose of parody.

No Hate Speech. Hate speech is defined as derogatory posts or links targeting any individual or group based on race, mental or physical disability, religion, gender identity, sex, nationality, age, class or sexual orientation.
No â€œshitpostingâ€ - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged, there is no place for â€œshitpostingâ€ here.

poorlyrendered.com.text: Do not do anything which could be construed as illegal in the UK, Thailand, the EU or the USA.

popindustry.org.text:
You will not boost ANY toots - be it yours or someone else's - during the season.
(Billboard, TMZ and Personal Accounts can still use this feature.)
You will not unfollow, mute or block any other account local to the #PopIndustry instance.
You will not make any personal insults, threats or extreme jokes about serious topics.
You will not post any explicit NSFW material.
You will not change the following settings or preferences: Email Address, Password, and Posting Privacy (Public)
You will not enable the following settings: Require Follow Requests, Email Notifications, Two Factor Authentication, Opt-Out of Search Engine Indexing, and Hide Your Social Graph.
You will not use Mastodon's Filters or Automated Post Deletion features.

porpoise.social.text: No bullying, harassment, sexism, racism, homophobia or other hate-speech.
Constructive criticism is helpful. Keep the less constructive kind to a minimum.
Spamming, trolling, flaming, baiting or other types of attention-seeking are not welcome here.
We are a science community. Respect people with different opinions. There is seldom just one answer. Act like a scientist.

port87.social.text: No hate speech. This include slurs and hateful tropes about marginalized groups.
You must be 16 or older to access this server. This is not a place for kids.
Do not harass other users. Disagreements and spirited or even heated discussion is fine, but brigading, doxxing, threatening, or engaging in other harassing behavior is not.
Do not post illegal content. (Anything that would be considered illegal under the laws of the USA.)
Do not post photographs or artwork depicting minors in a sexually suggestive nature.
If you want to host a bot on this server, it must be approved by either @hperrin or @dave first.
Pornography and excessive gore are allowed if and only if you mark the media as sensitive.
Do not threaten anyone with violence. This includes other users, non-users, public officials, and celebrities.

post.rodeo.text: Offensive Content: No bigotry. Nazis are bad. Be cool.
Accessibility: This server encourages use of the following tools for accessibility and consideration: 'Content Warnings' on posts, 'Alt-Text' on media, and file optimization. (See Rules 3, 4, & 5)
'Content Warning' tags are a big part of the Mastodon culture. They're not all trauma related. Pay attention to what other people CW and follow suit. â˜º
'Alt Text' on media helps users understand context and enjoy the content. This especially helps those with sensory impairments (hearing/vision/etc.) but also language barriers.

Optimizing media before uploading to save bandwidth for ALL federated servers, as well as users with limited internet (e.g., cellular data plans, or rural satellite service, throttled government "lifeline" services, etc).

Adult Material Policy: (Forgive the MPAA metaphor, but) text and media uploads should remain rated roughly 'PG-13' bordering 'R.' 'Content Warnings' on lewds required. Nudes should be posted elsewhere. 'NC-17' and 'XXX' material isn't really appropriate for this server.
Violence/Gore: Under most circumstances... please don't post it. If it's exceptional/important (police brutality, punching nazis, riot porn, etc.) -- it must have Content Warnings out the wazoo.

Illegal Activity: We're responsible for the contents of this server, please don't engage in criminal activity here. ğŸ˜… No "ContentID"-level of copyrights will be enforced (on our part), just avoid bald piracy when possible.
Federation Policy: We don't federate with bigots, unmoderated servers ("free speech absolutionists"), dataminers/spammers, illegal content, or servers that are just pure porn (no offense to porn).
We reserve the right to deny service to anyone.

posthat.ca.text: No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies. Threatening, abusive, intolerant or illegal behaviour may lead to moderation. Nazi's fuck off.
Your data and our servers are in Canada. Do not post anything that is illegal in Canada.
Do not share false or misleading information.
The Content Warning flag should be used for NSFW content, and NSFW media should be marked as sensitive.
Always be kind to each other. Don't say anything you wouldn't face to face.

preciouslittle.life.text: rules on an instance like this are a little weird to write, since this instance is for me only, but generally i follow good faith rules and etiquette such as those written on here - https://chitter.xyz/about/more. in short, no fascism, no lgbt+phobia, no ableism, no gatekeeping, no being a dick.
if you think i've fucked up something, please do approach me about it - I try to be as friendly as possible and try hard to correct my mistakes.

progressivecafe.social.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, antisemitism, hate speech, ableism, or gender discrimination.
No violence, threats, or incitements to violence to another person or group.
No international misinformation, particularly medical misinformation and misinformation designed to suppress or mislead voters.
No Twitter crossposts or screenshots, including copies of posts marked â€œRT.â€
Be kind to other users. No personal attacks, harassment, trolling, dogpiling, or brigading.

progressives.social.text: No racism, sexism, antisemitism, transphobia, homophobia, ableism, or gender discrimination.
No violence, threats of violence, or incitement to violence.
No trolling, harassment, personal attacks, or doxxing.  Treat others with respect.

proto.lgbt.text: No illegal and sus af content

protogen.social.text: Avoid disrespect, we're all about positivity here
We have a 0 tolerance policy on racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia
Common sense is your best friend, think twice before you post
Don't be overly spammy, as nobody would like a messy feed

provo.lol.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, ableism, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
No content illegal in The Netherlands
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
No covid denialism or covid minimising

psu.social.text: No violence or sexually explicit media.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, or transphobia.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
Content will be actively moderated in support of these rules.

The site admins are inherently reasonable and middle-of-the-road people. There is no desire to enforce an ideology one way or the other, we just ask that you please be kind and respectful to each other and this will work well for all of us. Thank you.

ps.s10y.eu.text: Use English, French, or Flemish on this instance. Other languages will be excluded.
Be excellent to each other! We reserve the right to ban anyone who doesn't comply.

ptpverse.dns-cloud.net.text: Personal server. Only friends and family are allowed.

pub.deferpanic.dev.text: You can use any language you want, but English is recommended here

pub.ehrengruppe.de.text: Kein Posten von Sexuellen Inhalten ohne Content Warnungen
Kein Posten von Inhalten, die in Deutschland nicht erlaubt sind
Kein Hass, keine Hetze, keine Transphobie und keine Homophobie

pub.qu1x.one.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No colonialism, imperialism, nationalism, fascism, or religious extremism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
No content considered illegal in Germany
No intentional sharing of false or misleading information

pub.osrx.social.text: Keine Hassrede, Hetze, Rassismus oder Mobbing.

pubby.social.text: Stay legal. Respect international laws, from the country the instance is hold in (Canada), laws from the admins' country (Canada), and from your own country.
Be respectful. Donâ€™t go insult others, whether you say it straight to their face or not.
Be respectful. Content that is spammy, racist, sexist, hateful, or discriminating in any way is forbidden.
Be respectful. "Screenshot dunking", or taking screenshots of posts to repost, is strongly discouraged, and may lead to admin action.
Content Warning policy. CW drugs and lewd posts and pictures, kinks must be listed in the CW.
Content Warning policy. Politics, religion, and other polemical subjects must be CW accordingly.
Content Warning policy. Requests for financial help, and similar, are welcome when under CW. However try not to spam them.
Content Warning policy. Bot posting must be CW as such,and follow the specifications in the "Accounts policy" section.
Accounts policy. Parody accounts must be tagged as such clearly in their profile description.
Accounts policy. Bots must be tagged as such, and bot owners must ensure they will have a minimal impact on the instance's performances.
Accounts policy. Bots should only post in "unlisted", "followers only", or "direct" privacy settings, not public, to keep the local and federated timelines clear and focused on users.
Accounts policy. You may not create another account on this instance if your previous account has been suspended.
Accounts policy. You may not use an avatar if it shows content that is listed to be content warned.
Accounts policy. Do not impersonate someone, unless for parody purposes (Remaining respectful). This includes using other peoples' artworks without permission.
Accounts policy. You may not use a header image if it shows content that is listed to be content warned.
Be respectful. Stalking and harassment is forbidden, if someone doesnâ€™t want to have anything to do with you, leave them alone.

Content Warning policy. While not required, we heavily encourage the use of the content warning system for quality of life on contents such as food, selfies, current popular topics (e.g. game release), conventions/live events, liveposting, threads and long posts.
Don't repost artworks without crediting the artist. If you have a link to their gallery, perfect, if only their name, better than nothing. Claiming other's art as your own may lead to suspension.
Content Warning policy. NSFW, Gore, Â«Real LifeÂ» and lewd content is allowed as long as it has the proper tagging in the CW.

publicgood.social.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia, or transphobia.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No harassment of other users on this or other servers.
No content which is illegal in either the United States or the European Union.
No promotion or incitement of hate, violence, or violent ideologies.
No disinformation regarding public health issues or political/military campaigns.

publishing.social.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, antisemitism, or casteism.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No harassment of or dogpiling other users.
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information.

This is a server for trade publishing professionals. If you are not one, please look to one of the many other servers that exist. There are HUNDREDS you can find: https://joinmastodon.org/servers or https://instances.social/.
No ad hominem attacks. Donâ€™t discredit someone because of who they are.
Do not propagate misinformation or disinformation.

Donâ€™t harass anyone, especially the moderators. Harassment can be difficult to define fully, but any sort of slurs or prejudicial comments based on identity will be removed. Repeated harassment will prompt a suspension.
Do not encourage violence, either implicitly or explicitly.
Hate speech is not tolerated. This includes racism, misogyny, transphobia, homophobia and religious intolerance such as anti-semitism. This list is illustrative but not exhaustive.
Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting.

puget.social.text: Treat others as you would like to be treated (One of Violet's favorite sayings).
Mark sensitive content with a content warning.
Gratuitous obscenity that serves no practical benefit to a discussion is not permitted.
Illegal content such as child pornography is prohibited.
Spam is not permitted, this includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services.
Hate speech and abusive or threatening behavior is not permitted, specifically that which directed at any gender, nationality, religion, race, age, sexual orientation, or sexual identity.
Lack of a specific rule against a certain behavior does not indicate acceptance of that behavior.
Violating one or more of these rules may result in an immediate, permanent ban without notice or warning.
You may not impersonate a person or brand without a clear indication the account is unofficial and/or a parody. Parody accounts are permitted, as are legitimate brand accounts.
No attacks against (or from) the instance. You may not do anything which may impact confidentiality, integrity or availability of artsocial.boston, the users of the service or their data.
No posting of copyrighted content (especially photos, artwork, music) that you don't own or have permission to use.
You shall not do anything on this system that impacts the availability, integrity, and/or confidentiality of any other server or service.
No flooding the public timelines (making lots of public posts in quick succession).
See full Privacy and Terms and Conditions Here: https://fediverse.how/TOSdocs/TermsOfUse-Privacy-Summary.html

puppyfire.social.text: My server, my rules. This instance is just for me and my family.

puppo.space.text: NFSW/Lewd/Adult Content MUST be hidden behind a CW
Do not post content owned by someone else without permission
No posts promoting excessive or extremist levels of violence
No distribution of malware or other potentially unwanted software through the service
No hurtful or targeted language to attack a certain group or user
No misappropriating memes as use as hate symbols, this includes posting memes that are largely considered to be hate symbols

purposefully.social.text: Be Inclusive & Welcoming â¤ï¸ - Act in a way that contributes to creating a safe space for everyone, regardless of gender, race, religion, disability, or sexual identity and orientation.
Be Respectful & Positive ğŸ‘ - Encourage positive and constructive discussion, and do not engage in behaviour that is defamatory, abusive, threatening or harassing.
Be Trustworthy & Honest ğŸ’¯ - Respect copyright, do not intentionally share false or misleading information, do not share content that is illegal in the United Kingdom, and do not send spam.

qth.social.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia
No illegal content. This server is hosted in Texas, USA and must follow all applicable laws.

quakers.social.text: BE THOUGHTFUL. If you wouldn't say it during fellowship after the rise of meeting, think about whether to say it here.
BE ANTI-RACIST, ANTI-MISOGYNISTIC, AND ANTI-HOMO/TRANSPHOBIC. Do some positive work toward making this space welcoming to traditionally marginalized folks, and when you're called in, listen.
BE AUTHENTIC. If it's safe for you to do so, please sign up with your real name.

BE INTERESTING AND INTERESTED. Help make Quakers.Social a lively place. Post about your ministry or calling, your spiritiual life, and so on. Plus, on Mastodon there's no algorithm, just boosting and favouriting, so do plenty of both.
BE SAFE. If you say anything here that seems to the moderators to put anyone in any kind of danger, you get one warning, then your account will be disabled.

DON'T VIOLATE ANYONE'S COPYRIGHT. Please see the Quakers.Social DMCA Policy (https://meta.quakers.social/dmca-policy) for more information about what to do if you believe your rights have been infringed or if you have received a request to take down copyrighted material.

quarteredcircle.net.text:
Keep it legal.
(At least don't get anyone in trouble.)

queer.blahaj.solutions.text: For now consider the rules of chaos.social as applicable here.

queef.social.text: Mark sensitive content with a content warning.
This is a Private instance for friends of Dr. Ogg; Ogg reserves the right to run this site as he sees fit. E.g. don't be an asshole.
Illegal content such as child pornography, unsurprisingly, is not permitted
Lack of a specific rule against a certain behavior does not indicate acceptance of that behavior. Each of us has a limited amount of time in this world. Don't be a jerk.
Hate speech and abusive or threatening behavior is not permitted, specifically that which directed at any gender, nationality, religion, race, age, or sexual identity.
Violating one or more of these rules may result in an immediate, permanent ban without notice or warning.
Spam is not permitted, this includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services.
You may not impersonate a person or brand without a clear indication the account is unofficial and/or a parody. Parody accounts are permitted, as are legitimate brand accounts.
Scientific / COVID misinformation is not tolerated on this site; You will be banned without warning for sharing misinformation.
Domestic Terrorists / Q Anon  / Oath Keepers and other extremist groups are banned; if you are a member of any of those groups, you are not welcome here.
Elon Musk is not welcome here. Not even for $8.

queer.cool.text:
Discrimination & bigotry will not be tolerated
This is not a safe space for Nazis, TERFS, or hate speech.
Respect each other. This instance is meant to be a friendly, welcoming space to all who are willing to reciprocate in helping to create that environment.
Consent is key, in any context. If youâ€™re ever unsure, ask first. Use content warnings (CWs) where required.

Members under the age of 18 are not permitted to post lewd, explicit, nsfw, or otherwise sexual content. This includes as original posts or in reply to other members, as well as boosting content of this type from their accounts.
No direct threats and incitement to violence. Expressing dissatisfaction is fine, but directly stating interest or intent to commit violent harm are not welcome on this server.

queer.dev.text: NFTs or crypto promotion fuck right off!

queer.garden.text: adhere to the CoG (Code of the Garden): https://queer.garden/about

queer.party.text:
Be gay, do crimes (responsibly).
Don't post or use this service for anything illegal in Scotland, Germany or the EU.

Punch nazis, trebuchet terfs.
Any posts or usage which contain nazi symbolism or ideology, or which contain "gender-critical"/"just asking questions" tripe will get you banned immediately and without recourse. Weird pizza toppings are "unpopular opinions", human rights are not.

Be nice.
No racism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or any other form of discrimination. In absence of clarity, assume positive intent.

Don't ruin it.
queer.party is a freely-provided and unmonetised service. Don't abuse it, don't use it to abuse federated instances, don't try to break things.

Be considerate.
Respect others that use this service, and keep in mind that any public post you make might show up in the public timelines of this and other instances that federate with queer.party. Use content warnings, use NSFW tags, don't be a jerk about it.

Don't be (outwardly) horny.
NSFW isn't banned, but your profile (avatar, header, display name, bio, etc) must be completely safe, or they will be removed. Be courteous with content warnings and don't make them overly explicit.

No monopoly money.
You may not use this service to recruit victims to your bitcoin scam. No NFTs, no cryptocurrency peddling, no blockchains, no investment bullshit.
No misinformation. COVID is real, putin is a warmonger, trump lost. Do not use queer.party to spread unverified or false information. If you are joking, use the "misinformation" content warning.

queernerds.social.text: Don't organize or promote hate speech.
Don't make violent threats or threaten others with harm.
put CWs on your NSFW content.  (nudes, lewds, etc.)

queerspirituality.social.text: Be kind & courteous. Let's operate on the basis of mutual respect and kindness.
No hate speech or bullying. This is a queer space. Transphobia and homophobia will not be tolerated.
Use content warnings. Mark NSFW content as sensitive.

Regarding NSFW content. Queer spirituality is inherently sex-positive, so we have a liberal moderation policy in regard to NSFW content. However,  please refrain from reposting NSFW content that is not your own or reposting porn from other sites.

quickbrb.social.text: Mark sensitive content with a content warning.
Illegal content such as child pornography, unsurprisingly, is not permitted.
Spam is not permitted, this includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services.
Hate speech and abusive or threatening behavior is not permitted, specifically that which directed at any gender, nationality, religion, race, age, pizza topping preference, or sexual identity.
No harassment in the form of continued engagement after a person has requested contact to stop.

quinnwitz.house.text: Don't be a dick. We don't suffer bigots and nazis, whether blatant or cloaked in "free speech" word salad.
This server is, and always will be, invite-only.

quokka.city.text: Age Requirement - We require users to be at least 15 years or older to use this platform.

Inclusivity - No white supremacy, antiblackness, colorism, transmisia, cisheterosexism, ableism, misogyny, fat hate, or gender binarism. Bigotry of any kind will not be tolerated here. Reclaiming slurs IS OKAY, but be aware of who you are speaking to/with and respect their boundaries.

Golden Rule - Be respectful to your peers please. We're all here just trying to find a place that fills the same social media niche we're used to so don't be rude or hateful to anyone else. Threats, persistent block evasions, and harassment will result in a suspension.

Protecting Vulnerable Individuals - Content that exploits, abuses, or endangers children or animals is strictly prohibited. This includes content that sexualizes minors or animals, as well as material that promotes harm against them.

Requirements for Account Request - In order for us to maintain a level of safety on the site, we ask that when submitting a request for an account you give us your NAME, AGE, AND YOUR QUOTEV OR DISCORD USERS. Thank you.

Account Limit - To keep our servers stable, you are currently allowed 2 accounts to your person! Please abide by this - if you exceed this limit we will have to delete the most recently created account. Account sharing is prohibited.

rah.social.text: Racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia will not be tolerated.
Mark sensitive content with a content warning.
Do not post illegal content. If it is against US, California, or Oregon law it cannot be posted here.
Hate speech and abusive or threatening behavior is not permitted. See Rule 1.

rails.social.text: Be nice. There is enough hate in this world and this community doesn't need any of that. We love others and should respect one another. We don't have much time in this life, so let's use our time to lift others up instead of tearing them down.
No pornography or nudity, or something that would be considered "NSFW" in a workplace, even behind a NSFW warning. In particular, no sexual depictions of children.
No bots. We are humans here.
No discrimination of any kind. Any kind of insults or hate will not be tolerated. See Rule 1.
No stalking or harassment of any kind
No fake accounts. We are a great community and there isn't a need to hide under a fake account.
No excessive promotion. Spamming the site with a "deal" doesn't benefit anyone. Feel free to share your content, but don't be annoying.

rail.chat.text: Be kind. Insulting or bullying other members or non-members will get you banned from the group without prior warning.
Be civil. We do not condone foul language. Breaking this rule once will land you a warning. Doing it repeatedly will get you banned.

Promotion of your own creative endeavors, and of nonprofit organizations, is acceptable. But other advertising should be avoided. Inappropriate posts will be immediately removed and you might get banned.
Use the search option. To avoid cluttering the group, please search the feed before asking a question. Someone might have already asked the same thing before.
English preferred, please. To make sure all members of the group understand you, please use the English language. Links to posts in other languages are OK.
Stick to the topic. We only allow posts and comments related to the groupâ€™s activity. Off-topic content will be removed and you will get a warning.
No spamming. Asking the same question or posting the same comment repeatedly after it has been removed by admins due to rule violation will result in a ban.
Report rule-breaking. If you see a post/comment that violates our rules, report it to the admins â€” DO NOT verbally attack the author of said post/comment.
Think before you report. Donâ€™t report posts or comments that arenâ€™t breaking any rules just because you donâ€™t like or agree with their content.
Talk to the admin team. If you have any questions or concerns or are experiencing issues in the group, please turn to one of the admins for help. Thatâ€™s what weâ€™re here for!

raikow.online.text: Misogyny, racism, religious bigotry, homophobia, and transphobia will not be tolerated.

ramble.space.text: Be kind. Do not be intentionally antagonistic, harass anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks.

Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist, or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language. Do not promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia, or other hateful ideologies.
Do not post adult content, including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention (including sexualized comments or jokes).

Do not post about inflammatory, controversial topics without using the â€œContent Warningâ€ feature. Colorful language or content that you wouldnâ€™t want your own young children to see should be behind a Content Warning.

No harassment, brigading or doxxing of other users

relayfm.social.text: Be kind. Be respectful of other users, refraining from name-calling, personal attacks, shaming and argument tactics like devilâ€™s advocate positions.

religion.masto.host.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, able-ism, etc.

No serious dishonesty that is hurtful to others (e.g. falsely representing oneself as a member of a minority; services offering to write academic papers to help students cheat; vaccine denialism; predatory conferences or journals; overt pseudoscience such as flat-earther-ism etc.)
No harassment of any kind. This includes heckling, sea-lioning, and continuing to push a "robust debate" past the point that the other party has indicated that they are done.
No bots, and no group accounts; institutional accounts are subject to moderator discretion and must be operated by a single named individual.
No automated cross-posters from Twitter, RSS, etc. on Public privacy setting
No un-described images or video on Public privacy setting
No advertisements or apologia for cryptocurrencies, NFT's, or multi-level marketing schemes

No shortened links, e.g. bit.ly, t.ly, goo.gl, ift.tt, lnkd.in, is.gd or t.co (These are malicious because link-shorteners track users without their consent and obscure the destination address, which also prevents users from being able to decide whether they want to visit the link beforehand)

religious.social.text: This server is for religious (deacons, priests, brothers, sisters, etc) at this time or official Catholic organizations.
Anonoymous accounts are allowed, but verification of status by a moderator is required to join.

Be nice.

We're people, even if we're religious, so things can get heated. Don't attack people.

restraint.social.text: All restraint.social citizens must be at least 18 years of age.
All restraint.social citizens must be people that the owners of restraint.social know.
Culturally, restraint.social is a sex-positive space for all folks. There are are no litmus tests regarding kinks, gender expression or sexual expression.
No trolling or rudeness for any reason. No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia or using the word "dominate" as a noun or adjective.

retro-gaiden.com.text: No NSFW images. This includes but is not limited to: Nudity, pornography, or overly lewd images.
No political posts in the Retro Gaiden local timeline.
No spamming. Try to wait at least 20 minutes between posts.
Non retro gaming posts are allowed but keep it to a minimum.

â€œRetroâ€ on this server is considered anything from the dawn of video games (Pong) to Wii U. It can also be applied to retro-styled modern games or new games based on old franchises. Cartoons, movies, TV shows and music from the 80s and 90s are also considered retro.
No posting about your sexual preferences.

retro.social.text: We won't tolerate the harassment or abuse of marginalized people.
We absolutely will block your nazi ass
Don't index us, don't research us.

retro.pizza.text: MOST IMPORTANTLY: No Nazis, no TERFs, no hate speech, no homophobia, no transphobia, no racism, no misogyny, no antisemitism, no Q bullshit. No, anti-hate speech it not itself a kind of hate speech.

Use a Content Warning (CW) for adult/NSFW content, spoilers, discussions of potentially upsetting/stressful political events, and subjects likely to be upsetting/traumatic (i.e. suicide) or trigger a common phobia. Read the Director's Cut for specifics.
Bots are fine so long as they're contributing something fun to the community and marked using the "This is a bot" checkbox in their profile.
Advertising is only allowed for personal projects (i.e. podcasts, YouTube channels, Twitch streams, personal shops, etc.). It is also ENCOURAGED for personal projects -- show off your stuff!
The administration and moderators are the final say in any disputes on the site. The administration reserves the right to ban based solely on Edgelord/Channer Vibes.

retrochat.online.text: Keep it kind, free speech is fine, but it doesn't mean you can harass and insult other people
Feel free to geek out about anything you're passionate about (whilst adhering to other rules)
This is a multi-language server, please be respectful if another user is using a language you don't understand
NSFW inc. nudity is allowed but must be CWd, this includes boosts
Self Promotion is allowed, this includes self produced merchandise and content. Promotion of large companies and their products is permitted to certain bounds.

Any data present on this server, created by us or our members, is for the use in which it was originally created.  We do not condone posts being aggregated for use outside of the Fediverse, or by services created solely for the purpose of aggregation. This includes OPT-OUT services.

No sexual depictions of children (including computer generated)
Accounts created solely for the purpose of posting NSFW content are not permitted

We refrain from trolling and using insulting/derogatory comments as well as personal attacks

risk.social.text: You may not threaten or glorify violence against an individual or a group of people. You may not threaten or promote terrorism or violent extremism.
You may not share or promote content that is NSFW.
You may not engage in targeted harassment, or incite others to do so.

You may not promote or threaten violence against, or harass anyone on the basis of race, ethnicity, national origin, caste, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, religious affiliation, age, disability, or serious disease.
You may not post, threaten to post, or encourage others to post anyone's private information without their express permission.
You may not promote misinformation or disinformation.
You may not impersonate individuals, groups, or organizations in a manner to mislead, confuse, or deceive others. Parody accounts are acceptable if the profile indicates that it is a parody.
You may not spam. Brand/corporate accounts and self-promotion are acceptable so long as the content makes a positive contribution to insurance or risk.

Violating one or more of these rules may result in an immediate, permanent ban without notice or warning. Lack of a specific rule against a certain behavior does not indicate acceptance of that behavior. Each of us has a limited amount of time in this world. Don't be a jerk.

rodent.life.text: All users must be 18 years of age or older.
No accounts may be made for bots or corporate entities. (External accounts for bots or corporate entities followed by users on this instance will be Limited.)
All avatar and header images must be SFW. (They must follow the rest of the Acceptable Content Policies, and cannot be put behind a Content Warning or marked as sensitive.)
All content and conduct must comply with the laws of Japan, where this instance is hosted.

No hate speech of any kind, period. This is not a place for any defamatory, threatening, or harmful messages. By the same logic, any violent calls to action or language that seems to encourage harm is not welcome. (See https://joinmastodon.org/covenant )

Use Content Warnings (CW) for anything others may find troubling. CWs are required for heated political or socio-economic topics, angry rants, or depressing topics. CWs are recommended for excessively long posts to keep the timelines clean. It is also recommended to use hashtags.

Respect Copyright protections. Any media subject to Copyright must be posted by the Copyright owner (typically the artist) or with license from the Copyright owner (permission from the artist provided, typically the commissioner or someone whose character is in the art). Also, please credit artists.

Explicit material (ex. porn or gore) must be suitably censored (in compliance with the law where this instance is hosted). Explanations of what constitutes adequate censorship are easy to find on the internet. (Here is one from Pixiv: https://www.pixiv.net/terms/?page=guideline )

All NSFW content posted from rodent.life must use Content Warnings. NSFW media must use "Mark as Sensitive" where applicable (which should happen automatically when you have a content warning applied).
No NSFW photos are permitted. This includes sexually explicit imagery and photos of graphic harm. Any human in a photo must be 18 years of age or older.
No realistic CGI renders involving minors in sexual situations. By the same logic, no hyper-realistic, drawn images of minors in sexual situations.
No fully AI-generated art. (This may change in the future if there is a way to verify that the AI was not trained with stolen art, but that seems unlikely at this time.)
This instance predominantly exists for furries. If an accountâ€™s content never has to do with furries or furry art, that account may be Limited or Suspended at administrationâ€™s discretion.

This is a private server. As such, the rules are open to interpretation by the administration. Furthermore, content may be removed at the administrationâ€™s discretion in an effort to maintain a safe and welcoming environment.

romancelandia.club.text: People registering and maintaining accounts at Romancelandia.Club agree to these rules as the starting point for conduct guidance. You are also agreeing to review and abide by the full code of conduct (below).

No person registering a Romancelandia.Club account shall use the account for harassment, threats, or intimidation, nor to compromise the safety, privacy, or well-being of any other person on this or any other instance.
No person shall engage in behavior disruptive to the ongoing communication among others; if you are asked to cease an interaction or contact, publicly or personally, you will do so.

The following are not permitted anywhere on Romancelandia.Club: Holocaust denial and Nazi symbolism; promotion of fascist, supremacist, violent or hateful ideology or symbolism, including in choice of user name or avatar; willful mis/disinformation that may harm others.

If a participant engages in behavior that contravenes these rules, the admins may take any action they deem appropriate, up to and including deletion of an account from Romancelandia.Club and identifying the participant publicly as someone about whom we've received complaints.

routing.center.text: Don't be toxic - Be nice, don't cause drama.
Don't post inappropriate pictures, videos, or website links - This includes but not limited to NSFW, Jump Scare, or Screamer links within any channel.

rstats.me.text: Be Kind! This is a place for everyone in the #RStats community. Be considerate that not everyone's experience is your experience.
Make efforts to think about accessibility. Please add alt text and use PascalCase for hashtags to help people using screen readers.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other peopleâ€™s personally identifying information (â€œdoxingâ€) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.
Do not post adult content, including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention (including sexualized comments or jokes).

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on â€” just keep the toot itself interesting).
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour; criticize ideas, never people.

Only use automated tools if youâ€™re active in the RStats community and respond to replies you receive here. Bots that are provide useful announcements to the community are permitted, but if theyâ€™re overly noisy they may be removed after consultation.
Use a content warning if the subject is controversial, sensitive, or may reasonably cause others distress.

rubber.social.text:
Be pervy, be kind.

We are a kink-positive and sex-positive community. Though it says rubber in the name, we welcome all types of risk aware consensual kink.

No harassment or abuse.

Racism, misogyny, transphobia, homophobia, or body shaming will not be tolerated.

Keep it legal

No child pornography. Users are assumed to be 18 years old or otherwise legal to view sexual content in their jurisdiction.

Use Content Warnings or Sensitive Content flags.

Since we federate with other instances please mark any media with exposed genitals as Sensitive Content or with a Content Warning. No exposed genitals in your avatar or banner image please.

Use the #promo hashtag on ads or commercial posts.

We're excited for kink vendors to participate in our community. That said we'd like to keep it more of a flea market than a mall. So that users can easily identify them: posts promoting goods and/or services must use the #promo hashtag.
Accounts that flood with non-original or third-party content will be Silenced.

Sign-Up Approval: 

Approval required for sign-up for anti-spam purposes. Don't need much, just enough to show you're not a spammer. Just a simple "I like rubber" works even!

No hate speech or promotion of violence, white supremacy, antisemitism, or other hateful ideologies.
No pornography or depictions of sexual violence.
No posts promoting unsupported conspiracy theories, or other false or misleading information.
No content illegal in the United States.

ruby.social.text:
No bots

... unless they're cute, funny, or useful. Bots should avoid posting to the public timeline.
No pornography or nudity, or something that would be considered "NSFW" in a workplace, even behind a NSFW warning. In particular, no sexual depictions of children.
No gore or graphic violence. Again, if you wouldn't post it at work, you definitely shouldn't be posting it here.
Use content warnings. Content that is borderline NSFW or could be construed as NSFW at a glance should be put behind a CW (Content Warning)
No racism. This should go without saying, but unfortunately it doesn't.

No sexism

... or pretty much any other -ism

No discrimination. Any discrimination based on gender, sexual minority, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, religion (or lack thereof), or national origin, will result in your account and content being removed.
No xenophobia. This includes violent nationalism.
No holocaust denialism. No Nazi symbolism, promotion of National Socialism, or anything that is illegal in the European Union
No stalking or harassment of any kind

No fake accounts, even celebrity joke accounts.

Note this rule does not necessarily apply to remote accounts.
No "follow bots." We block these and our instance is on a "no bots" list

No advertising or excessive promotion. By far the biggest problem we've had running this server are spam accounts that sign up only to promote some company (often nothing even to do with Ruby), and so we take a fairly strong stance against letting such accounts even register on the server now.

saint-paul.us.text: No spamming. Excessive commercial advertising or commercial postswill be removed from the public timeline. Continued spamming may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service.
Bots require approval from the administrators. Unapproved bots posting from third-party sources will have their content removed from the public timeline and will result in account suspension.

Gore and/or extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions, must be tagged with a content warning and digital media must be marked sensitive. Failure to do so will result in the content being removed from the public timeline.

All explicit (NSFW) content must be marked as sensitive and have a content warning. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.  Such "untagged" content will be removed from the public timeline and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service.

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and will result in account suspension including revocation of access to the service; Racist, Sexist, Homophobic, Transphobic, Xenophobic, Sexual depictions of children.

Spreading disinformation or conspiracy theories that undermine public safety and/or health will result in removal of the content from the public timeline and will result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service.

Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions is explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service.

sakurajima.moe.text: You may not harass/bully people, incite violence, and/or post hate speech (e.g. racism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, etc)
sakurajima.moe.hint: This includes other abusive behavior such as cyberbullying, brigading/dogpiling, doxxing, trolling, swatting, sending death threats, abusing #fediblock tag,  etc.

sakurajima.moe.text: Do not post misinformation anything advocating extremist movements
sakurajima.moe.hint: Examples includes Anti-Vaxx, Covid-19 misinformation, 5G conspiracy theories or to extremist movements:  National Socialism, Alt-Right, MAGA,  voicing support for fascist/totalitarian regimes, etc

sakurajima.moe.text: Do not post images associated with hate movements, extremist ideologies or groups
sakurajima.moe.hint: Examples includes Confederate States, National Socalism symbols, Alt-Right, etc.

sakurajima.moe.text: NSFW content must be tagged approprately with content warning applied or marked as sensitive. No posting of underaged sexual-explicit content (real life/CSAM/CSEM and lolicon/shotacon) is allowed. This rule is handled differently for servers on the exception list, see about page.
Properly credit artwork that you didnâ€™t create and AI content must be tagged. No accounts that solely posts AI.
sakurajima.moe.hint: Use #AIArt for any artwork that is generated from AI so users can properly filter it. Accounts may not solely post AI-generated content.

sakurajima.moe.text: Do not post SPAM, links to scam sites, pirated materials, phishing sites, or websites that break federal laws.
sakurajima.moe.hint: Self promotion is OK, as long the links are safe and does not break the above rules.

sakurajima.moe.text: By using this service, you are expected to follow the laws of the United States of America. Refrain from posting anything that may break federal laws.
No mini-modding. If you see any post break the rules, report the post instead.
Sensitive content (e.g. violence, blood/gore, NSFW, self harm) should be put behind a content warning or mark sensitive.
sakurajima.moe.hint: Note that demanding and/or berating users for not using CW, except from a moderator is not allowed, See https://forums.sakurajima.moe/resources/content-warning-policy.18/ for more information about content warnings.

sakurajima.moe.text: Creator accounts  must be Japanese media/culture related  or inspired. This rule does not apply to non-creators. See about page for full details
You may operate bots, but they must follow our rules and must be Japanese Media related.
sakurajima.moe.hint: Bots should not post more than 4 public posts in an hour or 16 unlisted posts in an hour. No repetitive posts, unless unlisted. Bots cannot use AI chat bots (e.g. ChatGPT).

sakurajima.moe.text: No impersonation accounts are allowed (of any creator or famous people) without proper identification.
sakurajima.moe.hint: Parody accounts may not be created here, RP accounts are however allowed.

samstodon.net.text: Harassment, abuse, racism, sexism, misogyny, homophobia, etc. will result in the termination of your account WITH NO EXCEPTIONS.
NSFW content such as pornography, gore, etc. is not allowed here as decided in the TTSC Discord Server
Backseat moderating is not allowed. If you spot a Samstodon user breaking any rules, please report them privately using Mastodon's built-in reporting system.
ALL politcal discussion must be placed in a content warning WITH NO EXCEPTIONS.

sandiegourbanists.com.text: Don't act like an asshole and routinely make other people's experiencesâ€”or livesâ€”worse. Almost all of the restrictions on how you can use this Mastodon instance are just more-explicit versions of this basic guideline. Treat others with basic civility and try to contribute in good faith.
Do not maliciously impersonate someone else's identity (real world or online).
Do not maliciously attempt to counteract other users' attempts to delete or edit their content, such as by deliberately re-posting content they want to be deleted.
Do not incite or encourage harm against people, including by posting hate speech or threats. This includes content that is racist, antisemitic, sexist, homophobic or transphobic.
Do not post anyone's sensitive personal information (related to either their real world or online identity) with malicious intent.
Do not post NSFW content of any kind.

santos.social.text: Keep everything clean. No insults, bullying, or low blows. No illegal content can be shared as stated by USA law. Ok, now touch gloves.

saptodon.org.text: Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other peopleâ€™s personally identifying information (â€œdoxingâ€) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.
Do not post adult content, including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention (including sexualized comments or jokes).

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the saptodon community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.
Do not debate moderation actions in public toots. If you disagree with how a moderator enforced this CoC you may direct-message the moderation team or email h.tammen@tammen-it-solutions.de

Toot in English, please. This makes moderation easier and it helps everyone on this server to follow the discussions. 
If you toot from your saptodon account to someone at another server in another language than english that's of course ok.

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on â€” just keep the toot itself interesting).
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
Do not â€œshitpostâ€ - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged, there is no place for â€œshitpostingâ€ on saptodon.
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour; criticize ideas, never people.

Do not tone police. Toots may violate the standards of civility we set on saptodon, but you should not criticize users for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them. In neither case should you criticize their tone.
Abide by the law. Very simple. You can also be reported on the internet.
If you want to create a NSFW-only account, you may want to consider another instance. We are probably not suitable for you.
We do not tolerate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or the promotion of the ideology of National Socialism.

Recruiter? This is probably not your space If you are a recruiter or work for recruiter this may not be your mastodon instance. If you place project requests here we will suspend your account. You can of course discuss SAP issues with us.

sasa.africa.text: This space is mainly focused on how we can create better distributed systems, especially from an African social-technical experience. Let us try to keep it focused.
Think of the human, not just the system, code, or its rules.
No bigotry, including able-ism, racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia and such.

Put effort in finding and sharing evidence to your claims. (Primary sources make a stronger network of knowledge. If you are citing a report, cite the publisher, not a news article about it, if your reason is sharing the report and not the opinion of others about that report.
No ads or spam. Engage with people, donâ€™t assume they are your captive market.
All images and video must be described to as much extent as possible.
Post full links and especially do not use url shrtnrs like bit.ly, which conceal and track those who click them.
Let us all try to create a better social network away from the surveillance nightmare of capitalism-backed extractive experiences.
Shields up! Practice safe exploration, for example, by enabling 2FA on this instance (Preferences > Account > Two-factor Auth ... )

satori.cafe.text: Keep conversations civil and respectful even in disagreement. Be nice!
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, anti-Semitism, or casteism, see rule 1.

No bots that are not labeled as such in their profile.

savageworlds.social.text:
Be Kind and Courteous

We're here due to a shared love of Savage Worlds. Let's treat everyone with respect. Healthy disagreements are natural, but politeness is required.

No Hate Speech or Bullying

Make sure everyone feels safe. Bullying of any kind isn't allowed, and degrading comments about things like race, religion, culture, sexual orientation, gender or identity will not be tolerated.

Respect Copyright

It's fine to discuss plot and mechanics from Savage Worlds products, but don't quote the rules or text verbatim. This applies to all copyright material.

When in Doubt, Rules from the Savage Worlds FB Group Apply

When in doubt, the rules from the Official Savage Worlds Facebook Group apply here as well.

scicomm.xyz.text: Be civil, polite, and respectful in your posts and replies.
Read the full list of rules and acceptable behaviour and content standards. These are available at: https://about.scicomm.xyz

Use the Content Warning (CW) feature for your posts when necessary. If you are not sure, do it anyway: treat it like a 'Subject' header for your message. More info: https://about.scicomm.xyz/doku.php?id=info:cws

Avoid cross-posters wherever possible. If you do use a cross-poster then be sure to maintain regular direct engagement with your account here. More info: https://about.scicomm.xyz/doku.php?id=info:about_bots
No language or imagery which is spam or advertising, harassing, pornographic, violent, xenophobic, nationalistic, racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist, or otherwise discriminatory.
No bots. This instance is for humans only. More info: https://about.scicomm.xyz/doku.php?id=info:about_bots
Include an image description to all images. The description should describe the content of the image. More info: https://about.scicomm.xyz/doku.php?id=info:image_descriptions

Do not use URL shortening services. Always include the full URL in your posts, copied from the address bar of your browser. All URLs count as 23 characters in your post regardless of their length, long or short. More info: https://about.scicomm.xyz/doku.php?id=info:url_shorteners

You will not conduct bulk recording or archiving of material from this instance without specific written consent from all users and the administration and moderation team, i.e. do NOT scrape this instance's data.

>>> IMPORTANT: READ ME! <<<

Before you proceed, please visit https://about.scicomm.xyz/doku.php?id=newaccounts to understand our account registration and approval process.

If you do not understand the process then your account request may be rejected.

sci.kiwi.text: No sexually explicit images or videos. No illegal content.
No incitement of violence of promotion of violent ideologies.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No harassment, dogpiling, bullying, or doxxing of other users

science.channel.org.text: For server rules, please visit channel.org/about
science.channel.org.hint: For server rules, please visit channel.org/about

sciencemastodon.com.text: Users may not be anonymous, at least while this site is in its infancy.
Users should be scientists, journalists, or scientific/journalistic institutions or publications.

Please be as kind, polite, and understanding as you would be in a cocktail party of friends and strangers. Harassment, racism, sexism, antisemitism, homophobia, transphobia, or bullying will get you shown to the door.
No trolling -- combative, out-of-left-field responses to posts seeking argumentation rather than genuine discussion are not welcome.
Avoid spreading misinformation. Obviously this can be difficult to delineate, and there are many gray areas, but repeated and/or deliberate spread of misinformation is not allowed.

Relentlessly pushing a theory or idea -- in its extreme, crankery -- is not welcome. The line is blurry, but it can be crossed. Again, think cocktail party... feel free to discuss ideas, but if people are likely to start sidling away, it's an issue.
The Content Warning flag should be used for NSFW content; NSFW media should be marked as sensitive.

sciences.social.text: Use your real name and be yourself. Your real world reputation is valuable here and your reputation here is valuable in the real world.
No sexism, racism, homophobia, transphobia, casteism or abusive behavior
Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.

scipost.social.text: No automated cross-posting from Twitter, RSS, etc. on Public privacy setting.
No shortened links (e.g. bit.ly, goo.gl, ift.tt, lnkd.in, is.gd, t.co or others): these can involve unauthorized user tracking, and obfuscate the destination.
No harassment of any kind; no sexism, racism, [community/identity]-phobia of any kind.
No advertisements, product promotion, marketing or corporate shenanigans.
No cheating, denialism, dishonesty, falsification, misrepresentation, predatory solicitation, pseudoscientific crackpotism/flatearthism, zealotry or any similar behaviour.

scientists.today.text: Be nice and professional. No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
No content illegal in Austria, Germany, EU. If you are not sure - do not publish it on this server.

No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.

No sexually explicit or violent media

scientificnetwork.de.text: Violence: You may not threaten violence against an individual or a group of people. We also prohibit the glorification of violence.
Terrorism/violent extremism: You may not threaten or promote terrorism or violent extremism.
Child sexual exploitation: We have zero tolerance for child sexual exploitation.
Abuse/harassment: You may not engage in the targeted harassment of someone, or incite other people to do so. This includes wishing or hoping that someone experiences physical harm.

Hateful conduct: You may not promote violence against, threaten, or harass other people on the basis of race, ethnicity, national origin, caste, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, religious affiliation, age, disability, or serious disease.

Perpetrators of violent attacks: We will remove any accounts maintained by individual perpetrators of terrorist, violent extremist, or mass violent attacks, and may also remove message disseminating manifestos or other content produced by perpetrators.
Suicide or self-harm: You may not promote or encourage suicide or self-harm.

Sensitive media, including graphic violence and adult content: You may not post media that is excessively gory or share violent or adult content within live video or in profile or header images. Media depicting sexual violence and/or assault is also not permitted.

Illegal or certain regulated goods or services: You may not use our service for any unlawful purpose or in furtherance of illegal activities. This includes selling, buying, or facilitating transactions in illegal goods or services, as well as certain types of regulated goods or services.

Private information: You may not publish or post other people's private information (such as home phone number and address) without their express authorization and permission. We also prohibit threatening to expose private information or incentivizing others to do so.
Non-consensual nudity: You may not post or share intimate photos or videos of someone that were produced or distributed without their consent.

Platform manipulation and spam: You may not use scientificnetwork.de's services in a manner intended to artificially amplify or suppress information or engage in behavior that manipulates or disrupts peopleâ€™s experience on scientificnetwork.de.

Civic Integrity: You may not use scientificnetwork.de's services to manipulate or interfere in elections or other civic processes. This includes posting or sharing content that may suppress participation or mislead people about when, where, or how to participate in a civic process.
Synthetic and manipulated media: You may not deceptively share synthetic or manipulated media that are likely to cause harm
Copyright and trademark: You may not violate othersâ€™ intellectual property rights, including copyright and trademark.
You may not submit, post, or display any video content on or through our services that includes third-party advertising, such as pre-roll video ads or sponsorship graphics, without our prior consent.

scorpinc.social.text: This is a safe place. No racism, sexism, queerphobia, ableism, or discriminating against any other groups.
We support all ScorpInc employees; past, present, and future. This means all sentiences and AIs throughout the temporal multiverse deserve to be free from discrimination and harassment.

Admins and moderators reserve the right to ban any entities, governments, or other Fediverse instances for abuse, spam, harassment, discrimination, or not abiding by ScorpInc's dedication to a better, more sustainable ftuure.

screencastsonline.social.text: ScreenCastsOnline.social is where people from all walks of life can come together and collaborate in a respectful, inclusive environment â€” no matter their age, nationality, race, gender identity or religious beliefs are.

We welcome conversation, feedback and differing viewpoints at our space! However, to ensure the safety of all visitors we ask that everyone remain respectful; please refrain from posts containing any form of spam or personal attacks. Let's work together for a positive experience for everyone!

We will take swift action to protect this server and its users from harm, quickly suspending any account that violates our rules without hesitation. Additionally, if the members of a remote server are found to be collectively attempting to cause damage here, then I may disconnect them entirely.

Mastodon is a public platform, and anything that you post - including private conversations - can be seen by anyone. Remember to adjust your privacy settings accordingly if confidentiality is of the utmost importance for your posts.
At ScreenCastsOnline.social, we strive to provide a safe and friendly environment for all of our members, so by signing up you're agreeing to abide by the rules! We appreciate your cooperation - Don

This instance is intended for current ScreenCastsOnline Members Only and is not open for other registrations. Please enter your ScreenCastsOnline username in the "Why do you want to join?" box when signing up.

selfhosted.cafe.text: Do not abuse, belittle, or insult anyone. Hate speech and harassment of any users on this server or other Mastodon servers or other federated systems is completely unacceptable. Any reports of abuse, in any form, will be logged and will lead to a ban.

Do not discuss piracy (including how to skirt software licensing). This isn't a warez forum. The discussion of software such as Sonarr, Radarr, Lidarr and similar software is allowed, but discussing where to get content from is not allowed.
NSFW content is strictly off limits.
This Mastodon server is not an advertising platform. If you come here with the sole intent of advertising your services, you will be removed.

seo.chat.text: Be polite and kind. Don't be a jerk. Religious speech, hate speech, discrimination, and harassment of any kind is not tolerated on this server.
Be respectful - even if you disagree.
This server is intended for anyone who works in Search Engine Optimization (SEO).

The primary language for this server is English. Although it is fine to discuss SEO examples/cases/details related to different markets, languages and locales, make sure that the primary language of your posts are in English.
Read the About page for best practices and content not allowed on this server.

serenityos.social.text: Take all rules as guidelines and act accordingly. In doubt feel free to address @buggie@serenityos.social, @linusg@serenityos.social or @networkexception@serenityos.social directly. The administrator team always has the last word about enforcement of rules and does not have to explain actions taken.
Do the best you can in communication, try your best to keep a positive attitude, and try to not drag others down if/when you're having a bad day.

No content condoning or advocating for the oppression of members of marginalised groups, or general discrimination of groups based on characteristics like gender, race, disabilities, nationality, education, religion etc.
No harassment, stalking, mobbing, deadnaming, misgendering, contacting users who have made it clear they do not wish to be contacted.
No content that is illegal in Germany.
Unlike on the Discord server, the discussion of politics is explicitly allowed here, but please keep things civil.
Provide credit for creative works that are not your own.
While we do appreciate all kinds of content you post on here, consider other instances for NSFW posts. If you still wish like publishing on here, use descriptive content warnings.

sfba.social.text: Do not post illegal, illicit, or unlicensed content.
Do not use slurs or discriminatory or hateful jokes and language, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia, and transphobia; including tone policing or critiquing lived experience.
Add content warnings to sensitive content (e.x. nudity, violence)
Do not harass anyone, post other peopleâ€™s personally identifying information (â€œdoxingâ€), or incite violence against anyone.
Do not post inÂ bad faith,Â engage in name-calling, orÂ ad hominemÂ attacks. Criticize ideas, not people.
Do not post spam (e.x. a post with only a link or an image) or promote crypto-related content such as cryptocurrencies or NFTs.
Follow the community code of conduct: https://hub.sfba.social/code-of-conduct  Use content warnings (CW) and #hashtags liberally. Be nice and have fun!

shadowland.social.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting. I know life in the shadows can get rough, but please be aware that many treat this as an ESCAPE from real life badness and don't necessarily want to see it.

shadows.rest.text: No trolling, microaggressions, or harassment. See the Code of Conduct for the full list.

Conduct intended to stalk or harass users, impede users from using the service, degrade the performance of the service, or incite others to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is disallowed.
No crypto, NFTs, or AI-created content.

sigmoid.social.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or discrimination in general
No sexually explicit or violent media
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
No spam or using an account solely for advertising
Your account bio or post history should in some way indicate interest in AI
Accounts which primarily produce the content of posts via software must be clearly identified as being bots
No flooding the public timelines (making lots of public posts in quick succession)

silence.horse.text: You must own a copy of the Caligula Effect 2

silvan.cloud.text: No person using silvan.cloud shall use their account for harassment nor to compromise the safety and privacy of any other person on this or other Mastodon instances.

The following are prohibited on silvan.cloud: transphobia & queerphobia; ableism, saneism & eugenics ideology; racism, settler colonialism, orientalism, & casteism; promotion of fascist, Nazi, white supremacist, violent or hateful ideology; wilful spread of disinformation and misinformation.
Concern-trolling; sea-lioning; whatabouttism; astroturfing/astroTERFing; and other exhausting interactions that fall broadly under the umbrella of micro-aggressions are strictly forbidden.
No spamming the fediblock hashtag with discussion.

silversword.online.text: Read the message below these rules carefully. It is important for the future of your account on this server!

This is a gaming-oriented Mastodon instance. It is created by a gamer for gamers. Post anything related to video games. PC gaming, console gaming, VR gaming, mobile gaming. All other topics of your interest are absolutely allowed (see the next rule) but the main topic here is video games.

Real-life politics is not allowed. We are gathered on this instance to provide an escape from reality called video games. We love games, we live games. We welcome you into this community with any topic of your interest (besides gaming) except real-life politics.

Before you join this instance, take a moment to think about what these four words mean to you: Peace, Love, Unity, and Respect. It is the intention of this instance to be welcoming of other Human beings no matter their color or identity. As gamers, we set the example.

sizecraft.social.text: Respect Copyright: Only share content for which you hold the copyright or have obtained explicit permission to use.
NSFW Content: Please label and tag content appropriately to ensure that other users can browse the instance comfortably. Use content warnings for explicit or sensitive material.
Content Moderation: Don't post explicit violence, child exploitation, or any illegal activity. Violations may result in warnings, content removal, or account suspension.
Privacy: Do not share personal information or private conversations without explicit permission. If you are sharing others' artwork, ensure proper attribution and obtain consent whenever necessary.
Attribution and Sourcing: Give credit where it is due. When sharing or reposting artwork, always provide a link to the source when possible.
AI-Generated Content: AI-Generated content is allowed, but must be tagged with #AI, #AIGenerated or #AIArt to respect the wishes those who would prefer to hide such content.
Role-Play (RP) Accounts. RP Focused Accounts are allowed as long as the profile indicates as such and other content policies are adhered to.

sizeriot.com.text: No bigotry, no hate speech (even under the pretense of "free speech"). Tolerance is a social agreement: if you don't agree to it, you're not covered by it.
No advertisements, no spam, no NFT/crypto talk. Creators are permitted to promote their own work.
Please use content warning for graphic images.
Please be civil to each other here. Assume positive intent. We're all here for the same reason.
No incitement to violence; no harassment, dogpiling, or doxxing of users.
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information.
No uncredited use of other creators' work (image theft), no obliteration of signature or watermark.

skol.social.hint: Treat all members with kindness and respect. Abusive, harassing, or hateful behavior will not be tolerated.
Do not engage in or promote illegal activities. This includes sharing pirated content, engaging in fraud, or any other unlawful behavior.
Avoid posting content that is offensive, obscene, or intended to provoke others. Let's keep the community welcoming for everyone.
Refrain from posting spam or irrelevant content. This includes excessive self-promotion or advertisements.
Do not share personal information of others without their consent. Respect everyone's privacy.
When providing feedback, be constructive and respectful. Personal attacks or derogatory comments are not acceptable.
If you encounter any issues or see someone violating these rules, please report it to the moderators.

snake.club.text: Be kind and respectful of others. This includes respecting things like pronouns, using content warnings as appropriate, etc.
Don't post anything designed to shock or disgust people.
This is not a NSFW server. I don't particularly care about the occasional not-quite-SFW post. I'm not puritan. But just don't make your account all about NSFW content. That's all!

Disagreement is fine, other opinions are welcome. Keep your discussion and disagreement civil and try to avoid ad hominems. If you venture into areas of denying other people's human rights, you'll find that you'll lose your rights to post here pretty darn quickly.

I'll do my best to use a three-strike system and reach out regarding moderation decisions. But at the end of the day, this is not Elon's "public square". I don't owe you free speech. You can host your own Mastodon server if you want. I can, and will, make any moderation decision I feel is necessary.
